pa dang bral ba'i don ji lta bu lags/ sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// skye med chos dbyings gleng gzhi bral ba la// ma skyes bder gnas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// gleng bral 'di la gnas pa yis// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang// chos nyid gter ldan nam mkha'i tshul// rnal 'byor chos nyid yin pa'i phyir// bdag dang gzhan dag med pa'i phyir// bdag dang gzhan don mi byed pas// sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol// mi gnas dbyings las cir snang yang// snang ba sgyu ma chen po ste// yul la rol pas lhun gyis grub// phyi rol bzung ba'i yul rnams kyang// de phyir bzung ba'i yul rnams kyang// ngang gis grub pa ma yin pas// de phyir shes pa yang grub min// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid mi 'gyur ba'i don ji lta bu lags/ sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// yang dag med 'gyur nam mkha'i tshul// nam mkha' mtha' dbus med par ltar// dbus mtha' med pa'i nam mkha'i tshul// gzugs med chos nyid nam mkha'i ngang// ye nas mtha' bral dag pa'i phyir// gang nas mi 'byung chos nyid yin pa'i phyir// lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs// 'gyur ba med pas drang por gnas// ye shes dmigs med nam mkha' 'dra// rang bzhin mtha' med mnyam pa che// yul bsam smra ba 'byung mi 'gyur// mtshungs pa med pa'i chos nyid ni// rang gi mthu yis rig pa las// mnyam nyid bsgoms pa gzhan las min// de phyir bsgrub pa don med phyir// chos ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ye nas rdul tsam mi dmigs phyir// spyod yul bgrod pa shin tu dka'// yang dag chos nyid gcig pa la// bye brag chos su phye bar dka'// sla zhing dka' la sla phyir dka'// zhi ba'i chos nyid dngos bral bas// mngon sum gnas pa kun la khyab// chos nyid mtshan ma med pa ste// chos nyid dmigs pa'i yul med pas// dbang pos mthong bar bya ba min// yul med khyab pas de bzhin nyid// mngon sum snying rjes kun la khyab// rang bzhin chos nyid zab mo la// dmigs pa thams cad yongs bral la// 'jig rten byis pa mi mkhas pas// ri bong rwa dang rus sbal spu// nam mkha'i me tog mo gsham bu// de rnams mthong ba gang 'dod pa// de dag byis pa'i spyod yul yin// thob med ye nas gnas pa'i phyir// mngon par 'char ba gcig pa'i phyir// ming tsam 'di zhes bstan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpas mtshon du med// ces

gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po yang dag ma bsgrubs par 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// yang dag don nyid dam pa 'di// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu yongs med phyir// mi dmigs zhi ba nam mkha'i tshul// ngo mtshar rmad byung rol pa 'di// bya bral nam mkha' ji bzhin te// sku gsung thugs ldan kun tu bzang// bcom ldan chos nyid mnyam par gnas// bya bral ngo mtshar zhi ba nyid// sprul pa'i rol pa sgyu ma 'di// rmad byung bya ba mi 'gyur dang// mi mdzad chos nyid zhir gnas phyir// ci yang mi dmigs gti mug las// de ma thag tu rang las byung// gti mug rang bzhin yang dag ste// stong nyid zhi ba nam mkha'i tshul// shes rab gti mug chos dbyings dang// de bas cir yang mi dmigs gti mug la// de ma thag tu rang las byung// sems can mtshan nyid stong pa'i phyir// rnam grol dag pa gang yin pa// 'di ni thams cad mtshungs pa'i lam// 'gro kun snying po yin pa'i phyir// 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas// mi shes byis pas bslad pa'i phyir// yang dag don nyid gzhan nas tshol// sman nyid sman pa tshol ba bzhin// ji ltar nad pa'i mtshan nyid la// sman dang sman pas zhi ba ltar// zhi bas chos nyid dag pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chos nyid rgyu rkyen las ma grub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dag pa chen por 'gyur ba'i don ji lta bu/ sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i// byang chub snying po kun yin phyir// bde ba zhi ba byar med pas// gzung dang 'dzin par mi blta bas// 'jig rten rnam dag kun tu bzang// go ba'i yul na bde ba che// de nyid rnam dag 'jig rten yin// phyogs bcu gnas kyi bla 'og kyang// de dag thams cad ming du grags// ming tsam sgyu mar brten nas kyang// chos nyid mi 'gyur rang bzhin la// las ni sgyu mar bstan par zad// de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bla 'og grub// las kyi rgyud kun bsags pa yis// skye 'gro sems can rnams su snang// ma nges 'ja' tshon kha dog las// rigs kyi khyad par mngon par snang// snod bcud 'jig rten thams cad kun// g.yo

dang mi g.yo thams cad kyang// de bzhin nyid kyis zhi ba yin// de bzhin g.yo ba mi g.yo ba// 'gro ba rnams la bstan bya'i phyir// 'byung ba lnga po gtso che na// thams cad mi 'bral yang dag lnga// thams cad de bzhin nyid du gnas// lhag pa'i dbang gis rtog pa zhi// rtog pa zhi ba gang yin pa// de ni chos sku dag pa ste// rgyal ba dpa' bos de skad bshad// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ phyi nang snod bcud dag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dag pa chen po yin na rtsol bsgrub kyi don ji lta bu lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// gal te dmus long mig ldongs pas// bza' ba'i yul cig blta 'dod kyang// yul de mthong ba med pa ltar// chos nyid yang dag zab mo 'di// theg pa dman pas mi rtogs phyir// spyod bsgrub sna tshogs bstan nas kyang// don la yang dag gzung phyir bstan// chos nyid yang dag zab mo la// dus gsum bde gshegs mchod pa dang// ting 'dzin phyag rgya spyan drang sems can don// chos nyid la ni de dag med// de phyir rtsol bsgrub bla med gnas su che// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ spyod pa thams cad bkag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i don ji lta bu lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dus gsum rtag tu ngo bos stong// rang bzhin skye 'gag med pas zhi// byang chub tha snyad mi 'dzin phyir// blang dor chos nyid rtag gnas phyir// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// tha snyad ming la mi gnas te// skye 'gag med par rtag gnas shing// de nyid dus gsum chen por sbyor// mnyam nyid chos dbyings kun tu bzang// phyogs bral chos nyid yongs rdzogs phyir// dus gsum rnam pa zhi ba'i tshul// mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med// gcig pas phyogs su bsngo dang bral// dri med rang bzhin dag pa'i tshul// tshogs kyi rgyan dang bkram pa yang// rang bzhin gnas pas dri ma med// 'dod yon lnga nyid kun bzang rgyan// ye nas chos kun dag pa'i phyir// bsngo ba khyad par med pa'i phyir// gnyis 'dzin bral ba zhi ba ste// gdod nas rnam dag bdud rtsi'i tshul// kun bzang lhun grub yin pa'i phyir// lhun gyis grub pas mi bsngo zhing// gdod nas dag pa bdud rtsi la// phyi nang 'du byed

bdud rtsi'i tshul// mi gnas 'du byed zhi ba'i phyir// 'du byed bcu gnyis khyad par yang// lhag pa'i bsam pas gzung ba med// gzung med 'jig rten zhi ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po chos rnams kyi don ji lta bu lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'chad// e ma ho chos rnams thabs mkhas ye shes mthong ba dang// rgyu bzhi dmigs dang nges dang dam tshig rnams// thams cad gang yin ji lta bu// chos de ngo bo gang yin zhi ba'i tshul// de phyir chos de yongs su dag pa'i phyir// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// dpa' bo chen po dpag med pa// rnam 'dren sems can thams cad kyis// rnam pa kun tu mi 'gyur dang// de ltar stobs dang rnam thar dang// 'jig med gang dag ci 'dra dang// yang dag chos rnams ji 'dra bar// bsdus kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro// de yang ci phyir zab mo 'di// shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir// rgyal bas grangs med gnas dag na// zab cing shin tu phra ba dang// rig dka' mthong bar dka' ba'i phyir// spyod pa dag gi sngon chad bsnyen// bskal pa grangs med bsam yas su// spyod pa de dag spyod pa'i phyir// 'bras bu de ni ci 'dra bas// byang chub snying po dam pa 'di// de ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren pa// gzhan dag dang ni ngas kyang de// ji ltar yin dang ci 'dra dang// de yis mtshan nyid 'di 'dra shes// de ni bstan du mi nus te// mos pas rtogs par mi 'gyur phyir// de ni brjod du yongs med do// gang la chos de bstan pa dang// bstan pa dag kyang shes pa yi// de 'dra'i sems can su yang ni// 'jig rten dag na yod ma yin// gang dag 'jig rten dag mkhyen pa// lhag par byas pas bde bar gshegs kyis bsngags// zag zad rgyal ba'i ye shes 'di// thams cad gcig tu 'dus gyur nas// zab mo yang dag bsams byas kyang// bde gshegs ye shes rtogs mi nus// de bas yang dag zab mo 'di// lta dman theg pa chung ba dang// mu stegs log lta can rnams kyis// nga yi chos kyi phyogs tsam yang// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// yang dag don de yongs mi shes// zhi ba rtog med mnyam du ma shes na// shin tu nges don zab mo smra rnams kyis// de rnams kyis kyang phyogs med gang gyur kyang// smyig ma 'dam bu'i tshal ltar gang bas kyang// shes rab

phra rnams gcig tu 'dus nas su// ji ltar mi rtog zab mo la// brtags kyang lta ba dman pa'i phyir// zab mo'i don gang mi rtog pas// byis pa'i spyod yul min pas so// gzhan min gsung rgyal drang srong che// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chos rnams kyi don gyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ zhi ba bdag nyid la 'di skad ces gsol to// zhi ba'i bdag nyid chen po rnam grangs kyi don ni gang lags/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid chen pos bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin theg pa gcig phyir du// dpag tu med pa bstan gyur kyang// theg pa yang dag rdzogs pa yin// nga yi bstan pa theg pa dgu po yang// 'gro ba dag gi mthu dang stobs la bstan// thabs kyi mchod sbyin ye shes la// gzud pa'i phyir na ngas bshad do// gang zhig rtag tu rnam par dag 'gyur ba// rab tu des pa sangs rgyas dang// de dag la ni rab rgyas don rnams bstan// de ltar de dag bsam pa rdzogs pa yang// de dag la ni ma 'ongs dus dag dang// shin tu dag pas de dag kun la khyab par 'gyur// the tshom med pas thams cad byang chub dang// theg pa tha dad pas ni gang bstan pa// skyes bu mchog rnams thabs mkhas ma gtogs par// theg pa gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin// bya ba gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin// byang chub rdul med dam pa thob nas su// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang// phrag dog gser sna 'khor ba'i chos// de dag rang bzhin zhi ba'i phyir// gdod nas kun rdzogs dbyings kyi ngang// rab zhi mya ngan rtag 'das pas// theg pa gsum du gang dag bstan pa yang// bder gshegs thabs kyi 'gro ba 'dul yin phyir// theg pa thabs kyis de ltar bstan par zad// theg pa gcig ste de bzhin tshul yang gcig/ rnam dag chos kun 'dren pas bshad pas gcig/ thams cad theg pa mchog la gnas// zhi ba'i sa mchog dag pa dag pa'i ngang// 'di dag thams cad 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// bsngags pa mtha' yas chos nyid dngos po dag/ 'di ni yang dag dam pa'i mdzod// rig dka' dam pa zhi ba ste// theg dman rnams kyis rtogs mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chos nyid zhi ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis// byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po chos nyid lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i don gang lags/ sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// bya med lhun grub yongs su rdzogs// mi gnas chos dbyings dngos po

dag/ yud tsam ting 'dzin dbyings la dbang// de nyid rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// yid kyis bsam pa yang dag ste// bltas pa'i stobs ni bkram pa'o// mi dmigs mi 'gyur stong pa'i tshul// mi gnas lhun grub mnyam pa'i ngang// chos nyid yang dag bkram pa'i phyir// mthong bar gyur pas dngos grub la// de nyid mnyam gzhag yongs rdzogs pa'o// sangs rgyas zag med dag pas zhi// chos 'di thams cad zag med zhi ba ste// 'gog pa skye ba rnam par spangs// 'di na chos rnams gang yang ma mchis shes// de ltar bsam na dad mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med pa'i phyir// mthong bar gyur pas dngos grub la// bdag nyid mnyam pa chen po'i don// yud tsam bzung bas sbyor ba yin// dga' bar gyur pas dam tshig ste// thog ma'i 'bras bu zag med dam pa thob// ji ltar dbul pos nor rnams rnyed pa bzhin// de bzhin yang dag dam pa thob// thabs kyis gar thabs bskyod pa yin// gnyis med sbyor bas phul ba yin// chos dbyings mi dmigs sbyor ba ste// dga' ba kun bzang mi gtong shugs// chos nyid la ni nyams pa med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// las rgya mtsho spyad par dag pa'i don ji lta bu lags/ sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// chos nyid zab mo yang dag yin pa'i phyir// dag pa 'di la mi smon to// rgyal bas 'di ni dam pa'i mthar gsungs so// mya ngan 'das pa'i mthar thug lus 'di la// stong pa nyid du yun ring yongs su bsgom// khams gsum sdug bsngal byang chub zhing// bdag gi rgyal ba'i bstan pa bya ba'i phyir// rgyal ba'i sras la gang tshe rab bstan te// byang chub mchog la gang dag su zhugs pa// de dag la ni chos gang ci 'grub pa// gzung 'dzin mtha' spangs mnyam nyid gnas pa'i phyir// bdag med mnyam nyid gnyis spangs te// mi gzung gtong bas gtor ma yin// bya ba med pas las rnams zin// rnam rtog 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ste// mnga' brnyes mi rtog bgegs bsal te// phyi nang chos 'dzin bgegs kyi rnam// gzung 'dzin bral ba byang chub ste// ye shes nyi ma chos kyi dbyings// rnam rtog ye shes bgegs bsal nas// mi gsung mnyam gzhag sngags tshig go/ mnyam nyid dam pa zhi ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ spyad du med pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis sems dpa' dam pa la

'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po chags sdang zhi ba gang lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// mtshan mar spyod pa rnams la chos nyid de// chos kyi dbang phyug 'jig rten zhi ba'i tshul// sems can gnas rnams rab tu zhi// rab dang byang chub dam pa 'di// thabs la mkhas pas chos nyid dang// rtag tu mya ngan 'das pa yin// ngang gis chags pa mi mnga' bas// snying po rang rig sangs rgyas phyir// bla ma mchod dang gtong ba dang// de bzhin bsod nams thams cad dang// ma chags mi g.yo'i stobs med na// byas pas 'ching ba chen por 'gyur// byang chub bde gnas snying po'i don// chos nyid mchod pa rin chen sbyin// rdo rje'i don nyid mi shigs pa// chos nyid skye med chos can rnam pa dag/ de ltar zhi ba bsod nams yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ chags sdang zhi ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' chen po/ brdas de bzhin nyid mtshon du med pa gang lags/ sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// rnam grol ro gcig mya ngan 'das// mthar thug rtag tu gcig pas nam mkha' 'dra// ye shes de ni shes dka' ste// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs la// mi shes pas ni the tshom 'gyur// de las nyams shing de dag 'khyams// ji ltar sprin gyi phung po yis// nyi ma'i 'od mchog bsgribs pa ltar// mi shes byis pa rmongs pa yis// yang dag dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgribs// sprin gyi char pa ro gcig ltar// skal pa gsum yang chos nyid ro// sems can thams cad mngon rdzogs te// sems can sdug bsngal rnam dag yin// rnam dag shin tu mthong bar bya ba'i phyir// de ni mnyam nyid yang dag gcig/ de ni rnam grol mya ngan 'das pa yin// rtag tu byang chub kyi ni gnas yin phyir// des na mnyam pa nyid de mi mnyam med// 'dod chags med cing zhe sdang dag kyang med// nam yang rjes su chags pa med// su la'ang mdza' zhing chags pa med// de la de byang sgrib par 'gyur// de ltar de las de rtogs na// de la de nyid grub pa med// de bzhin nyid tsam 'grub pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ de bzhin mtshon du med pa'i le'u ste sum cu so gcig pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin nyid mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa'i don gang lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// ji ltar nyi zla dag pa'i 'od// yon tan ldan dang sdig can gyis// mi la mnyam par rab 'char te// de la skye ba 'grib

pa med// de bzhin chos nyid shes rab yod// snyoms pas nyi ma zla ba bzhin// lhag cing cad pa med pa bzhin// thams cad sems can rnam dag 'dus// ji ltar kham snod rdza mkhan gyis// 'jim 'dra las snod byas pa dag/ snod kyi rnam pa mang byas la// rdzas kyi rnam pa so so blugs// des ni ming yang so sor grags// de bzhin sems can sangs rgyas bye brag med// tha dad med pas bde bar gshegs// theg pa tha dad rab ston kyang// theg mchog rgyal ba'i theg par 'dud// 'gro ba'i 'khor lo mi shes pas// chos nyid dag pa'ang shes ma yin// chos rnams bdag nyid rnams spangs shing// dag par shes pa stong pa'i phyir// zhi ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi// byang chub yang dag nyid du shes// chos kun rtogs rdzogs sangs rgyas yin// ji ltar dmus long mi mthong 'di skad ces// gzugs rnams kun ni med ces smra// sman pas dmus long rnams la snying rje bskyed// ri la sman btus rab sbyar dmus long la ni shin tu gtong// de yis mig mthong gzugs snang 'gyur// mi shes sems can dmus long 'dra// de phyir zab mo rtogs dka'o// bla med yang dag rdzogs byang chub// theg bshad 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// rnam par dag pa bstan du med// stong nyid rmi lam sgyu ma'i tshul// chu shing snying po med lta'i tshul// gang gis chos nyid rab shes shing// khams gsum rang bzhin rnam par grol// chos kun stong zhing mnyam pa ste// tha dad dbyer med bdag nyid do// de dag la yang mi rtog stong// chos nyid gang yang mthong med na// chos kyi sku ni ma lus par// shes rab chen po des mthong ngo// dgur bstan theg pa gcig tu mnyam// mnyam zhing snyoms te gcig tu mnyam// de ltar mkhas pa zhi ba yis// mi bcing mya ngan 'das pa shes// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rang rig skye med ye shes dbyings// mi shigs mi 'gyur rdo rje'i don// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje yin// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don// rdo rje 'chang rgyal 'di nyid ni// thams cad du yang yang dag gnas// rgyal bas dus gsum rtogs par skye med mnyam// kun gyi chos nyid rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs// rdo rje gsum gyi mtshan ma ji snyed pa// bdag po nyid du gyur pas de bzhin nyid// chos rnams thams cad 'gro kun ni// dbyings su ro gcig skye med do// mnyam nyid rgyal po'i chos nyid de// rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ngag/ dug lnga chos dbyings ye shes dbyings// skye med chos dbyings ye shes mnyam// de yi yon tan khyad par lngar mthong ba// mtshan nyid de nyid ye shes lnga// 'gro ba'i don du rigs lngar snang// rigs dang yon tan mang po yang// 'gro bzung don du bstan (6)

par zad// chos dbyings ye shes khyad med phyir// de phyir dbyings nyid stong pa'i ngang// skye med ye shes me long lta bur gnas// rig pa'i ye shes ngang dang gnyis med phyir// chos dbyings ye shes dag pa'i dbyings la brjod// rigs lnga thabs kyi phyag rgya kun// thams cad chos sku rdo rjer ro gcig 'dus ma byas// ji ltar de ltar snang ba yin// gcig bsam de nyid kun gyi ngang// rigs ldan rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gcig/ bdag med gnyis nyid bder gshegs dag pa'i ngang// ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa na// kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa// chos la snying por gyur pa mkhyen pa dag/ chos can zhi ba'i tshul gyi dag pa 'byung// yum gyur dam pa rgyal ba'i lam// nam mkha'i rang bzhin gnas pa ni// byang chub rgyu ni chos dbyings mkha'// yang dag zhi ba zab mo la// bkrus pas mi 'dag nam mkha' 'dra// byang chub la ni rgyu 'bras med// dag pa'i rang bzhin gnas pa'i phyir// thob par bya ba med mos pas// rtsol bas yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// dpal ldan sangs rgyas rtse gcig 'chang// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi ngang// rang byung tshogs chen bla med dag/ rgyal ba'i rang bzhin ting 'dzin shes// dus gsum sangs rgyas rang bzhin stong// rang gis shes pas chos nyid stong las su// 'khrul rtog brtags pas thams cad snang ba bzhin// shes rab thugs rje ngang gi 'char// rnal 'byor chos nyid dag gyur na// thugs rje'i byin rlabs btsal mi dgos// gnyis med rnam dag chos kyi sku// bdag med zhi bas snang ba'i phyir// bdag tu snang ba nyid kyi sku// mi 'gyur nam mkha' lta bu dag/ tshul dang mthun pa'i ngo bo bzhi// ngang nyid zhi ba rtogs pa'i phyir// tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam bcu// spyod pa mtha' dag rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa// yang dag lta bas ma zin na// de dag byang chub gegs su gyur// sems kyi byang chub rnam dag kyang// chos tshul yon tan khyad par ni// ma nor bsgom pa'i mngon 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ mtshan ma med pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//// des nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol te// sems dpa' chen po/ rnam rtog zhi bar bya ba'i don gang lags/ sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// chos nyid don nyid rang bzhin la// rdo rje gsum bsgom ma rtogs pa// grub par bya ba'i dngos grub gzhan mi 'tshol// gnas dang med pa la ni gang rtogs pa// de dag chos nyid la yang gang rtogs pa// gnas dang gnas min 'gal bar ma bsams na// yang dag mi dmigs zab mo

'di// bzhag pas lus la yang yod med la// btsal bas zab mo ga la rnyed// dbyings kyi rang bzhin stong nyid dam pa yin// rigs kyi khyad par du snang yang// de dag byis pa'i spyod yul snang ba ni// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' gtso// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan dang// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas yul// 'du byed don grub gdon mi za// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de// rigs dang zhi khro sprul pa kun// chos sku ro gcig mkhas pas 'gro don bstan pa mnyam// dmigs med byis pa mi mkhas pas// chos dang chos ma yin par mthong// stong nyid mnyam pa chen po la// rgyal ba rigs lngar rtog pa 'khrul// chos nyid la ni rnam rtog med// de phyir de dag 'khrul pa yin// thabs kyi so sor bshad pa'ang don gcig la// dbyings rtog len spang sgrib pa mu mtha' med// rtogs pas sangs rgyas ting 'dzin dge rtsa 'phags// blo dang nam ldan zhi ba sems kyi ngang// dam pa de ni mngon du 'gyur ba na// chos sku dri med nam mkha' 'dra// de la sku gsum mchog tu gyur pa'i chos dbyings su// rdo rje rtse mo mchog nyid 'dus ma byas// mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings de yang de nyid do// de la gang rtog yang dag mthong// zhi ba rnam dag nyid las yon tan ma lus 'byung// ji snyed rnam grol chos su dag pa rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang// 'dus ma byas nyid rgyal ba kun gyi ngang// gzhan du rigs lnga bstan par bya mi dgos// mi 'khrul pa la yi dam lha med ltar// de nyid rtogs ldan dbyings kyi lha// rgyal bas ma bcos gdod nas skye ba med// rang sems zhi bas bsgom par bya ba min// sems ni skye med thugs kyi dbyings// lus ngag yid gsum mi mnyam mnyam pa'i ngang// nam mkha' bzhin du bsam par bya// nam mkha' bstan du med pa ltar// bdag nyid rang bzhin med par zhi// de phyir byang chub sems nyid rdzogs// de las yon tan de dag de las 'byung// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan sna tshogs rdzogs// kun bzang ngang nyid ro gcig phyir// dbyings la dbyings nyid rtag tu dmigs// cir yang min la cir yang snang ba'i phyir// thams cad chos nyid sprul par zad// byang chub don nyid de dag thams cad kyang// 'ching med rgyal ba'i rigs can yin/ chos sku rnam dag lhun grub stong pa'i dngos// de med mi 'byung de phyir chos dang phyir// de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do// rnam grol zhi ba zab mo byang chub sems// des na rdo rje sems dpa' chos nyid kun tu bzang// de nyid ci 'drar bsgom par bya bar 'gyur// rdo rje de rtogs bsgrub pa bca'// rdo rje de nyid yang dag dam pa ste// phra zhing shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam// 'di ni zab mo mi

rtog rtog las dag/ ji ltar brtag par dka' zhing shin tu zab// bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// stong nyid dam pa zhi ba la// mtshan ma'i ting 'dzin bcug pas nor// gnas dang zhi ba stong pa la// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bde gshegs kun gyi pho brang ngo// e ma ho e ma ya mtshan dag pa'i gzhi// tshig gis mi phebs brjod dang bral ba'i phyir// gzhan dang byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin yang// de phyir chos nyid dngos bral la// byis pa lta dman yod par 'dod// de ni yod pa min pa'i phyir// brjod pa mtha' dag don 'dir blta// zhi ba chos dbyings gzhan nas mi btsal te// mngon dang mi mngon chos rnams kun// de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong// dper na dbu+u ba rdos dag chu bos khyer mthong na// de la dngos ma mthong ba ltar// mngon sum la sogs rgyu yi dngos po rnams// de yang 'jig rten grub pa'i mtha' rtogs pa// rgyu ni dngos bral dam pa ste// de nyid rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu 'bras spyod yul rnams// ji ltar tshad ma bzhag na blo yis 'dzin byed do// mi shes pa dag kun 'dus nas// dag pa'i don la ci bltas kyang// dag pa de nyid ga la mthong// rtogs mtha' rnam pa med pa'i phyir// dpyad mtha' med de snying po med na tshad ma gang// de phyir rnal 'byor chos nyid zab mo la// de phyir 'jig rten tha snyad rtog pa rnams// rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam 'dir mi dgos so// yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin rgyas par 'gyur// ye shes 'di nyid yongs su rdzogs byas na// 'od byed gtso bo rnam par dag/ mnyam thugs zhi bar gyur cing shin tu gnas// rtag par mi g.yo gyur cing mi 'gul te// de la nam yang g.yeng ba mi mnga' la// de ni ngang gis zag pa med la gnas// bde dang sdug bsngal zhi bar mnyam// dge ba 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ thugs brtses rtag tu 'di mtshar te// 'gro ba thams cad kun bslang dag pa yis// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med pa// dga' zhing bde bar rab tu brnyes// de ltar dam pa zhi ba brnyes par bya ba'i phyir// dngos po mtha' yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya// brtags pa'i mtshan nyid phung po khams dang skye mched la// so so skye bos dngos po mtshan mar bzung// skye bo kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni// mi shes byis pas gnyis mthong phyir// gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis su brtags// dper na byis pa mig nad 'khrul pa yis// nam mkha' dag la bal gyi 'khor lo 'byung ba dang// gzugs rnams med kyang yod par mthong ba ltar// 'dzin pa drug gis ji ltar dngos por mthong zhing bzung// gzung 'dzin brtags

pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul// rang gi rtogs pas mos pa de bzhin gzung ba med 'gyur na// de dag dngos po med rtogs dgra bcom 'dra bar grol bar 'gyur ba'i rigs// ma rtogs lta dman byis pa dang// theg rdzogs de gnyis khyad par rigs// de dag dus dgras 'joms pa dang// sdug bsngal gnyen lam des 'khrul mngon par 'gyur// dus las bde sdug ga la 'byung// gzhan nas skye mched sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad mar rung na ni// phyi ma chos su bzung bas dngos po zhi 'gyur ga la yod// de dag skye mched sgo nas zhi ba ga la rtog/ de dag tshad mar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de su la'ang dgos mi 'gyur// de phyir don de dbang pos rtogs gyur na// bsgrub dang brtson 'grus de dag mi dgos phyir// stong pa'i chos rtogs khong du chud pa dang// bsam gtan yan lag dam pa ldan rnams dang// yon tan zhi ba dam pa gsungs pa kun// de kun byis pa'i spyod yul min phyir ram// lam de rnam grol lam du bstan cing de yi rtog med 'gyur// dbang po shes pas mi thar te// mig mthong can 'dra lta dman mtshungs// don dam rtogs shing zab mo yang// 'khrul pa dag gis yongs mi shes// 'khrul pa dag las dngos 'di byung// 'di la brten nas dngos po mtha' dag byung// ma rig pa sogs bcings pa'i sdug bsngal yod// sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil phyir// rnam rig shes des nyon mongs 'byung ba'i gnas// de phyir don nyid ma mthong bas// des na skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul// de ltar mun par mngon zhes rgyal bas gsungs// des na 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na// rtogs pa dngos su bden pa che las nyams// kyi hud byis pa 'di dag thams cad ni// rnam rtog gis bcings dag pa ma mthong bas// bdag nyid bsgoms pas rin chen che las nyams// kun tu rtog can yang dag ma yin phyir// nyon mongs sgo nga'i sbubs brtol mi nus shing// kun tu rtog pas rtsol med nyams// stong pa gnas med rten yang med pa la// ji ltar yod pa ma rig 'khrul pas shes// yang dag ma mthong blo gros 'khrul pa'i phyir// blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur pas na// log par rtogs shing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas// yang dag dben pa'i don rnams mi mthong bas// des na mya ngana'adas pa'i dgongs pa rab tu 'jig/ sems dang sems las byung ba de dag kyang// de nyid rnam shes 'jug ldog bcas rkyen gyis// de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin// 'du tshogs dag gi bag chags bsags pa la// dge dang mi dge'i bag chags yongs bsal la// las gang goms pa'i mthu yis brtas pa'i tshe// sems nyid yul dang lus 'dra snang bas rus

pas gang bzhin du// 'jig rten 'byung ba thams cad shes pas 'khrul par snang// ji ltar 'khrul pas bag chags sna tshogs bsags// bag chags sna tshogs shes pa brgyad nyid yin// bag chags bsags pa'i rgyu la dmig pa skyes pas na// yid la brtags pa'i bdag ni yod pa min// 'jig rten byis pa shes pa 'khrul pa yis// thag pa la ni sbrul snyam 'dzin// thag mthong shes pa 'khrul pa yin// bag chags rnams la bde bar shes// 'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra mthong de las rnam rig skye// dper na sos kyi nyi ma phyed dus gdungs pa la// skyes bus gdungs pas smig rgyu dag la chu yi rgyun du mthong// de la brtags na chu nyid ga la yod// rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma rtogs pas// rtog pa'i rjes su 'brengs nas log pa'i dngos// bag chags mthu las sna tshogs snang ma rtogs// de las zag bcas rang bzhin rtogs pas bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed// ldan par 'byung ba shin tu \u0f84phra bar rgyu ba de ma mthong// bdag tu blta la sogs pa mu stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar bar rtog/ sems 'di las rnams mtha' yas gnas gyur pa// bag chags mtha' med nges pa med// bag chags brtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te// rkyen 'gas bag chags 'ga' zhig rmi lam mi yi rgyud kyi lus snang la// rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sad byas pa'i tshe// dbang phyug la sogs byed par 'dod de lam de ma zhi grol mi 'gyur// bdag nyid 'dod chags bcas shing zhe sdang bcas// gti mug bcas par yang ni rab tu snang// de dag spyod pa dag ni ma spangs na// bdag gi gzhi yang yongs su 'da' mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor lam bslad the tshom rgyu yang rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skyes// bdag tu brtags pas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral// mngon shes tshe la shin tu mi mkhas pas// des ni chos nyid bsgribs te rnam rtog phyi phyir 'phel// sems can mtha' dag rang bzhin stong nyid dag pa la// mi shes gzung 'dzin 'khrul 'khor ma rig rtog pa las// chos rnams dag pa nyid du snang zhing bde la gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i rgyu// chos su brtags pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung zhing ngan song srid par 'gyur// rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyu la mtshan ma tha dad 'dzin pas na// las kyi khyad par dag gis rgyan du snang ba'i rigs la du ma med// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzung 'dzin bral ba du ma'i ngang la gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog des// 'phags pa'i rigs bral 'dra ba'i mya ngan 'das pa yongs su med ces rgyal bas gsungs// 'jig rten bde ldan yang dag zhi ba mya ngan 'das gang

mchog tu bde ba de// shes pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs skye bar mthong bas yang dag 'khrul// shes shing rig pas ris su gcig pas rigs la du ma med// sems kyis rnam pa sna tshogs du ma 'byung ba'i phyir// de phyir sems kyi skad cig ma de lus dang chos sku gnas// sngon dang phyi ma da ltar sems kyi chos kun gcig/ de phyir sems la bsam bzhin phyi ma des 'byung de la snang// dngos po ma spangs de bzhin nyid ni ga la mthong// rnam dag grol gzhi 'di la sems kyi rnam pa 'byung// rang sems rgyud las 'phags pa skye bo chos ni gzhan na yod ma yin// 'di ltar dge dang mi dge lung ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kun// de dag sems kyi rnam pa yin// rgyud drug rigs la sna tshogs de la'ang// de dag 'gro drug de bzhin no// phyogs bcu gang na'ang sems ni dngos po yod min phyir// de phyir sems rgyud de ni phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la rten med de// de phyir phyogs med phyir na mtha' yas zhing khams bdag gi lus// bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang skye ba'i lus su rang snang la// sems dang bag chags tha dad ma yin cig min brtag par rab tu dka'// 'di la snang phyir rten cing 'brel ba rnams gsungs pa// ma rig la sogs rten cing 'brel 'byung chos rnams kun// 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'byung ces pa// ma rig pa la sogs pa so so'i ngo bor ston pa'i phyir// tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med// ci phyir rten 'brel sems can kun la snang// de dag rang bzhin med dag las// mi shes pa su yod mthong phyir// de dag dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur rtogs par sems nyid ni// de nyid gzung 'dzin rgyu dang rkyen du snang// ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na// bu pho skyes nas dgar 'gyur shi nas mi dgar 'gyur// de phyir chos kun rmi lam lta bur yin zhes rab tu gsungs// de phyir rten 'brel rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med// gzung 'dzin med phyir dngos bral te// skye 'chi med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med cing rtag chad med// sangs rgyas ye shes 'di nyid ngang grol phyir// des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa nyid du mngon// de phyir de bzhin gshegs nyid smon lam mi stsol te// sngon gyi smon lam rnams ni ga la stsol// 'di ni ngang dang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po yin pa'i phyir// gzhan las ma brten mya ngan 'das pa mthong nas bde ba mchog dang ldan// gnas kyi skad cig nam yang ma 'bral te// sems nyams 'gyur te de med min// ji ltar 'byung ba lus brten la// lus dang 'byung ba tha dad min pa ltar// kun

gzhi'i bag chags tha dad med pa'i phyir// yang dag ma yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang// spyod yul med dang kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa yin// phyogs rnams med phyir dmigs dang gnas med rnam shes rig pa ji ltar skye// de phyir sems 'di yod med mtha' las 'das shing gcig dang du mar bral// bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi rdzu 'phrul sgyu 'dra 'phrul la snang// de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes shin tu dge ba'i rgyu nyid dang// chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni dmigs shing skye bar brtags pa yang// chos nyid ngang gis sangs rgyas ye shes chos dbyings dam pa la ni mi dmigs rgyal ba'i sku// chos dbyings rnam dag rdo rje gnas med phyir na mnyam par gnas// rang bzhin 'dra 'gyur chos nyid stong pa zhi ba rdo rje 'dus ma byas dang ldan// chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag phyogs nyid med pas rnam dag skad cig med// dag pa'i dge rtsa gzugs brnyan med pas 'jig rten ye shes yod mi 'gyur// ji ltar sgyu ma byed pa'i skyes bu yis// shing rta skyes pa bud med sna tshogs gzugs bzung ste// de la brtags nas gzugs kyi dngos po ga la yod// chos dbyings zab mo the tshom med cing byang chub don du gnas// sems can zab mo btang nas skye 'gag rnam bral bla na med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa bde gnas zhi ba'i ngang// bsod nams mang 'phel byang chub mchog 'di thams cad kun gyi yul du gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ rnam rtog zhi bar bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// tshig chad song// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// khams gsum las 'das yon tan rin chen gter gyi mdzod// mi rtog zhen chags mnyam nyid ngang du zhi// gzung 'dzin rtog bral zhi ba'i phyir// de phyir byang chub mtshan nyid med cing blang dor med// don de'i tshul gyis don dam rnam grangs skye 'gag med dang mnyam nyid dang// gnyis med bsam 'das stong nyid chos dbyings brjod dang tha snyad bral la sogs// yang dag bstan pa de kun don dam med cing kun sgrib med// gzhan pa thams cad spangs nas 'di 'dra'i don ni shin tu thob dka'i phyir// yang dag zab mo mos pas rnyed pa shin tu dka'// dper na ji ltar la la chu 'dod skam sar khron pa brkos kyang phyi phyir chu ni rab tu dkon// de ltar byis pas don nyid mi shes pas// don 'di mi shes pas ni sangs rgyas ye shes rnyed par dkon// don dam tshul gyis lam 'di nyid ni 'di 'dra ces pa'ang kun sgrib yin// the tshom yod med chos ni gang la'ang

spong zhing gnas par mi byed do// sgom pa las ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par lta ba med// sangs rgyas zab mo ye shes 'dis ni srid pa thams cad spangs// dper na sman pa'i rgyal po yon tan kun ldan gyis// nad pa'i tshogs ni gdungs par mthong ba la// sman rnams sna tshogs sbyar nas nad rnams zhi byed ltar// dngos po yod med ltar snang de bzhin gshegs pa ngang gis zhi// yod dang med pa'i mtha' rnams dag gyur na// de phyir dbu ma zhes bya dmigs su ga la yod// dbus mtha' med pas nam mkha'i ngang tshul 'dra// 'dod yon lnga nyid rtag par spyad 'gyur yang// rang bzhin spros bral ngang gis zhi ba gang la yang// 'jig rten pad+ma dbang phyug kun kyang mi spangs 'dra mnyam gnas// ji ltar mi shes 'khrul pa yis// ci yang med pa'i nam mkha' la// gzugs dang sgra dang ro la sogs// de ltar mthong ba 'khrul pa yin// chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul par yin par rab rtogs te// drug gi brten pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor don du mi rtog go/ rang gi shes pa dam par byas shing kun la rgyal de de bsnyems nas// 'dod chags zhe sdang bskyed rtsol 'byung ste gti mug yin de don mi mthong// bsam gtan gnas lus phyag rgya'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa kun// ma skyes de dag ma skyes zhi ba chos nyid rnal 'byor yang dag dam pa'i gnas// g.yo dang mi g.yo tha snyad mi gnas gnas la'ang gnas pa med// snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes bder gshegs gsungs// bya med mi gnas ma skyes zhi ba ngang gi rdzogs pa byang chub sems zhes rgyal ba kun gyis rab tu bsngags// byang chub kun rdzogs chos nyid mnyam par lhun grub yang dag don bsgom ting 'dzin mchog/ de bzhin chos nyid mi 'gyur stong pa dam pa dngos bral bas// gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas su// rnam thar gsum po sgom pa bdud kyi lam yin gzugs la sogs pa stong pa'o// don dam yang dag dmigs bral sems nyid rgyal ba kun gyi yab gyur thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu/// blang med spang med spang len bdud kyi lam ste don dam zhi ba bden dang bral// 'khor ba'i lam gsum spangs shing mya ngan 'das la ma sgom pa yang bdud kyi las nyid de// de nyid rang bzhin btsal spongs gar mi gnas// dug gsum ngo bo rnam par dag pa'i lhun grub sku gsung thugs// 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med// ldang dang mi ldang ched du mi spang sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min// bde ldan ye shes byang chub zab mo rnyed dka' rdo rje'i rtse yin te// zhi ba chen po kun snyoms 'dus ma byas// sgom pa'i sa mi rnyed phyir

sgoms pas rnyed par mi 'gyur te// sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de la de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin// sgom dang mi bsgom rnam rtog zhi ba'i ngang// dngos rnams bral gang la'ang mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di sgom mo// phyi rol yul dang nang la bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa skyes na yang dag don las nyams// de ltar rnam dag zab mo stong nyid zhi ba dam pa de la thams cad ma lus yang dag gnas// 'du byed ma skyes shin tu chos kun chos rnams ma lus mya ngan 'das// dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes rnam grol yin// ngo bos mngon rdzogs rgyu rkyen rnams ni byis pas ga la shes// nam mkha' ming tsam dge dang mi dger byar med skye ba'ang med// chos nyid rdo rje'i don dang mi dmigs stong pa de nyid rnam grol zhi ba chos kyi sku// dri med rnam dag chos dbyings gang bsgom pa// de dag ma skyes mi 'gag nam mkha'i ngo bo yin// rtsol bar yid la mi byed gang la sems med shes dang bral// nam mkha'i dri med rang bzhin dmigs med stong par shes rnams bral// dran dang dbyer med spang len ga la'ang dga' dang mtshungs med mi dmigs mnyam pa'i ngang// blang dor med pas brjod bral g.yung drung dbyings// mnyam gnas gnyis su brtag med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de gsog bri med// stong pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid la// bri ba'am 'phel ba ga la yod// ched du rtsol bral yid la mi byed ces kyang mi 'khrugs chos skur mnyam shes dang// chos nyid rnam par rtog pa kun las 'das// gang la'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi gnas shing// gzhan gyis yang dag mi 'phrog chos kun zhi ba'i ngang// mi 'phrog mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te// chos rnams de bzhin nyid dang stong pa rang nyid ngo bo nyid kyi sku// sems kyi rang bzhin skye med nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam// sems kyi dbyings su bsgoms pas lam gyis gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro// sems la sems bsgom rnal ma rtse gcig sems kyi dngos po 'dus ma byas// brda' can yang dag len pa'ang byang chub yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs phyir// de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed cing bsgom pa'i gnas yin te// ting 'dzin med la rnam rtog ting 'dzin mang po rnams// ting 'dzin de dag ting 'dzin gsum po brtan par byas shing rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bye ba mang po de dag bde ba dag/ de dag ma lus sku nyid chos sku yongs su rdzogs// chos sku phyag rgya chen por sems nyid bskyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom// sems ni kun nyon mongs dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos

dag rdo rje 'dus ma byas// de ltar rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas lam kun ma nor bsgom pa yin// ji ltar bsod nams sna tshogs rgya cher spyod pa rnams// sbyin dang tshul khrims bsod nams ci bsags kyang// yang dag chos nyid zab mo'i lta bas ma zin na// de ltar spyad pa de dag mu stegs lta ba yin pa'i phyir// kun tu bzang mo'i spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung// kun tu bzang po spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zab cing mthar thug 'gyur// shes dang mi shes spyod yul thams cad mnyam// de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par 'gyur// snang dang mi snang mang zhing rgya che ba// rdo rje'i rigs tshogs phyag rgya thams cad sngags don byang chub sems kyi rdo rje kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dag/ yid bzhin nor bu skye 'gag rnam par grol// rnam par shes pa thams cad 'bar ba chen po'i chos nyid brtson 'grus dang// thams cad 'du 'phro rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sems// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag las rnam par dag pa nges par gnon mdzes rdo rje can// dzaHhUM baM hoHmi dmigs a'i ngang/ A+oM hUM swA hrIHA+oM du chos sku rgyal ba'i a ru zhi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung rdo rje'i mchog/ de phyir zag pa med pa'i mtha' ni mya ngan 'das pa'i don// chos rnams kun ni mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha' ste mtha' pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings 'di shin tu bstan par dka'// mthong med de ni chos kyi dbyings// chos dbyings de ni sems can brtags dang bral ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa ma bskyed de// byang chub ma skyes mngon par ma grub byang chub can du gdags pa'ang med// de yi phyir na byang chub la yang byang chub sems can med// byang chub shin tu 'das pa 'di ni ma skyes pas// 'di ni mngon par ma grub mtshan nyid med pa 'di la sems can med cing mi dmigs so// don 'dir mos pa 'di yang byang chub chen po yin zhes rgyal bas rab tu bsngags// gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa yi// mchod gnas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsungs// byang chub sems kyi chos kun de dag 'di ltar mkhyen// nam mkha'i khams dang sems can khams// de dag la ni 'bri ba ma yin gang ba min// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid la ni 'bri ba'am gang ba'ang med// de ltar khong du chud pa byang chub sangs rgyas mtshan nyid do// chos kun mtshan nyid med pa de ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid do// byang chub mtshan nyid med de mtshan nyid las bzlog yin// de ltar shes na nyid las mi zhen rdo rje 'dus ma byas// rnam

par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ khams gsum mi dmigs phan gnod mi byed so so skye bo'i chos kyang mi 'gog la// rnam rtog zad bral mnyam bsgom bsgom pa'i mchog/ nyan thos rang rgyal theg dman mi dmigs don thos mi skrag mi sngangs sngangs par mi 'gyur don la zhi// de ni yang dag don rtogs zab mo mnyam nyid bsgom pa'i dngos// gnas dang mi gnas bde sdug rnam spangs pa// de ltar dag pa mthong bas mi skrag mi sngangs de ltar sgom pa rin chen tog/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun mthong dang// mi mthong mang nyung zhi dang ma zhi dul ma dul// de ltar ngang nyid stong par mthong na yang dag rdzogs pa'i theg chen bsgom pa yin// bdag dang sangs rgyas chos rnams bla dgas mi dmigs la// ma skyes mi 'gag rang bzhin mi dmigs te// sangs rgyas bla dgas don bsgom rtogs par dka'// 'dus byas 'dus ma byas su shin tu rtogs par dka'// ci yang med 'gyur yang dag snang med snang ba sgom pa'i mchog/ de bzhin nyid kyis bder gshegs rig par mi byed cing// bder gshegs kyang ni de bzhin nyid rnams rig par mi dgongs pas// 'gro ba bder gshegs de bzhin nyid du mnyam sgom na// bde ba sgom pa dam pa mnyam bzhag bde ba'i ngang// de ltar lhun sgom rdo rje rtse mo'i mchog/ bsam dang mi bsam las 'das don gyi gtso// so so skye bo 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams mi 'byed dang// chos nyid gnas ni ma 'dres dbyings// bsam gyis mi khyab dbyings la gnas// dbyings la lta dman so so skye bo mi dmigs te// spong dang mi spong so so skye bo dga' bar zhi ba ste// de ltar don la bsgoms pas sgom pa yang dag yin// sgom pa ting 'dzin snyoms 'jug bde ldan zhing// ting 'dzin mnyam snyoms bsam gyis mi khyab sgom// dper na 'phong gi slob dpon dang po slob pa'i tshe// 'di ltar ba glang phur pa dag la phog bya snyam du sems// gang tshe skra la phog 'gyur legs lobs pas// ba lang phur pa dag la bsgrim mi dgos par 'phob// gang tshe bdag gis ting 'dzin de la snyoms zhugs nas// ting 'dzin 'dis gnas de'i tshe slar yang ting 'dzin 'dis gnas snyam du mi sems la// gang dang gang gis ting 'dzin 'dir gnas na// gdags su med pa'i ting 'dzin lhun grub ste// bsam gyis mi khyab ting 'dzin 'di bas che zhing lhun grub gzhan na yod mi 'gyur// des na bsam gyis mi khyab ting 'dzin mi dmigs te// de lta mod kyis sgom pa ma thob su yang med// 'gro ba thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ting 'dzin la gnas pas/ de bas ting 'dzin sgom pa dam pa kun la yod// mi dmigs tshangs par spyod pa yun ring spyad pa yin// bdag

gis yang dag gnas ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas te// gnas med kun nas slong ba longs spyod rdzogs sku yid bzhin rin chen sa bcu'i chos kyis tshim// thabs chen byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i spyod pa'ang 'di nyid yin// 'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do// sangs rgyas byang chub sems zhes mi rtog par// spyad cing thabs mkhas rlom sems 'du shes mi bskyed 'joms pa'i ngang// rtog dpyod med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub spyod pa spyod pa yin// de ltar chos kun khong du chud cing rab rtogs 'joms pa'i ngang// skad cig tsam du dad pa'i shugs skyes de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur// de ltar shes na byis pa so so skye bo dag gis de yi ngang mi shes// dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen byang chub mchog kyang bsrung ba yin// tshul khrims dam pa kun kyang bsrungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu gnas// de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na// nam mkha' bar snang de yang snod du chung zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs// e ma ho 'du byed rtog med skye zhing 'gags pa'i chos can 'di la bden par gang 'dzin pa// skye bo skye ba sna tshogs dag nas skyes shing skye 'gyur skye ba rgyun gyi dbang song ba// phung po khams dang skye mched chos kun bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khrul// rtog mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa yi// rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir log med gyur pa// nam mkha' sangs rgyas rang bzhin bye brag med pas bde ba dang// sdug bsngal 'gog dang mi 'gog stong pa nyid las byung min la// so so skye bos mi shes slad nas rtogs pa 'khrul// sgyu ma'i sgyu shes dag gis glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams// rmi lam gyis bslad bzhin du mi yis bden pa nyams shing rmi lam dbang du song ba'i rmi lam pa// lam 'di spangs shing mtha' dag lam gzhan lam du bltas pas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de// de dag rdo la gser bzhin thugs rjer rung zhing thugs rje'i thugs rjes kye ma'o phrog pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ byang chub kyi sems ma nor bar bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po/ chos rnams mi dmigs pa gang lags/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// phung po la sogs chos rnams kun// rang bzhin stong ste dmigs dang bral// 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang zhi dang ma zhi'i chos// bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin snyoms 'jug mngon

shes lhun gyis grub// mtshan med smon pa med 'gyur rnam rtog 'dus byas 'dus ma byas nyid ngang gis zhi// 'du dang mi 'du ldog dang mi ldog phung po mngon grub rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// ma nor gzhan nyid khams dang skye mched rten cing 'brel 'byung mngon du grub pa ma nor de bzhin nyid// phyin ci log dang sgrib dang srid pa sna tshogs chos nyid ngang gis stong// ting 'dzin snyoms 'jug mngon shes ma nor bde ba'i lam// zag bcas zag med 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ gnyis med rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pas skye 'gag bral// mi mnyam mnyam pa kun rdzob don dam bde ba'i mchog/ rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal ngang gis zhi ba'i phyir// bdag yod bdag med rdzun dang mi rdzun byed yod byed med sgyu ma'i tshul ltar ro// 'byung dang mi 'byung ngo bo nyid yod nyid med 'chi 'pho skye ba dngos med smig rgyu'i tshul// tshogs dang ma tshogs lhun grub brjod pa kun dang bral// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog khong khro ser sna mun pa le lo yongs su dag/ zag bcas zag med stong dang mi stong mtshan mar 'dzin pa 'khrul pa yin pas stong// yongs su rnam dag nges pa bzhin du chos rnams rnam dag zhing// dri med rnam dag chos dbyings rin po che// rnam par mi g.yengs shes rab dbyings ma'i ngang// thams cad mi dmigs nam mkha'i ngang tshul zhi bas bde ba'i don// skyes bus rmi lam rmis kyang rmi lam rang bzhin bstan kyang rmi lam rang bzhin bshad pa med// de phyir rmi lam nyid kyang med na rmi lam rang bzhin bstan pa ga la yod// de bzhin chos nyid bstan kyang chos nyid la ni dngos po med// 'di ltar skyes bus sgyu ma mthong ba'i sgyu ma'i rang bzhin bstan kyang ngo bo nyid kyis ga la yod// de bzhin zab mo bstan kyang zab mo'i rang bzhin dngos bral te// mig yor mthong ba'i skyes bus mi g.yor bstan kyang dngos po yod ma yin// de bzhin chos sku'i rang bzhin bstan kyang dngos po mthong ba med// ji ltar smig rgyu mthong ba'i dngos po de la ngo bo ga la yod// de bzhin rtog bral zab mo dmigs med yang dag rtogs par dka'// ji ltar brag cha'i spyod yul sgra thos de ni mi mthong ba// bdag gi sgra byung de tshe sgra de thos// de tshe chos nyid zab mo bstan pa'i tshig thos chos gang bstan pa thob 'gyur mngon bshad de tshe kun shes rang bzhin med de thos pas lam du gyur// dbu ba rdos pa'i rang bzhin stong yang dbu ba'i rang bzhin phyi nang mi dmigs bstan pa'i rang bzhin dmigs par ga la 'gyur// de bzhin chos nyid zab mo ston kyang rang bzhin mi dmigs chos gang mngon par grub pa'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// chu'i chu bur ston kyang chu'i chu bur rang bzhin med na chu bur ngo

bo ga la yod// chos gang mngon par 'grub pa 'byung ba nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// 'on kyang skyes bu chu shing snying po btsal yang mi rnyed mod kyis 'on kyang de yi 'dab ma rnams kyis dgos pa byed// de bzhin chos nyid snying po med mod kyis// chos nyid bstan pa'i dgos pa'ang byed// skyes bu nam mkha' stong par tha snyad rab 'dogs kyang// nam mkha' la ni bstan pa ci yang med// de bzhin chos nyid la ni tha snyad rab btags kyang// bstan pas yongs su grub cing tha snyad btags pa med// grib ma nyin ldog tha snyad gnyis 'dogs chos gang yongs su grub pa'i phyir yang nye bar mi gnas snang ba mngon// de bzhin chos nyid tha snyad 'dogs pa'i tshig tu 'gro yang chos gang bstan pa tha snyad tshig tu mi 'gro chos rnams snang bar byed// ji ltar nor bu rin chen sbyangs na snang ba chen po nye bar gnas 'gyur kyang// snang ba de ni nang ngam phyi rol gnyis na yod ma yin// de ltar chos nyid snang ba'i bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas gyur kyang// snang ba de ni nang ngam phyi rol mthong bar nye bar mi 'gro'o// dper na 'bru mar mes bus na// de yi 'od 'phro yud tsam mi gnas kyis// snang bar byed de snang ba des gzugs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur// de bzhin ye shes chos gang la yang mi gnas chos rnams snang ba'i bya ba byed/ snang ba des ni 'phags rnams chos kun yang dag ji lta bzhin du mthong gyur to// ji ltar gzugs dang skye mched khams dang rten 'brel gang zag bcu gnyis ma grub pas// de ltar chos dbyings rnam dag zab mo de ltar mtshungs// bden dang rdzun dang phyi nang yongs su ma grub pas// rnam par mi rtog lhun grub zab mo byang chub bde// sa la sogs drug khams su ma grub pas// yang dag ngang nyid zhi bas de 'dra'o// 'khor ba'i chos dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams kun// de dag rtag tu ma grub zhi ba chos kyi ngang yang rtag tu zhi ba chos kyi dngos// zhi ba bsil 'gyur zhi ba yongs su grub// de ltar bstan pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs lhun rdzogs ngo bo nyid kyi sku// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ rnam pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste sum cu so lnga pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// yang dag pa'i don ci lta bu lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// ci la'ang mi gnas ma chags yang dag dam pa sgom// gang la'ang chos rnams zhi ba'am 'phel ba'am 'grib pa yod na sgom pa ma yin te// yang dag so so skye bo'i chos rnams mi spang sangs rgyas chos rnams mi len pa// de ni yang dag zab mo'i don rtogs sgom pa yin// 'khor

ba'i skyon du yang mi 'ching// mya ngan las 'da' yang dag blang dor med// 'phel 'grib skye 'gag bsam pa yi// chos la'ang mi smon yang dag sgom pa'o// 'das dang ma 'das da lta rab dang tha mar bar la ma chags shing// de ltar bsgoms na yang dag sgom pa yin// e e ma ho gzung du ma mchis sangs rgyas chos rnams mchog lags stong pa mngon rdzogs sku// bcom ldan de ltar bsgoms na yang dag zab don rnal 'byor bsgom pa yin// 'byung ba ltar gnas de bzhin te// chos gang gnas med gnas kyang de yin te// bsam gyis mi khyab skye med chos kyi dbyings// dbyings ni bde ldan gnyis med de dag sku yi mchog/ shes pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes so// gang tshe ye shes de ni don dam ye shes te// chags med ye shes de la dngos po med// yul med ma chags ye shes de ni gnas med do// gang tshe rten med ma thob skye med yang dag zhi// chos dbyings ye shes la ni skyon yon gnyis med do// gang gis de ltar shes pa mi dmigs sangs rgyas ye shes so// skye mi skye dang mi dmigs ye shes nub dang ma nub med// rtag dang chad dang 'dra dang mi 'dra med pas ye shes nam mkha' 'dra// ma bsgyur ma bcos ye shes drang por gnas// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug mi rtog ye shes dam pa yin// sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs kun ni btags par shes par bya// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ ye shes dag pa'am bsgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis chos mchog chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// ci yang mi dmigs stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang// dngos po rnam par dag pa'i don gang lags// chos mchog byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa// bde ba gang yang mi spyod dag pa yin pa'i phyir// phyin ci log dang yang dag gnyis med do// spyod pa ma lus bkag pa spyod pa'i mchog/ chos nyid mi dmigs dag pa chen po byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni mtha' dang mtha' med mi spyod do// yod med mi rtog dbus kyang rjes su mi mthong ngo// dbus rnams yod na mtha' yang yod par 'gyur// mtha' dbus 'byed na skyon yin no// ji ltar dper na nam mkha' la// mtha' dbus rnam par mi rtog ltar// chos nyid zhi la rtag dang chad pa med// chos nyid la ni gzugs su mthong// chos nyid la ni sgrar shes pa// log par shes des zhi mi mthong// chos nyid du ni sangs rgyas blta// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku// chos nyid rig par mi rung ste// skye ba med la bzod pa rab tu thob// bsod nams phung po mang du bde bskyed do// rang bzhin med pa'i (7)

rang bzhin can// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// rgyal ba rnams kyi yum du gyur// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// de bzhin blang ba ma yin dor ma yin// gnas su ma yin gnas rnams sbyang ma yin// kun nas nyon mongs ma yin rnam par byang ma yin// kun nas dben pa ma yin mi dben min// chos nyid g.yo ba med phyir gang du'ang 'gro// 'dus byas rkyen rnams med pas 'jig pa med// ro rnams bag tsha med pa'i phyir// chos rnams skye 'gag med cing stong pa'i ngang// phung po khams dang skye mched med phyir yang dag dam pa'i ngang la mu med do// chos nyid kun mnyam rdo rje mnyam pa yin// gang dag gsang sngags bsgrub par brtson na de dag bgegs med gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur// e ma ho/ gang gis don 'di mnyam gzhag sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur// byang chub nges par gzhol gyur dang// gsang sngags bsgrub par brtson de 'di dag bgegs med gsang sngags 'grub// byams pas mnyam nyid bya ba thams cad bskyed// 'phral du sdig 'phrog rgyal ba'i yum// byang chub sbyin byed sangs rgyas yon tan rdzogs// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis ni dbang yang bskur bar 'gyur// gsang sngags thams cad ma lus mngon du 'gyur// thams cad grol ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin mnyam par gnas// yon tan lhun grub ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i tshul// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od// gzi mdangs 'od ldan nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// bdag med mnyam snyoms nam mkha'i ngang// zhi ba chen po chos kyi sku// rnam dag lhun grub brdal ba che/ kun khyab rang bzhin ngang gis gsal// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho dag pa'i tshul// ma bcos byang chub de bzhin gnas// chos sku rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul// bde dang ldan pas rnam rtog bral// dri ma rnam dag chos kyi sku// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje can// mi g.yo mi 'gul nam mkha' 'dra// zhi ba chen po de bzhin nyid// de ltar 'dzin pas gzung 'dzin g.yul las rgyal// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ mtshan ma dang stong pa mi dmigs pa'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// dam tshig gi sdom pa ji lta bu lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog spang mi bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// rdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// mi tshangs par yang spyad par bya// bram ze dag kyang gsad par bya// phra ma'i tshig kyang smra bar bya// brnab sems gnod sems bskyed par

bya// sha khrag rdo rje dri chen chu dang byang chub sems// ba lang khyi sha la sogs rtag tu bza'// A+oM dang hUM dang AHrnams kyis// de dag rtag tu sbyangs la bza'// de ni rdo rje'i dam tshig mchog/ des ni mchog gi dngos grub thob// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spyod// des ni rdo rje mchog gsum 'thob// gzugs sgra dri ro la sogs pa// de ma thag tu bsten gyur na// dngos grub dam pa myur du 'thob// 'dod pa ma lus kun bsten na// de ni byang chub yang dag 'thob// 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs ni shes byas nas// byang chub sems ni mchod par bya// dam tshig can rnams thams cad kyis// dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas na// mthong ba'i tshe ni 'di nyid la// rdo rje gsum ni 'di yis 'thob// mi shes gti mug can gyis tha tshig 'das// de la dngos grub yang dag 'byung mi 'gyur// mdze dang phol mig 'brum bu dang// rims dang dug dang nad dang bgegs// ye 'drog bka' yi chad pa yis// bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro// de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen pad+ma las kyi rigs// de bzhin sangs rgyas byang chub dang// 'phags pa rnams kyis skyob mi mdzad// byin gyis kyang ni mi brlab ste// rang bzhin 'phags pa thams cad la// rin chen phreng ba la sogs dang// me tog bdug spos la sogs rnams// phul yang rgyal bas ga la bzhes// 'jig rten 'dir yang tshe thung zhing// tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal dag myong nas// gnad gcod sdug bsngal mi bzad myong nas ni// pha rol du yang dmyal bar 'gro// tha tshig spyod pa nyams pa yi// mi shes byis pas dngos grub mi thob bo// gal te dam tshig sdom pa ma nyams na// dug lnga nyid kyang ye shes lnga// mtshan dang dpe byad bltas mi ngoms// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// de yi 'khor na gnas rnams kyis// de la rtag tu skyob par byed// mthong yul tshe la bde ba dang// rdo rje gsum nyid rtag tu 'thob// tha tshig sdom dang mi sdom dang// bsrung dang mi bsrung phyogs med par// mnyam nyid sdom par gang gnas par// mnyam pa chen po'i dam tshig ste// nam mkha' lta bur mngon shes na// de ni yang dag dam tshig ste// blta ba'i rnam dag dam tshig mchog/ dag pa zhi ba gang bsrung ba// rnam dag dam tshig chen po yin// yang dag chos dbyings zab mo la// bsrung dang mi bsrung ga la yod// bsrung med nam mkha' lhar shes na// de ni yang dag gsang ba'i dam tshig go/ de ltar bsrung ba zab mo'i don// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis// smra ba'i

dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs brnyan gyi rtog pa bgyi ba dang/ 'gro ba'i don du chos tshul bsgrub cing bsnyen pa ji ltar lags// smra ba'i dam pas bka' stsal pa// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen dang// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// de bzhin rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i gnas// dgon pa chu gling gnas rnams dang// nags tshal chen po'i sa phyogs dang// dben pa chen po'i gnas rnams dang// ri bo ri sul gnas rnams su// yon tan phrin las gang bsgrub rnams// rtag tu bsgrubs na dngos grub thob// mchog dang thun mong rnam gsum 'thob// dkyil 'khor dam pa'i sa bslang ba// bde gshegs rgyal bzhugs pa yi sa slong na// dgongs shig thub dbang rgyal ba'i sras// mkha' 'am bar snang sa steng 'khod pa yis// bdag por gyur pa thams cad kun// yang dag grub pa'i sa slong na// 'khor bcas khyed las sa 'di blang// yo byad sna tshogs sa la 'khod la sbyin// skyob pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// sa non pha rol phyin pa'i chos// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das gyur la/ yum gyur khyod kyi dpang mdzod cig/ sa yi skyon rnams bsal nas kyang// rin chen sna lngas gter du bya// maN+Dal kun tu gru bzhi la// bdud rtsi rnam lngas skyang nul bya// de nas srad bu'i sbyor ba ste// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa la// dpa' mor byin brlabs mkhal du gzhug/ zhing chen ris kyi rtsa rgyus la// sum sgril 'jur mdud med pa ni// ma d+hal 'khor khyud tshad du bya// mkhas pas rdo rje gsum du byin gyis brlabs// de nas srad bu gdab pa'i mtshams bcad de// so so rnams su gdab par bya// de nas dam rdzas bdud rtsi yis// zhing chen ris kyi thig ler bya// dbus kyi pho brang dgu pa la// phyogs bzhi dbus la yab yum bcu// phyogs mtshams bzhi la gsang ba'i yum// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// de ltar bcu drug dgod par bya// gru chad la ni lha mo brgyad// 'khor sa la ni sgo gdod bya// sgo bzhi la ni phyag brgya bzhi// de yi khyams ni phyi ma la// sprul sku thub drug dgod par bya// de yi bar khyams phyi ma la// sgo gdong phrin las rnam bzhi'i phyag rgya dgod// de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la// 'od zer sna lnga kun tu gzigs// sangs rgyas rdo rje can gyi gnas// de dbus b+h+rUM ni gnas pa las// gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhal med khang// 'khor lo bsgyur bas bsgom par bya// las kyi rdo rje'i stan nyid du// shes rab ldan pas de 'og bsam// chos kyi dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bde gshegs kun gyi pho brang ngo// rin chen gzhi dngos mchod rten ni// 'od zer 'bar bas rnam

par brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi// gnas su de ni rnam par bsam// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo rgyan bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dril bu dar 'phyang 'phan la sogs// sgo khyud kyis ni rnam par brgyan// grwa mtshan dag ni thams cad ni// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// zla kham chun 'phyang gis brgyan cing// nyi ma zla ba la sogs brgyan// bla re bres pas mdzes par gyur// na bza' phreng ba'i tshogs kyis brgyan// de ltar dkyil 'khor dam pa yis// mi shes byis pa rnams la bstan// chos nyid ye nas lhun grub pas// bsgrub dang sgrub pa dmigs su med// dbyings nyid ye nas dag gnas la// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen gdags su med// dper na med las yod btags pa// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra// chos nyid rnam dag ye gnas la// gnas dang dgon par gnas pa med// dper na nam mkha' stong pa la// gnas rten sa phyogs med pa la// gang dag byis pa mi mkhas pas// mkha' la myu gu+u sdong skyed 'dra// de dag yod par mi 'gyur ro// ye nas chos nyid rdzogs pa la// phrin las rnam bzhis sbyang bsgrub med// sa rnams ye nas lhun grub la// cho ga rnams kyis sbyang mi dgos// chos nyid dkyil 'khor gsang ba dam pa bkram pa la// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor dmigs su med// stong nyid rang bzhin dag pa chos kyi sku// lhun grub rdzogs mdzad longs spyod chen po'i sku// 'gro ba'i don mdzad mtha' yas sprul pa'i sku// de bzhin lhun grub sku rnams la// gzhi dang ngo bo mthun pa'i dpe// gnas dang 'khor dang 'dul ba'i zhing// sku gsum gsung ni bsgrags pa ni// chos sku chen po bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen po yin// longs spyod che ba'i rdo rje can gyi bsdus gsum yin// sprul pa chen pos 'dul ba mngon pa mdo sde gsungs pa dang// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang shAkya rigs dbang po// thugs gsum mnyam nyid ngang du zhi// chos sku'i don rnams bstan pa ni// gzhi ni de bzhin nyid dang mtshan nyid brjod du med// mthun dpe nam mkha' gnas ni yum gyi mkha'// gdul zhing nam mkha' khyab pa 'khor ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i don rnams bstan pa ni// gzhi ni chos sku ngo bo rnam snang mdzad// mthun dpe 'khor los sgyur ltar bzhugs// gnas ni lha yi rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas// 'khor ni nye ba'i sras brgyad sa rnams rim gnon yin// gdul gzhi gzhi dang me tog snying po can// sprul pa'i sku yi don rnams bstan pa ni// gzhi ni longs spyod rdzogs dang shAkya'i rigs dbang po// mthun dpe sgyu ma'i tshul dang gnas ni rdo rje gdan sogs yin// 'khor ni rgyal ba kun dang 'gro

drug thams cad do// gdul zhing gling rnams bye ba phrag brgya yin// sku dgu theg dgu bstan kyang 'gro ba'i don bstan ma rtogs pa// theg pa de kun yang dag theg las gzhan na yod ma yin// de bas chos kun rnam dag theg pa gcig rdzogs so// 'das pa'i dus rnams su dran de ni sangs rgyas gnas pa yin// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab bskal pa na// de'i tshe rgyal bu byung ba skye rgu'i bu yi mchog/ mtshan ni ye shes bdag po zhes bya ba// skye rgu 'dren pa des ni chos bstan te// sems can bya ba mtha' yas ma lus 'dul// byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas bye ba grangs med kun// yang dag ye shes yang dag 'dzud// 'jig rten mgon po de yis chos bshad pas// mtha' yas nges par bstan pa gsang sngags mchog/ rab tu snang bas 'jig rten thams cad mdzes// sems can rnams kyis yang dag don yang ston// de ltar de na rin chen zhing// de bzhin kha dog bai DUr+ya yi mdog/ sangs rgyas rang byung de dag nyid kyang snang// gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur blta na mdzes// bai DUr+ya yi dbus na gser gzugs bzhin// 'khor gyi dbus na ches ni rab tu gsungs// de la 'khor yang grangs yod ma yin te// bskyod pa med cing g.yo ba med par snang// bzod gnas bsam gtan dga' zhing mnyam par bzhag/ yang dag zhi ba zag pa med pa'i gnas// rgyal ba drang srong chen po rnyed par dka'// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ sku gsung thugs lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol te// rdo rje dam tshig rin chen cod pan dbang bskur bas// ye shes ldan pa rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya mnyam nyid thugs chud sna tshogs mdzad pa de// ma lus sems can yongs su bskang ba'i phrin mdzad thugs rje can// rnam par snang mdzad chen po las gsum mnyam nyid la bzhugs pa// sku gsung thugs dang thams cad ma lus rdo rje ste// bde gshegs lha yi rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas// khams gsum thams cad ma lus yid bzhin rin chen spras pa dang// dar gyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dril brgyus rlung gis bskyod pa dang// me tog phreng ba rnga yab rgyan phreng dang// chun 'phyang zla ba nyi ma sbrul chun rnams kyis mdzes byas dang// mtha' dbus med pa'i gnas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs// yon tan ldan pa'i sras dang thabs gcig ste// de ltar yon tan ldan la bdag phyag 'tshal// longs spyod rdzogs sku yid bzhin rin po che// sa bcu'i rgyal sras chos kyis tshim mdzad

cing// 'jig rten mun rum 'od kyis snang mdzad pa// snang mdzad dag pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan sku mchog dbu gsum gser mdog brjid pa'i zhal// 'og min chos rgyal blon por mnga' brnyes pa// log lta thams cad 'jigs pa'i sku// ri rab lta bur brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha rus gsol mdzad cing// gnyis med don la sbyor bas khams gsum sgrol// shin tu brjid pas dur khrod rgyan dgu sku la mnabs// 'khor bar mi ldog dpal gyi chas brgyad sku la brgyan// chos sku mi 'gyur mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku// ye shes ting 'dzin zin pas mche ba gtsigs// dug lnga gtan du bsreg pas me yi klong na bzhugs// ting 'dzin 'du 'phro mdzad pas chos nyid sna tshogs mdzad// spyan gsum sdang mig bgrad pas ngan song brtsad nas bcad// dbu rnams sku lus gcig pas chos kyi dbyings// yum dang gnyis su med pas rnam dag don// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// a la la ho zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ye shes can gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa mtha' dag kun gyi mchog/ khams gsum ma lus mtha' dag 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal// sems can ma lus 'dul ba'i don rnams thams cad 'grub// dam tshig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni g.yogs byas te// yang dag rnam grol don dam 'dis ston te// lag g.yon rdo rje bsgyings te bzhin ni rab 'dzum pas// rdo rje chen po gsor te rang gi snying gar gtod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin// bde chen don dam rdo rje dam tshig kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so// hUM bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis// zhi ba'i de nyid mngon rdzogs byang chub bsgrub par bshad// rdo rje mnyam nyid mngon rdzogs byang chub chen po ste// don gyi ngo bo mi rtog mnyam nyid rnam dag zhi// mnyam nyid snying po 'di smras yi ge a// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spros med pas// chos rnams thams cad yi ge a ru rig/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya rdo rje can// 'jig rten dri med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// nyon mongs skyon gyi ma gos don dam 'di smras hrIH// khams gsum dbang bskur snying po'i don// nyid la rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur phreng ba bcings shing dam pa 'di smras trA/ sku yi phyag rgyas dbang bskur chos kyi sku// gsung gi phyag rgyas dbang bskur chos kun thob pa dag/ thugs kyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ting 'dzin dag pa thob// rdo rje gsum gyi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa// lus sems ngag ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// de phyir chos nyid zab mo a ru 'dus// thams cad spros

med yi ge a// ngo bo'i chos nyid stong pa'i yi ge a// mtshan med smon med chos nyid yi ge a// rdo rje mi shigs dngos grub yi ge a// rdo rje mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor yi ge a// don nyid mnyam 'jug chos nyid yi ge a// a ni ma skyes stong pa ste// a ni chos sku dag pa'i gter// a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin// hUM gis mchod pa thams cad longs spyod rdzogs// oM ni ye shes lnga yi dngos// sku gsung yon tan phrin las sogs// hUM hUM hUM sems can rdo rje nyid pas khro bo'i ngang// ye shes lnga yang rdo rje khro bo can// hUM gsum rnam dag zhi ba las// dkyil 'khor rnam dag 'byung ba yi// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// bar khyams bzhis mdzes sgo khyud ldan// gru chad bzhis kyang mdzes par bya// dbus la b+hud+d+ha yab yum ste// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rgyas par dgod// dkyil 'khor rgyan rnams rgyas 'gyur nas// bsgrub pa de bzhin brtsam par bya// bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams bsags pa ni// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag brgyad// a ga ru dang du ru ka/ ga bur gur gum la sogs te// sman rnams rgyas par bsogs te sbyang// ting nge 'dzin rnams rim gyis bskyed par bya// gal te rtags ma byung na spog pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// de ltar gzhung bzhin bsgrub pa brtsams nas kyang// de ltar don nyid rdo rje yang dag thob pa ni// de ni rdo rje can de legs so legs// cho ga 'di ni legs par smras// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dus pa'i mchog/ rdo rje can du byin gyis rlobs// cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// de dag mi sod mi tshugs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod// rnam par snang mdzad gsang ba'i chos nyid rab brnyes pa// spros med bde ba dam tshig rdo rje mnyam nyid chos// mtha' dbus med pa dam pa rdo rje ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang stong pas gti mug ste// bdud dang khams gsum las 'das dbang phyug chen po'i mchog/ de dag don rnams ji lta bu// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// chos nyid rnam dag thabs chen dang// ye shes gnas su bsgrags pas ni// chos kun rnam par dag par nus// 'khor la yongs su dag par 'gyur// chags pa la sogs

bsal bas na// 'khor ba'i bar du dag par yang// 'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir// 'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'dul// ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar yang// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// de bzhin gnas kyi nyes pa yis// 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ bde ba che zhing nor che la// khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas ni// sems can don rnams bstan par byed// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ bsgrub pa gsang ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// gsang sngags kyi don ji lta bu lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// yang dag gsang ba'i don chen 'di// rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul ba dang// mtshams gcad gnas par bya ba dang// cho ga rnam gsum bskyed pa dang// 'gro ba'i sgrib pa sbyang ba dang// sku gsung thugs ni rtogs bya dang// dkyil 'khor lha rnams brtan bzhugs phyir// dam pa 'di dag bshad pa yin// oM ni rgyal ba'i sku yi mchog/ hUM ni rgyal ba'i thugs kyang yin// swA ni rgyal ba'i yon tan gter// AHni rgyal ba'i gsung sgra ste// hA ni rgyal ba'i phrin las so// thams cad de bzhin gshegs bya'i phyir// sngags kyi dam pa 'di brjod do// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ A+oM A/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha na/ ka kha ga g+ha// tsa tsha dza dz+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha/ wa ya ra la/ nga nya ma A+o/ sha Sha sa ha/ i I/ u U/ e A+e/ A+oM ak+Sha/ hUM badzra d+h+r-Ika dza/ muM d+hA twI \u0f84shwa \u0f84ri/ oM dze na dzika dza/ laM dwe Sha ra ti/ swA rat+na d+h-ika dza// maM mo ha ra ti/ AM A ro lika dza/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika dza/ tAM badzra ra ti/ k+ShiM hi rA dzA ya hUM/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wAM/ trAM A gar+b+hA ya/ trAM mA le sa ma ya ho/ hriM haM hUM pad+ma pA da ma/ hrIHgI ti rA go\u0f85haM/ dziM ku ru pA Na hrIH/ aM nirti rA ga yA mi/ mai d+hA ra Ne/ dzaHd+hU pe pra be sha/ th+l+hiM nis+sa ri b+hA ya swA hA/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha/ hUM sa rA dzA ya/ baM dI pa su gi rI/ muM shrI aM rA gA ya swA hA/ ho gan+d+he tsit+ta/ A+oM mu ni krIM swA hA/ A+oM mu ni hUM truM swA hA/ A+oM mu ni sruM swA hA/ A+oM mu ni praM swA hA/ A+oM mu ni k+ShaM swA hA/ A+oM mu na ye swA hA/ hUM ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ A+oM badzra d+ha ri ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM big+h+nAM takr-i ta phaT/ A+oM rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM A+oM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ A+oM pad+ma d+ha ra kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM pradz+nyAn+ta kri ta phaT/ A+oM karmA d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta hUM/ a a badzra sa man+ta b+ha drA a/ rgyal ba rnams kyis gzungs brjod pas// bde dang ldan pa yang dag rdzogs// rdzogs par bya ba sngags kyis bskyed// sngags kyi sa bon gang yin pa// yi ge a la bsgyur nas

kyang// lha rnams rim par bskyed pa ni// til 'bru tsam gyi rang bzhin las// je che je cher bskyed nas kyang// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che// bsgoms pas mngon du gyur pa'i lha// che ba'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad mngon shes ldan// 'jig rten 'phangs dang bteg pa dang// cho 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa dang// rigs rnams so sor bsgrag pa dang// de ltar lha yi skur gyur nas// rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yin// de ltar a nyid stong pa la// dngos por 'dzin pa 'khrul ba yin// dngos po ji ltar stong zhe na// a nyid ma skyes zhi ba ste// a las yig 'bru thams cad bskyed// a ltar yig 'bru thams cad de// yig 'bru stong pas lha yi sku bskyed stong// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rang bzhin stong// dper na nam mkha' stong pa la// med pas yod par brtags pa bzhin// chos nyid rang bzhin stong pa la// mtshan ma'i dngos por skur bstan pa// mkha' la 'ja' tshon 'byung ba 'dra// de ltar chos nyid dngos med yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ gsang sngags kyi le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag ji ltar lags// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// ting 'dzin rnam pa 'byung ba ni// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang// chos nyid yang dag ting 'dzin dang// rang bzhin gyis gnas ting 'dzin dang// gnas pa'i rang bzhin ting 'dzin dang// btsal dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin dang// brjod dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin dang// sems kyi chos nyid las kyi mi 'khor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// btsal sems ma bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// bdag nyid chen po'i ting 'dzin dang// 'gro don chos dbyings ting nge 'dzin dang// gzungs don chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang// yongs rdzogs byar med ting nge 'dzin dang// chags dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// bya med snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang// smon lam stobs med ting nge 'dzin dang// lung ston rnam dag ting nge 'dzin dang// dbang bsgyur mi rtsol ting nge 'dzin dang// dngos grub mi spang ting nge 'dzin dang// rnam grangs lhun grub ting nge 'dzin dang// brjod pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang// chos nyid mi 'gyur ting 'dzin dang// rgyu rkyen mi 'grub ting 'dzin dang// phyi nang dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang// spyod pa bkag pa'i ting 'dzin dang// rang bzhin yang dag ting 'dzin dang// chos rnams don gyi ting 'dzin dang// chos nyid zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i ting 'dzin dang// las

kun spyod med ting 'dzin dang// chags sdang zhi ba'i ting 'dzin dang// chos nyid mtshon med ting 'dzin dang// mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin dang// rnam rtog zhi bya'i ting 'dzin dang// byang chub ma nor ting 'dzin dang// rnam grangs chos kun mdor bsdus ting 'dzin dang// ye shes dag sgom ting 'dzin dang// stong dang mtshan ma mi dmigs ting 'dzin dang// dam tshig rnam dag ting 'dzin dang// dkyil 'khor lhun grub ting 'dzin dang// bsgrub mchog gsang ba'i ting 'dzin dang// gsang sngags brjod pa'i tinga'adzin dang// phyag rgya chen po'i ting 'dzin dang// dbang rnams skur ba'i ting 'dzin dang// phrin las rnam bzhi'i ting 'dzin dang// yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dang// stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang// rdo rje mi phyed ting 'dzin dang// skyes bu chen po'i ting 'dzin dang// nga gang las rgyal ting 'dzin dang// rtogs pa chen po'i ting 'dzin dang// ro langs sgrub pa'i ting 'dzin dang// cho 'phrul sgrub pa'i ting 'dzin dang// rigs rnams sgrub pa'i ting 'dzin dang// blo gros chen po'i ting 'dzin dang// sa rnams non pa'i ting 'dzin dang// pha rol zil gnon ting 'dzin dang// nyon mongs sreg pa'i ting 'dzin dang/ ye shes snang ba'i ting 'dzin dang// sgron ma snang ba'i ting 'dzin dang// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin dang// bdud rnams gcod pa'i ting 'dzin dang// dug gsum rnam dag ting 'dzin dang/ lus ngag yid gsum ting 'dzin dang// bder gshegs rgyal ba'i ting 'dzin dang// ting 'dzin rnam pa mang po kun// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// chos nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud chen las// ting 'dzin rnam pa mang po'i don// chos nyid ting 'dzin yin pa'i phyir// rnam pa kun la de dag ste// ting 'dzin brjod pa mang po kun// rnam rtog gsal ba bstan pa yin// chos nyid la ni rnam rtog ting 'dzin med// de phyir ting 'dzin bsngags pa med// ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi sems lung chen po'i mdo las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis so//// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa rnams kyis/ sems dpa' dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha bskyed phyag rgya bsgyur dang lha mchod pa// 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje dang// rin po che dang pad+ma dang// rdo rje rgya gram la sogs kyis// phyag rgya ji ltar yin par bsgyur// zhes gsol pa dang// sems dpa' dam pas bka' stsal pa// rgyal ba'i lha rnams bskyed pa ni// mi dmigs dbyings nas yig 'bru gsal ba yi// a la sogs pa'i yig 'bru kun// rgyal ba'i sa bon spros shing bskyed// e ma ho rgyal ba'i sku rnams bskyed pa ni// phung po khams dang skye mched las// yig 'bru sngags

tshig spros bsdus pas// rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi rkyen// rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa ni// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas kyang// gang yin pa yi ting 'dzin bsam// bde ba'i sems de rnam spros pas// sprul skus thams cad khyab pa bzhin// sems de bkug nas phar zhugs las// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su spro// rang sngags yi ge bskyed pa rnams// sku gsum sa bon byin brlabs te// pad+ma'i dbus su bskyed
