nges// de bas dbang rnams thob 'dod pas// dang ma chos 'di bshad par bya'o// de la dbang bskur zhing thob 'dod pas/ rang la dbang bskur ba'i slob ma'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu la dbang bskur ba dang/ dbang gi slob dpon ji lta bu la dbang nod pa dang/ dbang gi yul gang gis bya ba dang/ dbang gi rgyal thebs dang karma tshul ji lta bu la bya ba dang/ dbang gi rdzas ci dgos pa dang/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor ci ltar bri ba dang/ dbang gi yon ci ltar dbul ba dang/ dbang gi bsnyen bsgrub zhag grangs dur gsungs pa dang/ dbang gi rtags ci sbyin pa dang/ dbang bskur ba'i dus tshod gang la bskur ba dang/ dbang bskur ba'i dgos pa dang bcu gcig gis bstan dgos te/ de la dbang bskur ba'i slob ma'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu la dbang bskur bar bya ba ni/ dang por slob dpon gyis btsal bar bya ste/ gsungs pa'i thig las/ rang bzhin bzang bas

nam mkha' 'dra// spyod pa bzang po sa gzhi 'dra// dam tshig 'jigs med mkha' ltar bsrungs// lta ba bcos pa med par 'chang// sku gsung thugs kyis srad med pa// phongs med yon gyis sna 'dren cing// phyi nang tan tra mtha' dag la// thos shing shes pa gdeng gyur pa// 'khu ldog med pa'i rnal 'byor la// dbang mchog ci yod bskur bar bya// dbang bskur ba yi rim pa ni// yon dang sbyar te bskur na'ang rung// yang na dbang bskur rim pa ni// phyi nang tan+t+ra mtha' dag la// thos zhing goms pa gtsor gyur na// de la bshad pa'i dbang bskur ro// shes shing zin rung ma zin rung// gsang sngags rgyud kun nyan 'dod na// de la nyan pa'i dbang rnams bskur// rnal 'byor gsung mchog dgos pa'i don// 'dzab bzlas mngon la don dka' na// de la bsgom pa'i dbang rnams bskur// 'du 'dzis mi g.yengs dben la dga'// yi dam lha la rtag gnas na// de la'ang sgom pa'i dbang rnams bskur// las dang mchod pa gzhung bsrang zhing// ma nor shes rab don 'chang la// de la karma'i dbang rnams bskur// bsam rgyud dag pa'i blo 'chang ba// de la gong gi dbang rnams bskur// rnam par rtog pa med pa la// de la 'dzin med dbang rnams bskur// nyon mongs gcod pa'i tshul shes na// de la sgrol ging dbang rnams bskur// phung po ye shes gsal stobs la// de la stob ging dbang bskur ro// brtse gdung bral ba'i shugs 'chang la// lu gu rgyud du dbang bskur ro// shes rab mtshan ldan mig dkyus ring// so dkar de bzhin thags dam dang// dpral ba'i dbyas mig dkar nag phyed// smra ba mi mang khong yang gsal// mthon mthing lcang lo yid tsam 'khyil// ha cang mi ring mi thung ba// ha cang mi sbom mi phra ba// lhu ran sor mo rnams kyang ring// gsang thub khod dam spyod gsal bar// shes rab yum du dbang bskur ro// gzhan yang mtshan ldan dag pa dag/ de dbyibs gzugs su dbang bskur ro// shes rab rgya cher blo gsal zhing// cis kyang mi 'khrugs dpa' sems can// nges pa'i gzhung gsol dbang thob par// rdo rje karmar dbang bskur ro// che ba'i yon tan gdeng gyur cing// sngon chad rtags dang mtshan phyin par// dkyil 'khor gzung bar dbang bskur ro// dbang mi bskur ba'i rim pa ni// sngags pa dam tshig nyams pa dang// gzungs ma 'phyar sham ta ra sogs// de bI mtshan med hag bros can// rdo rje spun grogs khong 'gras can// rdo rje bla ma gzhung nyams pa// dkyil 'khor bdag po rtogs med dang// rgyal thebs shes rab 'thibs pa dang// karma rtog pa che ba la/ dbang rnams gang yang mi bskur ro// gzhan yang dbang rnams mi bskur ba// rim (10)

par yang dag bshad par bya'o// dang por chos la nyams yod dang// bar du slob dpon brnyas byed dang// tha mar sdug la sun 'byin pa// bskal pa brgyar yang dbang mi bskur// dad med g.yo sgyu zol gyis bslu// bka' 'gal grogs po thabs kyi smod// rang shes byed 'dod thos pa chung// theg pa chen por ltung byed pas// de la dbang rnams mi bskur te// de rnams dus gsum dag tu yang// dbang gi dkyil 'khor la mi bsnyen// bskur yang slar la nyams pas non// gzhan yang dbang rnams mi bskur ba// spyod pa zab mo dbang la g.yengs// phrin las zab mo khrom du sgrogs// gsang ba'i rdzas rnams mngon par ston// 'di la dbang rnams yongs mi bskur// bskur yang nyams pa chen por 'gyur// gzhung du 'gro ba'i chos bor nas// 'og ma'i chos la blo 'jug cing// theg pa che la 'phyas 'dogs pa// de la dbang rnams yongs mi bskur// bskur yang gsang sngags bka' sun 'byin// de yi sdig kyang bdag la 'ong// de ni dbang gi slob ma yi// mtshan nyid yin pas shes par bya'o// dbang gi slob dpon ji lta bu la dbang nod par bstan pa yang gsungs pa// sngags pa rnal 'byor blo yod pa// dbang thob pa yi rtags dag ni// rgyud 'di yongs su 'chad cing ston// dbang rtags phyag rgya 'di 'dzin cing// rim pas dbang bskur thob pa dang// rigs kyi btsun rgyud mkhas rgyud dang// rdo rje zam pa ma chad legs// de dag rnams dang ma ldan kyang// rgyud 'di 'chad pa gang byed pa// rigs dang sde chen gang yin yang// de ni dbang nod slob dpon yin// gzhan yang dbang nod slob dpon ni// shes rab yangs pas chos rnams ston// lta ba yangs pas phyogs dang bral// spyod pa ma 'gags thabs su spyod// sgom pa sran che 'gyur ba med// dam tshig gang yang ma nyams pa// de ni dbang nod slob dpon yin// gzhan yang dbang nod slob dpon ni// phyi nang tan+t+ra kun gsal zhing// byin che snga mar dbang thob dang// dkyil 'khor sgrub pa zhal phye zhing// las dang cho ga gzhung rdzogs la// bsngags pas dbang rnams nod par bya// gzhan yang slob dpon mtshan nyid ni// bde bar gnas shing gcam mi byed// ci skad gsungs pa de bzhin mdzad// rdzun dang zol gyi tshig spangs pa// byin rlabs ya mtshan chen po can// de la dbang rnams nod par bya// gzhan yang slob dpon mtshan nyid ni// lung dang man ngag thugs la 'chang// rgyud dang bsgrub pa rim pas 'thob// zhang blon bu tshar gyur pa na// sngon nas thabs dang yid tshang thob// phal pa gang dag su yin yang// mtshan rdzogs kun la lung rdzogs shing// rig pa tshad ma'i gzhung yod na// rigs ni gang zhig yin

yang rung// de la dbang rnams nod par gsungs// dbang rnams nod par mi bya ba'i// slob dpon mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni// khro gtum che la 'jigs 'dod dang// rang bzhin ngan la bcos dka' dang// mtshan nyid ngang tshul mi shis dang// phrag dog la sogs sems la 'chang// sems ni chos kyis ma dul pa// chos re thos shing kho bor skye// spro thung tshig gi go mi 'jigs// de 'dra'i slob dpon mtshan nyid la// dbang rnams nod par mi bya ste// mnos kyang dbang thob mi 'gyur te// slar la nyams pa chen por 'gyur// gzhan yang slob dpon mtshan nyid ni// shes pa sgo dogs thos pa chung// nga rgyal kha 'dor khengs pa dang// rab tu tshul ngan khengs pas bcings// sgom bsgrub dza gad dbang du btang// de 'dra dbang gi slob dpon min// de la dbang gi rgyu mnos kyang// rnal 'byor yo yis dpyas ka la// slob dpon ngan pa khad kyis spang// slob ma ngan pa drag pos spang// 'di dag spang bar nges par gsungs// 'di dag ma spangs skyon rnams ni// lta spyod mthun par ma gyur pas// gang du'ang nyams par 'gyur bar nges// dran pa bka' rtags gzhung 'dzin pa// de la phyi dbang bskur bar bya// skye med chos la blo zhugs pa// de la nang dbang bskur bar bya// byang chub sems la mngon dad cing// dam rdzas rnams la rtog pa med// de bI mtshan ldan rtag bsten la// de la gsang ba'i dbang rnams bskur// tan+t+ra mtha' dag blo la gsal// phrin las bsgrub pa mthar phyin pa// rdo rje rgyal po chen po yi// rab 'byams bka' yi dbang bskur ro// lung dang man ngag nges pa'i don// snying dang 'dra ba kun bshad la// thos shing rtogs par gyur nas kyang// bla ma dag la mnyes byed pa// de lta bu yi slob ma la// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang bskur ro// 'byor pa'i longs spyod kun ldan zhing// yongs la phan 'dogs nus pa la// rig 'dzin tshe yi dbang bskur ro// rdzas dang yan lag ma nyams par// 'dzab bzlas sran tshe dpa' brtul can// don dang ldan pa drag shul spyod// dpa' brtul ldan pa'i gang zag la// bstan pa bsrung bar dbang bskur ro// dbang gi yul gang gis bya ba yang gsungs pa// khrel dang gtsug lag cher ldan zhing/ tshul dgur shis pa'i yum mchog de// btsal te rnyed par 'gyur nas ni// lag pa g.yas nas bzung nas kyang// bla ma la ni 'di skad dbul// e ma ho rnal 'byor yongs kyi lha// rdo rje sku yi gzugs 'chang ba// thabs kyis che thob rgyal po'i tshul// thams cad ma spangs nyid kyi rgyal// longs spyod chen po thams cad la// chos nyid rgyan gyis spyod mdzad de// gnyis med yum chen 'di bzhes la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byang chub

sems kyi dbang rnams dang// pad+ma rak+ta'i dngos grub rnams// rnal 'byor bdag la stsal du gsol// a la la ho// zhes brjod la phyag tu dbul lo// de nas dbang nod pa bdag gi yum ci lta bu btsal dgos pa gsungs pa// lta spyod yid mthun bsam pa gcig/ brtse ba'i shugs 'chang gsal ba'i grogs// mtshan ldan mi mo yid 'ong ma// dbyibs legs ran cing mdzes pa la// rgyan rnams ci yod pas brgyan nas// lus ngag yid gsum khrus byas te// phyi nang dri ma dag byas nas// dri zhim spos kyis lus byugs te// mdzes ldan dar gyi lhab lhub kyis// yid du 'ong bar brgyan nas kyang// thogs chags med par chags byas la// gsang ba'i rje ru gzhag par bya// yang na dbang nod gzungs ma ni// so so'i dbang rnams gang nod pa// rigs dang mthun par sbyar bar bya'o// de yi yon tan mtshan nyid gang// so so'i rigs la shes par bya// dbang gi rgyal thebs dang karma'i tshul ji lta bu'i bya ba'i don la/ yang gsungs pa// thogs chags med pa'i blo ldan zhing// sde snod chos la rnam grol bas// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i lung dag las// gang dag shes rab shin tu grol// rnam par dag pa'i slob dag gis// thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs grol bas// sngon chad slob dpon mkhas pa yis// rdo rje rgyal thabs dbang bskur nas// gzhung dang mthun pa'i dbang thob ste// rdo rje rgyal thebs yin zhes grags// de ni dbang gi rgyal thebs su// nges par btsal ba gzhung las 'byung// gal te de dag ma rnyed na// bdag gi bla mas ci mkhyen pa// de yis mkhyen pa dag yod na// de yang dbang gi rgyal thebs bya// gzhan yang dbang gi rgyal thebs ni// bla ma de la sras yod pa// yon tan bla ma dang 'dra ba// de dag yod na rab tu legs// gzhan yang bla ma slob dpon gyis// rgyal thebs zhal chab gang stsal ba// de la dbang gi rgyal thebs bya/ tshul ni de dang mi ldan zhing// yon tan de rnams yongs med na// gzhan gyi yon tan kun tshang yang// dbang gi rgyal thebs mi bya zhes// nges par nga yis yang dag bshad// bdag dang bla ma'i gzungs ma rnams// tshul dang yon tan de rnams dang// ldan par gyur na su yang rung// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang// rigs ngan gdol pa'i phyag rgya mo// yon tan de ldan gang yang rung// tshul dgur sbyor na dbang thob cing// dngos grub rtags kyis dam pa 'grub// gzhung gi rtags dang mtshan med na// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs gang yang rung// gzhan ma'i yon tan kun tshang yang// dbang gi gzungs mar mi bya zhes// nges par nga yis yang dag bshad// gzhan yang rang gi yum dang gzungs// mchog tu gzhan las ma brlams

shing// srin mo'i mdung shul med pa yi// bu mo gzhon nu shes par bshad// de la dbang rtags dam pa yod// sna dgu dag gi bya ba ni// kun tu bzang po ngas ma bstan// mnyam pa de bI gzhung las med// karma'i mtshan nyid tshul bstan pa// las dang bya ba gzhung bsrang shing// phrin las thogs pa yongs med pa// nges par bla ma'i lung thob pa// sngon chad dbang bskur gnas pa thob// mi 'gal legs par spyod pa'i lung// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam srung ba// dbang gi karma yin zhes bya// gzhan yang dbang gi karma ni// thams cad kun la blo gros zhing// lhag par phrin las don la mkhas// de ni dbang gi karma yin// mnyen zhing des la bka' blo bde// gzhan gyi yid 'ong mthun bzhin byed// nges pa'i tshig smra rdzun spangs shing// rtags las nges pa'i lung thob cing// bka' yi don la nges par rtogs// sngags dang phyag rgya dam du 'dzin// rnam par rtogs pa bral ba des// dbang gi karma bya bar bshad// yon tan de dag ma ldan na// gzhan ma yon tan kun tshang yang// dbang gi karma yongs mi bya// bden pa'i chos med snyan tshig dang// bka' med lung med bde ba med// ras chod gzu lums byed 'dod pas// dbang gi karma bya ba ni// kun tu bzang po ngas ma bshad// nyams par gyur pa'i mtshan mas ni// bskur kyang mi phan 'chi ba'i rgyu// dbang gi rdzas ci dgos pa'i don yang gsungs pa// dbang bskur ba yi rdzas rnams ni// rdzas la grangs ni bsam yas kyang// nges pa'i rdzas ni lnga ru gsungs// khro bo dur khrod rgyan gyi rdzas// rgyal srid dbang gi longs spyod rdzas// bsgrub pa rdzas kyi gzungs ma'i rdzas// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i go rim rdzas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rkyen gyi rdzas// rdzas kyi rnam pa lnga gsungs de// khro bo dur khrod rgyan rdzas ni// ral gri dgra s+t+wagashol la sogs// mda' gzhu gri dang mtshon cha ni// de dag rdzas su yod na legs// gzhan yang che mchog phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje dril bu 'khor lo dang// pad+ma rin chen ral gri dang// rgya gram spu gri la sogs pa// rigs lnga'i khro bo'i phyag mtshan ni// dngos su rdzas su yod na legs// de dag gzugs su ma grub na// ri mo mkhan dang bris mkhan gyis// de dag gzugs brnyan bris la bskur// che mchog khro bo la sogs pa// he ru dgu po thams cad dang// dkyil 'khor lha yi phyag mtshan rnams// dngos su rdzas su yod na legs// med na de bzhin bris la bskur// glang po che yi ko rlon dang// zhing chen g.yang gzhi 'khor ba dang// khyung gi gshog pa me dpung dang// stag gi sham thabs sug sdom dang// thod pa skam rlon phreng ba dang// sbrul nag chun po la sogs pa// de dag ming gi rjes su

dgos// yang zhig rdzas su ma 'byor na// tha na gzugs brnyan bri bar bya'o// dbang bskur ba yi b+han d+ha ni// drag shul las la dga' ba la// khyab 'jug ma yi snod kyis bskur// dum bu gcig pa la sogs pa// rigs dang mthun pa'i b+han d+ha yi// ji ltar bskur 'dod rtags su dpag/ thal chen mtshan ma la sogs te// khro bos mtshan ma'i dur khrod rdzas// de dag dngos su tshogs par bsags// rgyal srid longs spyod rdzas rnams ni// rigs kyi khyad par rnams la sbyar// ci ltar mthun pa'i rdzas rnams bsags// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yis// rdzas su rin chen sna bdun bsags// slob ma sa bdag rgyal po ni// rta dang glang po rol mo'i sgra// dbu rgyan dpung rgyan gdugs la sogs// rgyal po'i ris su gang yod pa// de dag rdzas su bsag par bya// slob ma bram ze rje dang dmangs// khrus mkhan gar mkhan rngon pa la// ci ltar tshogs pa'i rdzas bsags la// bla ma dag gi rkyen du bzhag/ sgrub pa gzungs ma'i rdzas rnams ni// gsum dang lnga dang gang bskyed pa// mtshan ni gong du bstan pa bzhin// rkyen dang ris su tshang bar bya// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ni// dam rdzas bdud rtsi rnam lnga dang// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong// lung las byung ba bzhin du bsags// gzhan yang mda' dang dar sna dang// me long tshon skud rnam lnga dang// kha dog sna lnga'i tshon rtsi dang// rin chen lnga yi bum pa dang// gos dang rgyan dang lham la sogs// de dag ci 'byor dbang bskur ba// rang gi dngos grub gang bsgrub pa// nyams dang sbyar te dngos su bsags// rdzogs sangs rgyas gyi rkyen rdzas ni// rim pas brgyud pa'i slob dpon dang// man ngag phyag len la sogs pa// gang yod pa yi rdzas rnams dang// bla med 'bras bu chags gcod pa// bka' gsang nges pa'i rim pa rnams// bdag la gang gnas yod pa dang// the tshom gang la che ba yis// man ngag yi ge gang yod pa// bla med thag bcad nges bsgrubs pas// de yang bsags pas des dbang nod// rdzas rnams 'di dag gang yod pa// rim pas gzhung bzhin bsags par 'byung// so sor 'chol ba'i rdzas rnams dang// ma nges rnyed tsam rdzas rnams ni// kun tu bzang po ngas ma bshad// dbang gi dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri ba'i don gsungs pa// dkyil 'khor thams cad brtsig pa'i lugs// dang po sa gzhi sbyar byas nas// de dag rtog pa'i gegs bsal te// maN+Dal chag chag kun byas nas// sa la tshig 'di brjod par bya'o// hUM ma chags skye ba med pa yi// chags med yum gyi gzhal yas na// thabs kyi 'phro 'du ye nas rol// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings

nas// byang chub sems su dbang bskur phyir// dbang gi dkyil 'khor brtsig par bya'o// lan gsum dag tu brjod par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor brtsigs nas kyang// dam rjas dag gis chag chag gdab// hUM 'byung ba yum du dbyer med pa'i// thabs kyi phyag rgya sku mchog la// srid gsum yongs la dbang bsgyur phyir// gnyis med sbyor ba'i rang bzhin la// bdud rtsi dam rdzas chag chag gdab// thams cad 'chi med ye shes dbang// yongs la dbang bskur 'di dag byug/ A+oM badzra a mr-i ta maN+Dal hUM// de nas gzungs ma mtshan ldan la// thig skud gtsang ma 'khal du gzhug/ de nas dgongs pa'i gzhung bsrangs la// dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad ma 'grus par// ran par cha bsnyoms thig gdab pau// de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dbus su zla gam gcig pa bri// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad de mthun par// dbang gi zla gam gru bzhi la// tshon gyis kun kyang dmar por bsgyur// de la ling tshe dgu ru bya// zla gam bar la ser po btang// gru chad la ni ljang gu btang// kun gyi phyi rol nag pos bskor// re khA dbyibs kun dkar por drangs// de nas bum bu lnga dang dgu/ gang 'byor sman gyis bkang la bzhag/ dkyil 'khor bla rgyan 'og rgyan dang// slob ma'i rdzas rnams gang yod pa/ de yi rdzas su dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor de yi mtha' ma la// rdo rje'i rwa ba me yis bskor// de yi phyi rim nag po la/ dbang phyug ma yi 'khor rnams bzhag/ mda' dang ral gri me long dang// dar sna'i lhab lhub me tog dang// 'phan dang bla rgyan 'og rgyan dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dar dpyangs dang// me tog chun po la sogs pa// rgyan rnams ci tsam yod pa dgram// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rgyan gyi rdzas// dbang po lnga dang b+han+d+ha dgu/ thod tshal zhing rdzas kun rdzogs pa'i// gzhung dang mthun par rdzogs par dgram// de yang yongs su shes pa na// dbang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// bka' gzhung don gyi don med pa'i// dkyil 'khor bri bar ma gsungs so// dbang gi yon ji lta bu dbul ba yang gsungs pa// dbang bskur gnang ba thob 'dod pa'i// skyes bu gang zag rnal 'byor pas// dang la dbang gi yon dbul te// 'dzam gling rin chen gang ba dang// rta dang glang po dud 'gro'i tshogs// rgyal srid dang ni rang lus dbul// rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// bu dang chung ma spun dang grogs// 'khor dang longs spyod ji yod pa// dbang rnams thob phyir yon du dbul// de dag gang dang ma ldan na// lus kyi phung po 'bangs su dbul// sems kyi dran pa brtse byas la// me

tog kha dog sna tshogs pa// rtswa dang shing las skyes pa ni// gang rnyed pa la dmigs bcas la// bla ma la ni yon du dbul// yon mchog 'di la dbang mchog yod// yon 'bul phangs na dbang yang phangs// gshe brnyas byas na bka' dang 'gal// thug thub byas na gzhung las nyams// yon mchog 'bul bar mi bra na// dbang yang bskur bar mi bya'o zhes// ston pa nyid kyi zhal nas gsungs// de nas dbang gi yon tan ni// shin tu brjod pa las 'das te// man ngag nyid du 'di bsngags so// dbang gi bsnyen bsgrub zhag grangs dur bya bar yang gsungs pa// dbang nod bsnyen bsgrub zhag grangs ni// rab kyis lo gsum bar tu bsgrub// 'bring gis zla ba gsum tsam bya// tha mas zhag gsum bar du ni// dbang gi bsnyen bsgrub dam bcad la// de nas dbang rnams nod par bya// so so'i rim pa gang yin pa// zhag grangs de dag ma tshang bar// ras chod dag tu mi bya zhes// yang nas yang du nan gyis gsungs// de dag bsnyen bsgrub rim pa yin// dbang gi rtags slob ma la ci sbyin gsungs pa// gang dag yid dang 'thad pa yi// snying gi bu dang 'dra ba la// thog mar bdag la slob dpon gyis// dbang rtags phyag rgya gang gnang ba// de nyid slob ma de la sbyin// gzhan yang slob ma dbang nod pa// de yi grangs ni bstan pa ste// dngos grub rtags kyi gzhung thob kyang// lan bdun dbang bskur rtags tshad ni// de nas de la dbang med de// phyin chad bskur bar mi bya'o// de la dbang rtags sbyin pa ni// phrin las lag tu len pa la// rdo rje dril bu'i dbang rtags sbyin// bsgrub pa'i don la lhur len pa// rdzas mchog bzang po'i dbang rtags sbyin// 'chad par 'dod pa'i slob ma la// rgyud kyi gsung rab glegs bam dang// rin po che yi phyag shing dag/ dbang rtags su ni sbyin par bya// gzhan yang dbang gi slob ma yis// yon la chags pa med phul na// rang la dbang rtags ci yod pas// slob ma de la sbyin par bya// gos dang rgyal mtshan lhab lhub rdzas// zang zing rdzas rnams ci yod pa// dbang bskur rtags su sbyin par bya// slob mas yon gyi mchog dbul na// dbang rtags med du mi rung zhes// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang gsungs pa// dbang bskur ba'i dus tshod gang la bskur gsungs pa// dbyar dgun ston dpyid ra ba yi// tshes brgyad gnam stong nya la bskur// de yang ston zla ra ba bzang// dus tshod 'di dag ma yin par// gzhan du bskur bar mi bya'o// bskur yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// dbang bskur dgos pa'i don gsungs pa// dbang bskur ba yi dgos pa ni// phyi nang las rgyud thams cad kyang// dbang bskur nas ni bya dgos la// dbang bskur ba

yi dgos pa ni// sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur zhing// srid pa gsum la mthu dbang che// mkha' 'gro dbang phyug bran du 'khol// 'jig rten dgos pa thams cad 'grub// gzhan yang dbang bskur dgos pa ni// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di yin no// rgyud kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang skur ba'i rgyud las/ dbang gi bye brag gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsol pa/ kye kye/ shin tu ngo mtshar dang ldan pa/ shin tu byin rlabs chen po dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang// dbang bskur ba'i phrin las bdag cag la stsal du gsol/ a la la ho// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ khyed la sogs pa'i dbang gi rim pa 'di yid la zung zhig/ dbang bskur ba'i rim pa nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang dang/ chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang dang/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang dang/ 'bar ba chen po'i dbang dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang dang/ rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang dang/ rdo rje rgyal thebs kyi dbang dang/ karma'i dbang dang/ ging gi dbang dang/ nyan pa'i dbang dang/ bsgrub pa'i dbang dang/ phrin las mthar phyin pa'i dbang dang/ thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang dang/ 'jig rten tshe'i dbang dang/ dngos grub rnam gsum gyi dbang dang/ mthu stobs phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang dang/ 'chad pa'i dbang dang/ de bI gsanga'adi dpyad/ ba yum gyi dbang dang/ rgyan chas rtags kyi dbang dang/ dur khrod chas kyi dbang dang/ longs spyod rdzas kyi dbang dang/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi dbang ste nyi shu rtsa gcig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las/ dbang gi rim pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phrin las thabs kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so// de la dang po rdo rje rgyal por dbang bskur ba ni/ hUM mkha' mnyam dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad kyis// thugs kyi byin rlabs rmad po che// thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang gi mchog/ byin rlabs thabs kyis brtser dgongs te// thabs kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas pa// 'jig rten gsum na med pa yi// sku gsung yon tan bsam mi khyab// thams cad kun la rgyal ba dang// srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur zhing// rdo rje thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis// khams gsum re skong rgyal por shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya A+oM/ wA ka AHtsit+ta hUM/ badzra rA dza ma hA/ g+huh+ye shwa ra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ badzra A+oM/ zhes brjod la/ dkyil

'khor gyi steng du drangs la/ dam rdzas ci yod pas dbang bskur la/ rdo rje slob dpon dang phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor pa yongs kyis kyang rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang che ge mos thob par gyur cig ces brjod la/ bdag nyid kyis kyang rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang bdag che ge mos thob par gyur cig ces brjod la/ phyogs bcur grags pa bskyed la dbang rdzas blang ngo// de nas chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba ni/ hUM rang bzhin dbyer med dkyil 'khor nas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa yi// chos kyi rgyal srid dam pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i yon tan rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ngas sprul pas// rdo rje slob ma che ge khyod// chos kyi rgyal srid ma lus pa// rigs kyi bu mchog thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harmA rA dza tsakra g+hu h+ye shwa ra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes brjod la gong ma bzhin no// de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM bde gshegs thugs kyi sras po dam pa'i mchog/ sngon gyi thugs dam bka' dang mi 'gal zhing// dgongs pa yid bzhin nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// phrin las skyabs mdzad ma rig 'dren mdzad cing// chos nyid don ston kha lo sgyur byed pa// phrin las thabs kyi rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ ma lus 'gro ba yongs kyi re skong ba// ston pa'i sgron ma ma lus kha lo 'dren// shes bya'i mtha' rdzogs yon tan lhun gyis grub// sdug bsngal bskyab mdzad ma rig 'dren mdzad cing// chos nyid don ston kha lo sgyur byed pa// sangs rgyas gdung 'tshob rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ gang yin mngon du gyur pa grub pa'i dbang// dbang mchog ma lus khyod kyis 'thob par shog/ A+oM ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu ru g+hu h+ye shwa ra badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de yang gong ma ltar bsgrags so// de nas 'bar ba chen po'i dbang bskur ba ni// hUM thugs rje thabs mkhas rang byung he ru ka/ khams gsum dbang bsgyur rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gdug pa bsregs mdzad 'bar ba chen po ni// che ba'i che mchog dbang mchog che ba'i sku// rtogs pa thugs rje 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor la// ye shes me 'bar rtogs pa'i 'od 'bar te// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i dbang mchog rab 'bar ba'i// ye shes me dpung 'bar ba chen po'i dbus// gdug pa zil gnon ma rig bsreg mdzad cing// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skem pa'i mes bsregs shing// ma rig sems can thugs rje thabs 'bar ba// kun la med pa'i 'bar ba chen po'i dbang// rigs kyi bu mchog dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+wa la ma he shwa ra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas rim pa gong ma bzhin bya'o// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM rgyal srid longs spyod dpal

dang ldan// 'khor lo rin chen glang chen rin chen bdun// 'dzam bu gling bzhi yongs bskor ba// lha yi rgyal po man chad nas// rgyud drug sems can thams cad la// yongs su skyong ba'i rgyal po ste/ thams cad ma lus 'dren byed pa// sems can kun gyi don byed cing// ma lus yongs la dbang bsgyur ba'i// rgyal thebs go 'phang 'thob par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa ri ku ru ma ha shwa ra g+hu h+ye sa ma yA rat+na tsakra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de yang rim pa bzhin no// de nas rgyal thabs spyi blug gi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM thams cad lhun sdug kun tu bzang po'i rdzas// rang bzhin spros med kun tu bzang mo'i ngang// gnyis med thabs kyi rgyal pos yongs la khyab// thabs kyi rgyal pos yongs la dbang bsgyur te// kun tu bzang po rang byung bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi dbyings la gcig tu bzhugs pa yi// rang rig byang chub sems kyi lha yin te// don dang sems kyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang po dri ma med pa yis// yongs la dbang bsgyur sems kyi rgyal por shar// rang sems rnam dag rtogs pa'i ye shes shar// byang chub snying po bde ba chen po'i ngang// thams cad ma lus lhun grub chos kyi sku// chos rnams thams cad rang gi sems su 'dus// sems kyi rang bzhin ci yang ma yin pa'i// thig le spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin la// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos kun la dbang bsgyur te// chos nyid theg pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa che// ma 'dres cir yang ston pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ 'di dag ma lus myur du rdzogs pa'i phyir// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang mchog 'di bskur bas// yongs kyi dbang phyug thabs kyi rgyal por shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye rA dza sta sha ne shwa ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// de rnams kyang gong ma bzhin no// de nas rdo rje rgyal thebs kyi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM bla med rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang chen gang// nges par brtags pa'i go 'phang gang yin pa// bde gshegs gdung 'dzin dgongs pa yab dang mnyam// thabs kyi phrin las lhun rdzogs nyer bsdogs nas// sdang ba'i phyogs 'dul ma rig 'dren mdzad pa// thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gdug pa shin tu 'dul// snod ldan rnal 'byor 'dul ba'i mched 'dren pa'i// rdo rje rgyal thebs dbang rnams thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye badzra ba li ka g+hu ra ya swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas karma ging gi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM 'gro kun bla med thar pa'i lam ston cing// ngan song gnas spangs thar pa'i phrin las mdzad// thams cad 'dul bas las kyi karmar bskos// phrin las ma lus rdzogs par bya ba dang// mchod pa dus drug gnas su stob pa dang// las dang

bya ba ma lus gzhung bsrang ba'i// karma ging gi dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas ging gi dbang bskur ba ni 'di skad do// hUM thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// gsal ba thabs kyi 'phro 'du las// yang dag snying po rab bstan pa'i// bde ba'i phrin las 'phro 'du yis// 'dzin ging stob ging la sogs pa'i// gdung ba'i thugs rje chen po yis// sems can gnas nas bton pa yis// 'dren pa'i dam pa bla na med// thabs kyi gar thabs bskyod nas kyang// ging gi dbang rnams 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye ka ta ri swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas nyan pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM shes rab rnam gsum dag pa yis// shes pa'i rgyud rnams grol ba'i phyir// bde gshegs bka' yi byin rlabs las// dam pa'i rjes su gang bsgrub pa// gsang chen thugs kyi man ngag dang// theg pa phyi nang mtha' dag kun// rna ba'i dbang pos nyan pa dang// shes rab blo yis 'dzin pa yi// nyan pa'i dbang rnams 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye d+harmA kha ne swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// de nas bsgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM rnal 'byor bde chen sku gsung thugs// sdug bsngal gnas nyid byang chub re bsgrubs pa'i// rdzas nyid ye shes lnga ru lhun grub phyag rgya'i tshogs// rnam shes phung po lha rnams dkyil 'khor rdzogs// skye mched khams rnams sangs rgyas mang po'i lha// bde gshegs thabs kyi 'bras bu gang yin pa// rnal 'byor tshul ldan khyod kyis 'grub par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba yo ga ma hA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas phrin las mthar phyin pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM shes rab thabs kyi rol pa'i phrin las kyis// khams gsum srid gsum mtha' yas pa// thar pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i phyir// zhi rgyas dbang dang dngos grub dang// ta na ga Na'i sbyor sgrol rnams// rnal 'byor dag pa'i phrin las te// las rnams mngon par rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bde ba'i rol pa yi// las kyi dbang mchog gang yin pa// phrin las mthar phyin dbang mchog 'di// gnas 'dir khyod kyis 'thob par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye badzra ba li ka ma hA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba ni// shes rab mtshan ldan ma'i lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung la 'di skad do// hUM skye med chos dbyings rig pa 'byung ba'i yum// mtshan ldan mi mo mchog gi rim pa'i rgyan// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med rol pa las// lhag pa'i byang chub sems las dkyil 'khor spros// 'phags mchog kun mnyes 'bras bu bde sgrub pa// gnyis med bde spyod chos

nyid dag pa'i rgyan// dgyes pa'i ro mchog chos nyid dbang mchog 'di// rnal 'byor slob bu khyod kyis 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye pradz+nyA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas 'jig rten tshe'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM zla gam dmar po rdo rje dbang gi tshe// gzhan gyis mi 'phrog khams gsum kun las rgyal// lha mo dmar mo rdo rje 'chi med tshe// legs pa'i yon tan 'dod pa'i longs spyod rdzas// mi 'gyur 'chi med tshe lo stong phrag dang// rang nyid gang 'dod phung po rdo rje'i tshe// A yuHdmar po yongs su 'gyur med pa// mi 'phrog nges pa'i tshe mchog gang yin pa// yun ring gong nas bsnyen bsgrub bsgrubs pa yis// rdo rje tshe yi dbang mchog gang yin pa// rigs kyi bu mchog 'di dag 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye A yudz+nyA na b+hin+b+hu yu tshe shwa ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas dngos grub rnam pa gsum gyi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rin chen dbyig/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten 'di dag na// tshe dang longs spyod dpal dang gzi byin dang// 'byor pa kun rdzogs bsam kun rdzogs pa yi// rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs che ba sna tshogs pa'i// 'jig rten 'di yi dngos grub thams cad dang// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub gang yin pa// byang chub sa mchog stug pos brgyan pa yis// sangs rgyas sa gsum 'phags pa'i yon tan tshogs// sku dang ye shes bzhi dang pho brang dang// 'phags pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de yi legs pa'i 'bras bu thams cad dang// 'jig rten mtshan ma rdzas kyi dngos grub pa// gnyis med longs spyod bdud rtsi sman la sogs// de dag dngos grub dbang mchog gang yin pa// rigs kyi bu mchog de ring 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye sid+d+hi pha la b+h+rUM swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas mthu stobs phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM khams gsum kun na bla na med pa yi// che btsan gar gyis 'gran gyi do med pa// che ba'i che ba dbang phyug che ba'i lha// zhe sdang thugs rje'i me 'bar khro mchog hUM sgra can// sdang ba'i phyogs 'dul bdud srin 'dul ba'i lha// dbang phyug chen po dpal gyi king ka ra// dregs pa dbang sdud dbang phyug dam la 'dogs// khams gsum tshogs 'joms dregs pa 'joms pa'i mthu// khengs pa kun 'dul khams gsum sgrol ba'i mthu// yongs la dbang bsgyur gang gis mi thub mthu// bdud bgegs tshar gcod bar chad sgrol ba'i mthu// mthu stobs phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang mchog rnams// rdo rje'i slob ma khyod kyis 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye ha na d+ha ha pa tsa swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas 'chad pa'i dbang

bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM sku gsung thugs kyi 'dul ba rnam gsum las// gsung rab rgya mtsho dam chos bdud rtsi'i mdzod// chos kyi char 'bebs 'gro ba'i rgyud 'grol ba// theg pa'i bye brag ma 'dres don ston pa// snod ldan slob ma'i shes pa'i rgyud bkrol nas// chos nyid don rtogs bden pa'i lam 'dzud pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' gsang dam pa yi// dam chos mtha' dag ma lus 'chad pa'i dbang// chos rnams 'chad pa'i dbang rnams 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA b+hu h+ye d+harmA d+hA tu ti swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas rgyan chas rtags kyi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// rigs lnga rin chen dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas// ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dbyer med pa'i// rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye b+hud+d+ha sa twa/ badzra sa twa/ rat+na sa twa/ pad+ma sa twa/ karma sa twa/ swab+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan rin chen snyan cha 'di// gnas pa ma 'gags rin chen snyan cha'i mchog/ sil snyan snyan pa'i dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye rat+na bi ma ling swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan rin chen mgur chu 'di// yon tan mthar phyin mkhyen pa'i skur rdzogs rtags// mgur chu rin chen dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye rat+na ku na swa wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan phreng ba 'di// che ba'i yon tan rgyan rtags rin chen phreng// do shal phreng ba'i dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye na ma ku ta swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan rin chen dpung rgyan 'di// mi 'jigs bzhi la mnga' brnyes dpung rgyan rtags// gser gyi dpung rgyan dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye rat+na byi shwa swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan rin chen phyag gdub 'di// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rtags su bstan// phyag gdub bsil snyan dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye rat+na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan phyag gdub dam pa 'di// stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'i rtags su bstan// phyag gdub bsil snyan dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye rat+na b+hi du swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// hUM chos nyid cir yang snang

ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan dar gyi sham thabs 'di// mkhyen pa'i bye brag ma 'dres gsal ba'i rtags// bas+t+ra sham thabs dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye sa mung+ga te swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// thabs dang shes rab ma chags pad+ma'i gdan// gdan gyi dbang mchog dam pa 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma d+ha ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan rin chen khri rkang 'di/ 'gro ba'i re skong yon tan bzhi yi rtags// rin chen khri rkang dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye rat+na ra tri traM swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan glang chen seng la sogs// mi 'jigs stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dbang dang las// thogs pa med pa'i dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye dz+nyA na d+ha ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// hUM chos nyid cir yang snang ba'i longs spyod rgyan// nang rtags phyir bstan dar dpyangs kha dog gsum// chos kyi rgyal srid klu 'dul phrin las bzhi// dar dpyangs dbang mchog dam pa 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye d+harmA rA dza swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// hUM rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma rin chen dang// ral gri chos kyi sgra sgrogs dril bu dang// chos kyi 'khor lo ye shes lnga dang ldan// dgos 'dod re skong phyag rgya'i phrin las rdzogs// phyag rgya'i dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye tsakra badzra rat+na karma badzrir na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas dur khrod chas brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// ngo la zhag gi tshom bu byas la// hUM he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+haM rgya mtshor bskyil// zhag gi tshom bus mtshan pa yis// 'di yang sngon gyi dam tshig la// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// chos nyid zhag gi tshom bus dbang bskur bas// chos nyid dbyings las rgyal ba dang// gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul ba dang// che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa dang// chos nyid zhag gi dbang 'thob shog/ A+oM nga ta b+hA ga ta a la la ho// de nas khrag gi thig le byas la 'di skad do// hUM he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan drangs te// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgya mtshor bskyil// khrag gi thig les mtshan pa 'di// 'di yang sngon gyi dam tshig la// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// 'dod chags gnas su dag pa

yi// khrag gi thig les dbang bskur bas// gtum khro drag po 'joms pa dang// nga rgyal drag po 'joms mdzad pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa 'thob par shog/ A+oM ma hA rak+ta na ti la ka hUM/ de nas thal chen gyis mtshan ma byas la 'di skad do// hUM he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgya mtshor bskyil// thal ba'i mtshan mas brgyan pa 'di// gdug pa ma lus rab 'dul ba// che ba'i bdag po kun gyi bdag/ thams cad kun tu dpa' ba'i bdag/ gdug pa zil gnon thal ba'i mtshan// dbang mchog 'di yi dbang bskur bas// khams gsum gdug pa thal bar rlog/ de 'dra'i dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM ba ta ba ya hUM/ de nas thod pa skam rlon gyi phreng ba thogs la dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM dur khrod khong seng dbang po lnga dang ldan// sku gsum tshul 'chang skam rlon ra ris tshul// 'khor ba gnas su sdud pa'i thabs kyi phreng ba'i rgyan// khams gsum thogs med phreng bas dbang bskur bas// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM pad+ma b+han+d+ha ka pA la ha sta hUM/ de nas sbrul gyi chun pos dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM thod sbrul mnyen lcug 'jigs byed rgyan du che// sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pa'i rngom brjid can// sku la mchod phyir sku yi gnas lngar 'khril// dug lnga ma spangs dbang gi thabs su ston// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem zhe sdang drag pos 'joms// rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis klu rgyal dbang du sdud// gti mug rnam 'dul dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir// sbrul nag stong gi chun pos dbang bskur bas// zhe sdang drag po 'bar ba'i gnas dag nas// thabs mkhas rgyal po mnyes pa'i dbang 'thob shog/ A+oM badzra nA ga rA tsa ha ha ru lu hUM phaT// rdo rje'i gshog pas dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM khams gsum yongs la khyab pa'i gshog pa 'di// kun la khyab pas thugs rje 'byung ba'i yum// ma ltar byams pas yongs la skyob pa'i tshul// thugs rje thabs mkhas rgya che rol pa yi// phyogs bcur khyab pa'i gshog pas dbang bskur bas// phyogs bcur khyab pa'i chos la dbang bsgyur ba'i// rdo rje'i dbang mchog dam pa 'thob par shog/ A+oM dza li ni badzra sumab+ha ni hUM/ de nas zhing gi g.yang gzhis dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM khams gsum rtags su gsol ba'i dur khrod bdag/ g.yang gzhi tshe'u sdug skud pa sku la bcings// 'khor ba ma spangs gnas su dag pa yi// dur khrod tshogs kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir// zhing chen g.yang gzhis khyod la dbang bskur bas// zhing chen rlon pa thabs la (11)

mkhas pa yis// 'khor ba'i gnas nas ma lus thar bar shog/ A+oM baM sni ga ta khang hUM/ de nas stag lpags kyi sham thabs kyis dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM zhe sdang drag po stag gi sham thabs can// stag lpags sham thabs dpa' bar bstan pa yis// sug sdom 'doms su bsnol bas phyi nang gsang ba gcig/ phrag dog gnas 'joms stag lpags dbang bskur bas// zhe sdang gnas 'joms phrag dog kun rgyal ba'i// dbang mchog dam pa gnas 'dir 'thob par shog/ A+oM badzra bya g+h+r-i su ga hUM/ de nas glang po che'i ko rlon gyis dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM glang chen ko rlon brjid du che ba ni// gti mug ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rgyan// na bza' rgyan gyis sku la mnga' gsol zhing// thabs kyi ko rlon rgyan gyi dam pa yis// gang la dmigs pa'i dbang mchog 'di bskur bas// stobs kyis rgyal ba'i dbang mchog 'thob par shog/ A+oM ma hA ra ta pa sha hUM// de nas bskal pa'i me ris dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM 'bar ba 'phro ba'i ye shes thugs dang ldan// gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms nyon mongs dug sel ba// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i stongs la gnas// ye shes gsal bas phyogs bcu'i mun pa sel// bskal pa'i me ri 'bar bas dbang bskur bas// bar chod bgegs kyi rtog pas mi tshugs shing// mtshan ma 'dzin rtog med pa'i dbang 'thob shog/ A+oM dz+wa la badzra raM hUM// de nas kha T+wAM la sogs pa khro bo'i phyag mtshan sna tshogs pas dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM bdud dpung 'joms pa'i rtags kyi phyag rgya ste// gdug pa 'dul phyir phyag mtshan sna tshogs bsnams// rdo rje kha T+wAM rnge'u chung be con dang// ral gri dgra sta khra dang gshol la sogs// gdug pa'i phyag mtshan mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// dpa' bo bdud las kun tu rgyal ba dang// tsham rngams stabs kyis dregs pa 'dul ba yi// nyon mongs tshar gcod sdang ba 'dul ba dang// khams gsum dregs pa kun las rgyal ba yi// dbang mchog dam pa de yang 'thob par shog/ A+oM badzra tsakra shig ri dum bu spo ta ya tshal pa hUM// de nas longs spyod rdzas kyis dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM dam rdzas dag pa lnga dang zhal zas lnga// sku lnga 'khor lnga gsung lnga dbyer med pa'i// 'dod pa'i yon tan bza' dang bca' ba dang// btung la sogs pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa 'di yis dbang bskur bas// bde ba chen po'i rgyan gyi longs spyod rdzas// gang yang ma spangs thams cad lhun grub pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa de yang 'thob par shog/ A+oM badzra nirma tsa la hUM// de nas longs spyod la rol pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM yid bzhin bde mchog sku

gsung thugs kyi rgyan// cir yang longs spyod don la g.yos pa med// chos nyid longs spyod bde ba chen po'i rgyan// gang yang ma spangs chos nyid dag par rol// bde chen longs spyod 'di las gzhan na med// thams cad ma spangs gnyis med rol pa yis// rol pa nyid kyi 'bras bu 'thob pa yi// dbang mchog dam pa de yang 'thob par shog/ A+oM badzra nirma kha kha hUM/ de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi dbang bskur te// phyi'i dbang ni phyi rnal 'byor phyi pa thub pa'i rgyud las byung ngo// nang gi dbang ni slob ma'i phung po dang rnam par shes pa la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkod la 'di skad do// hUM stong nyid mi dmigs rnam dag dkyil 'khor na// bde gshegs thugs rje can kun rgyan du bzhugs// phung po ma spangs rnam dag dkyil 'khor la// gsal zhing rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams 'thob par shog/ A+oM badzra d+he wa DA ki nI d+harmA d+hA tu maN+Da la hUM/ de nas lhag pa'i byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// hUM dri med skyon bral kha dog dmar po'i mdog/ pad+ma rak+ta chags pa chen po'i gnas// chos nyid chags pas 'gro don mthar phyin cing// byang chub sems kyi dbang mchog thob pa dang// bo d+hi tsit+ta yab kyi byang chub sems// dkar la dag pa mu tig dri ma med// shin tu 'tsher ba chos nyid byang chub sems// don dam dbyer med byang chub che ba'i ngang// gnyis med rol pas chags pa'i byang chub ste// thar pa'i lam mchog gnas 'dren cing// 'khor ba'i 'khor las kun rgyal dbang 'thob ste// ye shes byang chub sems kyi dbang thob shog/ A+oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ka ma la tsit+ta hUM// de nas dbang ma lus 'gro ba yongs kyi re ba skong bar bskur ba ni// hUM ston pa'i sgron ma ma lus kha lo 'dren// shes bya'i mthar rdzogs yon tan lhun gyis grub// sdug bsngal skyabs mdzad ma rig 'dren mdzad cing// chos nyid don ston kha lo sgyur byed pa// sangs rgyas gdung 'tshob rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ gang yin mngon du gyur pa grub pa'i dbang// dbang mchog ma lus khyod kyis 'thob par shog/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA g+hu h+ye/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las// dbang yongs rdzogs bskur bar bya ba'i phrin las kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis gsol pa/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi don yid la zung zhig/ Ak+Sha/ Tha tha Ta ta Da da/ b+ha d+ha Na na/ ka kha ga g+ha/ tsa

tsha dza dz+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha/ sha Sha sa ha/ wa ya ra la/ nga nya ma o/ i I/ u U/ a A/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ trAM trAM trAM trAM/ hrI hrI hrI hrI/ A A A A/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hUM/ bskyed pa'i snying po gzhan bzhin no// gzhan yang de la khro bor spros// ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rgyud kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las/ gsung gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos dbang bskur ba'i yon tan 'di dag 'khor rnams la gsungs so// dbang bskur ba yi phan yon ni/ yang dag nyid du bshad bya ste// chos kyi dkyil 'khor lo bskor ba yang// dbang bskur nas ni bskor bar bya// bsgrub pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang// dbang bskur nas ni bsgrub par bya// phrin las mtha' dag bya ba yang// dbang bskur nas ni bya bar 'byung// dbang bskur gnang ba thob nas kyang// gang brtsam las de 'grub par nges// dbang bskur ba yi yon tan ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad la// yid la cir dgar dbang yang bsgyur// ma mo mkha' 'gro bran bzhin bkol// tshe dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs// 'jig rten 'di yi yon tan kyang// bsam gyis mi khyab 'grub par 'gyur// dmyal bar skye bar nges na yang// dbang bskur ba yi yon tan gyis// dmyal bar nams kyang mi ltung ste// ngan song gsum po kun spangs nas// bla med 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur// tshe zad 'chi bar nges na yang// dbang 'di rab tu bskur nas ni// tshe zad 'chi bar nges pa yang// tshe tshad dpag med thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang tshe 'di'i yon tan yang// brjod kyis mi lang 'thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa'i yon tan ni// rig 'dzin rnam gsum yan chad nas// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa kun// sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad kun// sems kyis bsams bzhin lhun gyis grub// chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas te// 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i ngang la gnas// gzhan yang dbang gi rim pa ni// tshig tu brjod kyis mi langs so// don la yid bzhin nor bu 'dra// dbang bskur rgyal po'i rgyud las/ dbang gi yon tan gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang ston pa kun tu bzang pos/ dbang ma bskur ba'i skyon 'di dag kyang gsungs so// dbang ma bskur ba'i skyon rnams ni// nges pa nyid du shes par gyis// dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob par// gang zhig sngags la 'jug byed cing// nyan cing sgrub par byed pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas na// dbang thob na yang mi phan no// dbang ma thob par brtsam pa dang// nyams ma

brtas par khal 'gel ba// de dag phung ba'i rgyu yin no// dbang ma thob pa'i gang zag ni// gzhan ma yon tan gang tshang yang// 'khor lo srog shing med pa 'dra'o// bsgrub pa zhag grangs dus tshang yang// rtags kun phyin par mi 'gyur ro// de yang dbang ma thob pa'i skyon// mchod pa bsnyen bsgrub shugs phyung yang// dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur na// de yang dbang ma thob pa'i skyon// sngags pa dbang med ras gcod mkhan// smyo dang mdze dang lkugs pa dang// rims dang mu ge 'khrug pa dang// nad rnams sna tshogs 'byung ba yang// slob dpon de yi rgyu las 'byung// dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob par// rig pa shes rab rtsal rdzogs kyang// slob dpon bya bar mi 'byung ngo// gang zhig sngags la spyod 'dod na// shes par gyis la dbang rnams nos// rnal 'byor sngags pa tshe thung dang// rdo rje lcam dral rkyen 'ong ba// dam sri langs pa ma yin te// 'phags pa nyid kyi bka' chad yin// rang dga' rung rung byed pa la// sangs rgyas ko long mi mdzad na// rang gi gzugs phung brlag ta re// gzhan yang dbang rnams ma thob par// ras chod byed pa'i skyon bsam gyis mi khyab pa gcig gsungs na'ang// 'jigs la skrag pas lo tsA bas bod la ma bsgyur ro// de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis// dam pa'i don du dbang 'di nos// rang la rang rdzun ma bslu bar// sangs rgyas bka' 'di gzhung bzhin gyis// man ngag thams cad bdag la yod// bka' bzhin gzhung bzhin ma byas na// ljon shing me yis tshig pa bzhin// yan lag med cing brlag ta re// kun tu bzang po'i lung la nyon// dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud las/ dbang ma bskur ba'i skyon gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos// de dag yod par bya ba'i phyir// dam tshig nges pa 'di gsungs so// bla ma yi ni bka' bzhin bya// sngags dang phyag rgya lag tu bzung// gsang ba'i man ngag legs par sba// rdo rje'i mched lcam 'gal mi bya// rnal 'byor dman dang me 'brel zhing// rdzas dang yo byad tshang bar byas// dpyang thag chad pa'i sems can rnams// thugs rje'i thabs kyis bsgral bar bya// mtshan dang ldan pa'i mi mo la// sbyor ba dag kyang rab brtsam pa// ser snas bcings pa gang yod pa// ma byin blangs nas rkyen du spyad// yang dag don du mi 'dul ba// rdzun dang smra dang mi tshangs spyod// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi dam// yang nas yang du bsdu bar bya// dbang bskur rgyal po'i rgyud las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos/ dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud bshad pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga yab yum dang// sems dpa' dang sems

ma dang// khro bo dang khro mo dang/ thub pa la sogs pas/ dbang skur rgyal po'i dbang gi dngos grub thob pas/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la/ sems kyi dbang du ma gyur par gang yang med de/ thams cad ma skyes pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang la ci ltar snang bar longs spyod par gyur to// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis/ rang rang gi lus rdul snyed du sprul nas/ bla na yod pa dang/ bla na med pa'i mchod pa la sogs pas/ sa gzhi la rtsi shing 'khrungs pa ltar bskyed de/ bar snang la sprin phung bzhin du gtibs// nam mkha' la char bzhin phab nas/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do// kye kye 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das// kye kye mdzad pa bcom ldan 'das// kye kye grub pa bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas mdzad pa khyad par che'o// mi gnas mi dmigs rang bzhin dkyil 'khor nas// sangs rgyas khyod kyi sku mchog ci 'dra ba// nam mkha'i dbyings las cir yang snang ba'i sku// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med chos kyi sku// dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa thabs kyi sku// sku mchog kun bzang sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas khyod kyi gsung ni ci 'dra ba// sgrar snang brjod med don las ma g.yos kyang// thugs rjes 'dul phyir gsung brjod cir yang ston// brjod med gsung mchog shes rab pha rol phyin// gsung mchog kun bzang gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas khyod kyi thugs ni ci 'dra ba// rnam rtog mi mnga' cir yang sa ler gzigs// ye shes mkhyen ldan thams cad 'dus ma byas// dran med rig pa'i rgyal por yongs su shar// thugs mchog kun bzang thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas khyod kyi yon tan ci 'dra ba// che ba'i yon tan med las cir yang snang// snang tsam nyid nas thugs rjes ngang gis 'dul// lhun rdzogs mthar phyin yon tan rgyal ba'i sku// yon tan kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas khyod kyi phrin las ci 'dra ba// thabs kyi phrin las 'gro ba yongs la bsgyur// skye 'gro mang po thar pa'i lam 'god mdzad// thabs mkhas mthar phyin phrin las rgyal ba'i sku// phrin las kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag lus phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// chags med mchod pa'i sprin phung rab sprul nas// chags pa med pa'i tshul du dbul lags na// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes bzhes su gsol// ston pa khyod kyi bka' drin dpag tu med// ma rig rmongs pa'i shes rab gsal mdzad nas// thar pa'i lam ston de la phyag 'tshal bstod// theg pa'i yon tan khyad par bsam yas pa// ma 'dres so

sor gsal ba'i go phye nas// rnal 'byor yongs la theg pa 'di ston pa// 'dren pa'i lha khyod la ni phyag 'tshal bstod// ces mgrin gcig tu bstod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang skur ba rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyud las/ mchod pa bstod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi lha rnams la/ shin tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'di dag gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje zhags pa dga' ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' dgyes pa che// rdo rje lus te rdo rje gsung// rdo rje thugs te rdo rje blo// rdo rje shes rab bla na med// rdo rje ma lus kun gyis shig/ A+oM rdo rje go cha brtan pa che// thub pa dka' ba brtson 'grus mchog/ nga ni rdo rje thabs chen de// rdo rje thabs kyis gtso bor shog/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// bla med rnams kyi yid bzhin te// thams cad ma lus rdzogs sangs rgyas// rab 'byams 'bar ba'i don rtogs shog/ ces 'khor rnams la dga' ba bskyed nas/ thams cad ma lus par 'dus pa'i dbang gi rgyal po dbang bskur ba'i rgyud 'di yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' la rgyud 'di yongs su gzung ba 'di bka' stsal to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bdag la rab tu dbang bskur ba'i// bdag gi dam pa bla na med// dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud chen 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod kyis zung// lus dang ngag dang sems la chongs// dbang rnams kun gyi byed po par// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du shog/ ces bka' stsal pa dang// de nas rdo rje sems dpas ston pa kun tu bzang po la/ dbang bskur gnang ba de thob nas/ a la la ho zhes brjod nas/ zhabs spyi gtsug gis blangs nas/ ston pa kun tu bzang po'i spyan sngar rgyud yongs su gzung ba dam pa 'di gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyud 'di yang/ snod dang skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag gcig las ma gtogs pa/ kun dang kun la bshad par mi bgyi'o// 'di la dbang zos shing kun la bstan na rdo rje sems dpa' bdag gi mgo lus kyang tshig par shog cig ces dam du bcas so// de nas 'khor sems dpa' dang sems ma la sogs pas kyang ston pa kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag sems dpa' dang sems ma la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang rgyud kyi rgyal po dbang skur ba'i rgyud kyi bka' las 'gal bar mi bgyid do// 'di'i gzhung yang rnal 'byor pas bsgoms shing bsgrubs na'ang// nod cing tshul bzhin bgyid na yang/ bdag cag gis ston pa kun tu bzang po nyid bzhin du

bka' thams cad bsrungs shing de las 'da' bar mi bgyid do// bdag cag rnams kyis dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di gang zag skal bar ldan pa gcig las ma gtogs pa// gang la yang bstan cing spel bar mi bgyid do// gal te bdag cag gis dam zos shing kun la bstan na/ bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus gas shing 'tshig par shog cig ces dam du bcas so// de nas 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro dang/ dbang phyug ma la sogs pa gsung thos pa tsam gyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di 'chad cing ston pa dang nod cing bsgrub pa lta a cang yang ches/ ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa su yod pa la yang/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po bzhin du bka' nyan cing de'i 'tshal ba bdag gis bsgrub pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// gang zhig 'di dang mi ldan zhing snod du ma gyur pa rnams la/ ming tsam bstan par mi bya zhing/ bka' dang 'gal ba rnams/ shin tu rtswa phung la me mched pa bzhin du/ lus ngag yid gsum thal ba bzhin du brlag par bgyi'o// ci ste bdag gis de bzhin du ma bgyis na// bdag cag rnams kyis mgo lus 'tshig par dam du bca'a'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas 'khor thams cad yongs su bsdu bar mdzad nas/ rgyud kyi don 'di dag kyang yongs su gnang bas 'di gsungs so// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gang yin pa yang/ dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di yang kun tu bzang po'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi dus gsum gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gang yin pa yang dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di yang kun tu bzang po'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gang yin pa yang/ dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyu 'di yang kun tu bzang po'o// kun tu bzang po yang rang gi byang chub kyi sems so// sems can thams cad kyang dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid kyang kun tu bzang po'o// kun tu bzang po yang rang gi sems so// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan phrin las gang yin pa thams cad kyang/ dbang bskur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di yang kun tu bzang po'o// kun tu bzang po yang rang gi byang chub kyi sems so// mtho ris ngan song yang dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di nyid do// rgyud 'di yang kun tu bzang po'o// kun tu bzang po yang rang gi sems so// zhes gleng bas 'khor rnams kyis kyang dbang skur rgyal ba'i rgyud

'di rtogs so// de nas dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud 'di yang/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ye shes la snang bar gyur to// de nas snod dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i blo la snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang skur ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dbang skur ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gzung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'khor thams cad mi snang bar gyur nas kun tu bzang po rang gnas kyi dbang thob nas/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dbang dbang skur rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po de dag gis 'khor lo bskor bas sems kyi 'bras bu mchog rdzogs so// rdo rje yang dbang gter gyi man ngag go/// !ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa po kun tu bzang po/ chos nyid mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang la bsdus nas bzhugs so// de ltar bsdus tsa na yang ji lta bu'i ngo bor yang ma grub bo// ma grub tsa na khyab pa'i snying rje chen po phyogs dang ris med par sems can thams cad la skyes so// snying rje chen po skyes tsa na/ snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid du sangs rgyas pa'i rtags chos kyi sku zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar dkar la ltem par gyur to// de ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba yang/ don ci yang med pa las ni rdul tsam yang ma g.yos so// ci yang med pa'i rtogs pa rtogs pa'i ye shes shar ro// de nas de nyid kyi ngang las rdo rje sems dpa' hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrags pas/ rang byung ye shes shar bas yi ge'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas so// de bzhin nyid du ci yang ma grub pas/ chos stong pa zab mar 'chad pas mtshan nyid sde gsum rdzogs pa chen por la bzlas te 'phags so// de las ma g.yos pa'i snying rje chen pos/ kri yog byams pas phan 'dogs pa khyab pa'i snying rje la la bzla ba ste// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes kyi nyi ma shar ro// de nas yi ge 'brur bstan pas don kun tshang bar la bzla ste/ hUM du snang ba tsam zhig ma g.yos pa la bzhag go/ ma g.yos tsa na yig 'brus don ma byas pa 'ga' yang med do// yig 'brus don byas pa las ma g.yos par thugs phyag mtshan gyis rig pa'i go gsal lo// des kyang don chos nyid stong pa las ma nyams so// hUM tshig tu glengs pa tsam gyis yi ge'i 'bru tshogs kyi las kyi bya ba re byas te/ 'byung ba khod bsnyams nas/ rang rang gi las kyi bya ba'i don rer sangs rgyas pa 'di lta ste/ rlung g.yo byed ma g.yos par

'degs pa chen por sangs rgyas/ nam mkha' mi 'gyur khyab gdal chen por sangs rgyas/ chu sdud pa klong dkyil du sangs rgyas/ sa bskyod pa ma bslad par sangs rgyas/ me drod snyom don 'byung du sangs rgyas/ de yang don de bzhin nyid la tshig tu 'phen pas yi ge yin pa 'di lta ste/ e yaM maM laM raM/ de nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la ma g.yos par 'gyur ba med pas/ de la rin po che ri rab bya bar ming du btags te hUM hUM/ de nas chos nyid de bzhin nyid du rgyas btab pas des thams cad yongs su bskyed pas rang la khyab par yod pa la gzhal yas khang zhes tshig tu btags te/ b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ de la ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs mang po 'dus pa la/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa zhes ming du btags te/ ci yang med pa las chu srin twa ra na dang/ mu tig gi shar bu dang/ rin po che'i chun 'phyang dang/ rgyan dang shar bu dang/ gser dang rin po che'i drwa ba dang/ gser gyi dril bu la sogs pa/ rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin mang po'i mang po/ nyung ngu'i nyung ngu/ chen po'i chen po/ chung ngu'i chung ngu/ gang la'ang ma g.yos mi snang bar yongs su khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// gsal zhing thams cad snang ba cir yang ma grub bo// mi snang ba'i dbyings las ma g.yos pa'i ye shes phyi nang du byung nas/ gang yang phyi nang med par ma grub pa'i phyi nang du bstan to// gzhal yas de la dbus med pa'i dbus su rgyan med pa'i rgyan nyi zla med pa'i nyi zla skar khung la ma brgyan pa'i mthongs khung du mi gsal bar kun mthong bar bstan to// gzhal yas cir yang ma grub pa'o// nang med pa'i phyis bskor ba/ dkyil med pa'i dbus su/ mi 'khor ba'i 'khor los/ de dag thams cad la 'khor te/ rtsis ma bgrangs pa'i grangs bzhi yod pa/ zlum po zur gsum can du bstan to// chos nyid stong pa la gcig kyang ma g.yos shing ma bstan par/ kun gyis mthong zhing rtogs par byas so// 'khor lo de'i steng min pa'i khri/ gzugs med pa'i seng ge glang po rta dang rma bya nam mkha' lding la sogs pa/ tshig med pa'i ming du btags nas/ don med pa'i rang rgyud du shar ro// rin po che khri rig pas brgyan pa la ming du btags pa/ dgos 'dod mi skong ba'i skong ba/ yod pa'i med pa dang/ ma chags pa'i chags pa chen po'i pad+mar bzhugs pa med pa'i bzhugs pa'i gdan nyi zla pad+ma med pa'i yod pa/ ma g.yos pa'i g.yos pa chen por bstan to// mi bzhugs pa'i bzhugs gnas glo bur dang bar khyams gru bzhi sgo khyud la sogs pa gdan pad+ma dang nyi zla sra snyi med pa'i rdo rje'i brag la sogs pa'i mi bzhugs pa'i gdan/ ma bkod pa'i bkod pa/ mi snang zhing rab tu gsal bar snang ngo// de tsam na chos nyid ma g.yos

pa'i klong las rdul tsam yang ma g.yos la/ ma khyab pa dang ma skyes pa med pa'o// de ni kun tu bzang po rang bzhin du ci yang ma grub par sangs rgyas te rgyu gdod ma nas dag go/ de nas gzhal yas khang ci la yang mi bsgom zhing/ gang du yang ma khyab pa med par rdo rje sems dpa' rtogs so// stobs dngos po chos nyid ma grub par 'grub bo// rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud las/ gzhal yas khang gi gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yid kun tu bzang pos/ ma g.yos pa'i yi ge a las/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su byung ste/ ming du ma btags pa'i lha grangs dang/ tshig tu ma byung ba'i yi ge 'bru sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ma 'phros par ma khyab pa med pa 'di ltar ste/ tha Tha ta Ta da Da d+ha D+ha na Na/ ka kha ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha/ 'a ya ra la/ nga nya ma o/ sha Sha sa ha/ ak+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ yongs su khyab bo// ma g.yos so// kun tu gtor ro// ma 'phros so// thams cad yig 'brur sangs rgyas te/ tshig dang yi ger ma grub bo// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje la sogs par btags pas bshad/ bstan pas bkrol/ snang bas don byas/ med pas skyon grol/ 'phros pas rtog pa gsal/ ci yang mi snang bas rgyas btab bo// de nas yid byed pa po kun tu bzang pos ston pas ma gsungs pa'i sgra rang byung ba ni 'di ltar ste/ hUM badzra d+h-Ika?A+oM dzi na dzag/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika?AM A ro lika?/ hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika?lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ mUM d+hA twI shwa rI/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badzra ra ti/ k+ShiM hi rA dza ya/ traM A gar+b+ha ya/ hrI ha hUM pad+ma pA da ma/ dziM ku ru pA Na/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ trAM mA le sa ma ya hoH/ hrI gI ti rA go\u0f85haM/ aM nirti rA ga yA mi/ mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ th+l+hiM nis+sa raM b+hA ya swA hA/ hUM sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ mUM shrI aM rA gA ya swA hA/ dzaHd+hU pe pra pe sha/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha/ baM dI baM su gi rI/ ho g+han+d+he tsit+ta/ hUM ya mAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ hUM pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ hUM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ hUM big+h+nAM ta kr-ita phaT/ A+oM ma hA badzra d+ha ra kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ A+oM ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ A+oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ A+oM ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzri tsit+ta A+oM/ a a a/ badzrI b+ha dra sa man+ta oM/ A+oM mu ni kriM swAM hA/ A+oM mu ne truM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne praM swa hA/ A+oM mu ni k+ShaM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sgras sku phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du gsal lo// snang la rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes chen por sangs rgyas so// ma khyab cing ma 'dus pa med pa'i bsgom pa chen po'o// gsung yig 'bru dang/ sku phyag rgya dang/ bzlas pa'i snying po la sogs pa/ so sor bstan pa gcig gi bdag nyid de/ yi ge med pa'i a ming med pa'i kun tu bzang po tshig med

pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig las kyang ma g.yos pa'i mang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i k+Sha ming med pa'i kun tu bzang mo tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig las kyang ma g.yos pa'i mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i tha ming med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig las kyang ma g.yos par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i Tha ming med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig las kyang ma g.yos par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i ta ming med pa'i rnam par snang mdzad tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i Ta ming med pa'i sangs rgyas spyan tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i da ming med pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i Da ming med pa'i ma mA kI tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i d+ha ming med pa'i snang ba mtha' yas tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i D+ha ming med pa'i gos dkar mo tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i na ming med pa'i don yod grub pa tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i Na ming med pa'i dam tshig sgrol ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i ka ming med pa'i sa'i snying po tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i kha ming med pa'i nam mkha'i snying po tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i ga ming med pa'i spyan ras gzigs tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i g+ha ming med pa'i phyag na rdo rje tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i tsa ming med pa'i lha mo la s+ye ma tshig med pa'i sku

phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i tsha ming med pa'i lha mo mA le ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i dza ming med pa'i lha mo gIrti ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i dz+ha ming med pa'i lha mo nirti ma tshig ming med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i pa ming med pa'i kun tu bzang po tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i pha ming med pa'i sgrib pa rnam par sel ba tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i ba ming med pa'i byams pa tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i b+ha ming med pa'i 'jam dpal tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i 'a ming med pa'i lha mo d+hU pe ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i ya ming med pa'i lha mo puSh+pe ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i ra ming med pa'i lha mo A lo ke tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i la ming med pa'i lha mo gan+d+he ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i nga ming med pa'i gshin rje gshed tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i nya ming med pa'i khro bo dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i ma ming med pa'i khro bo rta mgrin tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i na o yin nam dpyad/ ming med pa'i khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i sha ming med pa'i yum ro langs ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma

grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i Sha ming med pa'i yum mi pham ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i sa ming med pa'i khro gnyer ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i ha ming med pa'i khro mo ral gcig ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i a ming med pa'i lha'i thub pa dbang pos brgya byin tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i A ming med pa'i lha ma yin gyi thub pa thags bzang ris tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i i ming med pa'i mi'i thub pa shAkya thub pa tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i I ming med pa'i byol song thub pa seng+ge rab brtan tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i u ming med pa'i yi dwags kyi thub pa kha 'bar ma tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa dang/ yi ge med pa'i U ming med pa'i dmyal ba'i thub pa chos kyi rgyal po tshig med pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po gcig kyang ma grub par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par bsgom pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yid byed pa po kun tu bzang pos bsgoms pa'i nyes pa bshad de/ dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la/ stong pa phyang chad pa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ med pa phyogs gcig pa'i 'thibs chad do// ji la yang mi sems pa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ ma rig pa'i bla thabs su 'gyur ro// ji la yang mi rtog pa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mtha' chad par lhung ngo// ji la yang mi gnas par rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ ye shes kyi lam dang 'bral lo// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snying rje rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mnyam pa'i don mi rtogs/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ skye shi'i rgyun yod do// rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin la yig 'bru rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'khor ba dang nam yang mi 'bral lo// hUM rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ gzugs phung gi rdos pa mi shigs te/ tsan+dan gyi sdong por skye'o// a rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ dngos po'i 'dzin chags

la zhen pas gtsug lag gi 'dus byas rdzas kyi mchod rten du skye'o// 'byung ba lnga rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'jig tshogs kyi dgra ldang ngo// nam mkha' rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ stong pa'i mtha' mikhegs so yin nam/ len no// rlung rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ las kyis rnying du khrin lhung ngo// chu rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ nyon mongs pa'i rlan dang mi bral lo// sa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'khor ba las 'das pa'i dus med do// me rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ nyon mongs pa las 'gro sa med do// ri rab rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mu stegs rtag pa'i mur lhung ngo// gzhal yas khang rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ nyon mongs pa'i gtan gzhi bskyed do// chu srin gyi twar na rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dzin chags dang 'bral mi shes so// mu tig gi shar bu rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ dbang po'i sgo 'gag go/ rin po che'i chun 'phyang rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dod pas yid gdungs par 'gyur ro// rgyan rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ ngar shes pa rta yi g.yang du lhung ngo// shar bu rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mtshan ma'i rtog pa skye'o// gser dang rin po che'i drwa ba rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ bdud kyi rgyas zin to// gser gyi dril bu rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ chos skye ba med pa'i sgra mi thos so// phyi nang dngos por rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ chos nyid mnyam pa'i sa mi chod do// nyi zla'i mthongs kun rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dzam bu gling bzhi'i mtha' 'khor ro// 'khor lo rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ shing rta'i 'khor lo 'dra'o// glo bur dang bar khyams rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'khor ba'i rnyis 'dzin to// gdan khri rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ byol song spyod bkol gyi sdig smin no// rin po che'i khri rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dzin chags kyi sgo mi khegs so// pad+ma'i gdan rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'brang ngo// nyi zla'i gdan rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ dbyings ye shes kyi don mi 'char ro// rdo rje'i brag rgyud du bsgoms na/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin gyi gtan gzhi mi shigs so// tA la'i skye shing rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dod pa la chog shes pa'i dus med do// 'od zer rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ sems can gyi rtog pa skye'o// 'phro 'du rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ bdud kyi bar chad du 'gyur ro// sprul pa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ bgegs kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ngo// kha dog rnam lnga rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ chos nyid du la mi zlos so// rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud las/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum dang/ gzhan yas khang gi skyon btsal ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// da ni yid byed pa po kun tu bzang pos sku phyag rgya'i nyes pa bshad do// b+hud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yab kyi sku rang rgyud du bsgoms

na/ 'dod pa'i rgyu skyed do// yum gyi sku rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ chags pa'i gzhi sog go/ sems dpa' brgyad rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mtshan nyid kyi phyogs dang pha rol phyin pa'i sa las mi 'das so/ sems ma rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dod chags kyi chags yul las mi 'das so// khro bo bzhi rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ nga rgyal khengs pa'i rgyur gyur to/ yum bzhi rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ gdug rtsub kyis gzhi sog go/ thub pa drug rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i thag ring ngo// yid byed pa po kun tu bzang po rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ rang byung gi ye shes mi 'byung ngo// chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ skye ba med pa'i don mi 'char ro// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ ma hA de ba'i 'khor du skye'o// yum lnga rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ u ma de ba'i sbyor skul byed do// phyag mtshan rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mtshan mo'i rdzas su lhung ngo// rdo rje rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ me long lta bu'i ye shes las 'khyal/ 'khor lo rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las 'khyal/ rin po che rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las 'khyal/ pad+ma rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las 'khyal/ ral gri rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes las 'khyal/ yum rnams kyi phyag mtshan dril bu rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes las 'khyal/ dbu gsum rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ byol song mgo gsum par skye/ lag drug rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ klu phrug lag mang du skye/ lag gnyis rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ gti mug bya lag tu skye/ zhabs gnyis rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dzin pa'i gdos dang mi 'bral/ sku mdog mthing ka rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i klong du skye/ dkar po rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'go/ ser po rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ yon tan gyi tshogs dang bral// dmar po rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ chags pa'i skyon gyis gos so// ljang gu rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ phrin las kyi don mi rtogs so// sems dpa' dang sgo ba yan chad kyi sku mdog kyang de bzhin shes par bya'o// phyag mtshan la mi mthun pa'i don 'dir bshad pa ni/ sems dpa' dang sems ma'i phyag mtshan rin po che gru gsum rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dzin chags kyi skyon chags so// ral gri rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ phung po'i nad 'byung ngo// pad+ma rang rgyud du bsgoms na// chags pa'i gzhi yin no// rdo rje rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ ngo bo gshin rjer 'gyur ro// khu tshur rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ rtog pa'i skyon 'byung ngo// rin po che'i phreng ba rang rgyud (12)

du bsgoms na/ 'bras bu'i sgo lam 'gag go/ pi wang rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ shes pa bslu brid kyi g.yang sar lhung ngo// gar rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mi nag gi chab brgal du 'gyur ro// klu shing rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ byol song gi gling du skye'o// gaN+Di rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ dngos po'i rdzas snod du 'gyur ro// po ti rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ chos nyid kyi don 'gag go/ rin po che'i snye ma rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mi dmigs pa'i shes rab mi skye'o// ut+pal la rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mkhyen pa'i gsal mi phyed do// spos me rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'byung po'i tshogs su skye'o// me tog rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ lha'i bu'i bdud kyis bslu'o// mar me rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin chad do// dri chab rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ spang len gyi skyon 'byung ngo// sgo ba'i phyag mtshan dbyug to rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ shes pa'i sgo 'gag go/ gtun shing rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ phung po'i rang snyigs byed do// ral gri rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ nags tshal lo mar 'gyur ro// dril bu rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ yengs pa'i rgyud yod do// sdigs mdzub rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ las kyi sgrib pa che'o// dgra s+t+wa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mtshon gyi bskal pa 'byung ngo// be con rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ gnod sbyin gyi gling du skye'o// pad+ma rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ klu'i gling du skye'o// rdo rje rgya gram rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ lha chen mtshon char skye'o// rdo rje gdengs pa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ phrag dog gi gnyen po mi shigs/ go mtshon rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ nga rgyal gyi sgo mi shigs// gseg par rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dod chags kyi sgo mi bshigs/ po ti rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ gti mug gi sgo mi shigs/ rin po che'i bum pa rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ ser sna'i sgo mi shigs/ me chu rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ zhe sdang gi sgo mi shigs/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyag rgya rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ dngos po lder so'i skyon/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ stor khung gi skyon no// rgyud kyi rgyal po ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog gi rgyud las/ sku phyag rgya'i skyon bsal ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// da ni kun tu bzang pos rgyan dang cha lugs kyi nyes pa bshad de/ rigs lnga yab yum gyi sku'i rgyan la/ dbu rgyan rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mya ngan 'das pa'i don mi rtogs/ snyan cha rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mtshan ma'i sgeg chos su 'gyur/ mgur chu rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ gzung 'dzin gyi sgrib pa che/ dpung rgyan rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ 'dzin rtog gi shas mi spang/ phyag gdub rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ mtshan ma'i las la 'phros so// zhabs gdub rang rgyud du bsgoms na/ zug gzer gyi lcags
