na// rang byung ye shes de yang med// 'khor ba nyid du sems pa yang// 'khor ba rang byung ye shes pas// rtogs pa'i man ngag ma bstan 'byung// dus gsum nyid du sems pa yang// dug gsum rang byung ye shes pas// ji ltar sems pa de bzhin bzang// rang byung ye shes spyad pa la// 'khor ba ngan song ming yang med// sems can ngang las spang len med// rtogs pa klong du rang byung bas// rgyal ba nyid kyis 'di la bsngags// sems la dran rig 'byung ba yang// rang byung rgyal po ye shes yin// sems la byung tshor byung ba yang// rang byung rgyal po ye shes yin// rang byung ye shes chen po ni// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rje btsan te// lta ba skye shi med pa'i klong// rtogs pa 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang// spyod pa bcos med snying por spyod// sgrub pa btsal ba med par bsgrub// don gyi snying po nges pa'i lung// rang la yod pas bde ba'i zhing// rgyu nyid dag pas thar pa'i gnas// gzhung dang mthun pas nges pa'i don// 'di ltar sems spyod gang yin pas// ci ltar spyad kyangaspyad du zad// rang byung nyid las ma gtogs pa// zhen cing chags pa gang yang med// 'di ltar dus

dang rgyun med par// man ngag 'di las ma yengs na// sems kyi rang byung spyod par bshad/ de la sems 'gyur ba med pa'i snying por spyod par bshad pa ni/ sems kha dog dang dbyibs su 'gyur ba med pas/ 'gyur ba med pa don gyi snying po yin pas/ dper na gsal ba gang yin pa nyi ma yin la/ nyi ma gang yin pa gsal ba dang 'dra bar/ dus mi 'gyur ba thog ma dang tha ma med par shes pa dang/ spyod pa mi 'gyur ba nyin dang mtshan med par shes pa dang/ sems mi 'gyur ba skye shi med par shes pa nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i snying po yin la// 'gyur med kyi snying po nyid de ltar shes pa yin pas/ de ni 'byung ba'i snying po yin// bar snang mtshon gyi char 'babs na// skye shi gnyis kyi ming btags kyang// byang chub sems la 'gyur ba med// de ni sems kyi snying po yin// sems la dngos po rdzas med pas// kha dog dbyibs su 'gyur ba med// sems la brtag pa'i mu med pas// skye shi gnyis su 'gyur ba med// sems la brten pa'i gnas med pas// phyogs ris gnyis su 'gyur ba med// sems la chags pa'i gzhi med pas// spang len gnyis su 'gyur ba med// sems la nga dang bdag med pas// bzang ngan gnyis su 'gyur ba med// sems la rig pa'i rgyu med pas// rgyu 'bras gnyis su 'gyur ba med// sems la 'dzin pa'i sems med pas// mtha' dbus che chung 'gyur ba med// sems la dmigs pa'i sems med pas// yangs dog mtho dman 'gyur ba med// de ni snying po nges pa'i lung// 'di ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'gyur med snying por spyod pa bzang// de ltar dus gsum 'gyur med pas// lta ba 'di la gang gnas pa// sems bskyed brtson pa don dang ldan// ngang nyid bcos med snying por 'grub// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dus gsum du// kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa 'chang// gang ltar spyad kyang spyad du zad// 'gyur med snying po yin par nges// de la sems bcos med chos nyid kyi don du spyod pa ni/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni yang dag par sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang bcos par dka' la kun rdzob tu sems kyang ma bslad bslad du med pas/ de bzhin du sems kyi don yang gnas pas gzhan dubastan pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dper na dngos po med pa la/ gang gis bzung bar dka' ba bzhin/ chos nyid stong pa la sgro 'dogs par dka' bas/ don nyid yin par shes par dka' ba la/ ma bcos par de dang mthun par spyod pa ni/ bcos pa med pa chos nyid kyi ngang du spyod pa ste/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// sems nyid ma skyes chos nyid ni// tshig dang yi ge kun spangs pas// 'di 'dra'i sems ni brtag par

dka'// sems kyi mtshan nyid de bzhin la// rang bzhin bcos pa med pa yis// de ni chos nyid yin zhes bya// rang bzhin ma skyes gang shes pa// de ni chos nyid spyod pa yin// ci ltar bzo mkhas tshul shes kyang// sems nyid bcos par yongs ma gsungs// tshig dang yi ger ma bcos pa// de ni skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings// rangabazhin du ni bzang po zhig/ nges par yang dag bstan par bya'o// ma bcos pa yi chos nyid la// sangs rgyas thams cad kun 'byung ba// byung tsam nyid nas bcos su med// dper na namamakha'i mtshan nyid la// 'ja' tshon gzugs brnyan snang ba yang// snang tsam nyid nas rang bzhin med// de bzhin bcos pa med pa yis// skye dang 'gag spangs chos nyid dbyings// gnyis med so so ma yin pas// skye ba med las spros pa med// rang bzhin med pas 'dzin pa med// 'pho 'gyur med pas yum gyi klong// de la skye dang 'gag spangs pa'i// kun la rol pas yum gyi dbyings// yab yum gnyis med so so min// de bzhin bcos med chos nyid de// sus kyang bcos med bcos mi 'gyur// 'di ltar rtags pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bcos med chos su spyod pa de// de ltar nyin dang mtshan med par// man ngag 'di la gang gnas pa// sems spyod spyod pa don dang ldan// nges pa nyid du bsgrub pa ste// de ni rtag tu nges pa yin// man ngag klong la gnas pa'o// de la sems btsal ba med pa'i ye shes su spyod pa ni// sems kyi mtshan nyid ye nas ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa ste// de la rgyu rkyen rten 'brel gyis btsal ba med de/ rang gi rang bzhin gyi snying po man ngag gi don dang ldan pas// thams cad du legs pa 'byung ba'i rang bzhin pas/ de lta bu'i don shes shing rtogs pa dang ldan par spyod pa ni/ btsal ba med pa'i ye shes su spyod pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rig gar yang ma lus par yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ltar/ dgos pa 'byung bas/ man ngag dang ldan pa'i dgos pa nyid ni rig pa gsal ba nang nas shar bas/ btsal ba med par spyod pa yin pas/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// btsal ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos kyi sku yi gdeng chen te// ma g.yos pa yi dbyings nyid la// ma bcos pa yi chos nyid gsal// ma btsal pa yi ye shes shar// shar bas sangs rgyas thams cad thob// sangs rgyas thob pas sems can zad// nyi ma shar bas mun pa nub// rig pa gsal bas mun pa stongs// ye shes gsal bas 'khor ba dwangs// de la sus kyang btsal ba med// btsal med snying por shar ba las// rgyu 'bras can du de ma bstan// bcos pa med par shes pa las// gnyen po can du de ma bstan// 'gyur ba med pa'i shes pa las// 'chi 'pho can

du de ma bstan// ma g.yos pa yi shes pa las// 'dzin rtog can du de ma bstan// mnyam pa nyid kyi shes pa las// che chung can du de ma bstan// kun tu bzang po'i shes pa la// gtsang sme can du de ma bstan// mtha' dbus med pa'i shes pa la// phyogs ris can du de ma bstan// de ltar shes pas sems shes la// sems shes pas ni ma btsal ba// ma btsal bas ni ye shes che// ye shes de zhes spyod pa yin// thig le chen po btsal ba med// stong pa chen po btsal ba med// skye 'gag med pas btsal ba med// ma g.yos chos nyid btsal ba med// de ltar shes pa'i sems can ni// de ni spyod pa don dang ldan// 'di ltar rtogs pa btsal ba med// btsal ba nyid na btsal ba med// 'di ltar rtogs pa spyod pa yin// spyod pa nyid na spyod pa med// 'di ltar brtson pa don dang ldan// yengs med brtson pa don dang ldan// 'di ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// btsal ba med par sus spyod pa// brtson pa don ldan yin zhes bya// de nyid sangs rgyas nyid du bstan// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang lung bstan// man ngag nges pa nyid lung bstan// 'di ltar spyod pa thar pa ste// thar pa nyid na ma thar gnas// de phyir btsal ba med pa'o// btsal ba med par bshad pa yang// lus dang gnas la btsal ba dang// 'du 'dzi g.yeng bas btsal ba dang// sdug bsngal phyogs ris btsal ba dang// gzhan nas gzhan du btsal ba med// de bzhin de la de bzhin btsal// man ngag de la nying khur btsal// 'gyur med de la klong du btsal// bcos med de la spros med btsal// yin pa'i don la nges par btsal// gnas pa'i don la brtags par btsal// shes pa'i don la spyod par btsal// de ni btsal ba med pa yis// ye shes spyod pa yin zhes bya// de la sems kyi lta ba gang dang ldan na don dang ldan pa ni// sems kyi lta ba yengs pa med pa dang// sems kyi lta ba 'gyur ba med pa dang// sems kyi lta ba bcos su med pa ste// de la sems kyi lta ba ma yengs pa ni// gnyen pos bcos pa ma yin/ rang gi rang bzhin gyis ma yengs pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci ltar spyad pa bde ba chen po'i klong yin pas/ yengs pa med pa'o// sems kyi lta ba 'gyur ba med pa ni/ rang bzhin mi g.yo ba la tshig dang yi ges gzhan du bstan par dka' bas gcig kyang mi 'gyur ba'i don no// sems kyi lta ba bcos pa med pa ni// dper na nam mkha' la cha shas su bgos shing bcos pas tshi chad pa dang 'dra bar kun gzhi byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid ye nas khyab cing gdal ba chen po grub zin pa la/ tshig dang yi ges 'chos par dka' ba'i don de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// rang sems med

pa'i sngon rol na// sangs rgyas byang chub yod ma yin// dus gsum rje btsan byang chub sems// gzhan la phan 'dogs nus pa'i mthu// rang la gnas med goms pa'i gdeng// gzhi bzhag don gyi snying por blta'o// spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud las/ sems kyi spyod pa gang ltar spyod cing lta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs kyi spyod pa gang ltar spyod cing lta ba gang dang ldan na 'di ched du brjod do// thabs kyis spyod pa gang yin pa// rdo rje sems dpas nyan par gyis/ nges par lung 'di bstan par bya'o// de la thabs kyis spyod pa rnam pa gsum ste/ kun rdzob dngos po'i chos la thabs kyis spyod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa nang gi chos la thabs kyis spyod pa dang/ bde ba chen po yum gyi b+ha ga la gnyis su med par thabs kyis spyod pa'o// de la kun rdzob dngos po'i chos la thabs kyis spyod pa ni/ gnam ri dang sa brag rtsi shing dang nags tshal la sogs pa/ ji srid rdzas su yod pa thams cad dang/ 'byung ba chen po la sogs par bskyed cing snyoms pa thams cad skyon du bltas nas spang ba ma yin/ de nyid thams cad kyi spyod pa ste/ dper na skyes bu dpa' rtsal dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pas sdang ba'i phyogs thams cad thabs kyis btul nas yon tan du snang ba 'dra bar thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pas mtshan ma rdzas su snang ba thams cad sgyu ma yin pa dang/ rang bzhin ma grub pas gnyis su med pa dang/ ma skyes pas gang la spyad kyang yon tan las skyon med de/ sgyu ma ltar shes shing ma skyes par go bas srog gcod pa yang yon tan las skyon med de/ rang bzhin med par shes la/ mnyam pa nyid du go bas ma byin pa blangs pa yang yon tan las skyon med de gnyis su med pa shes la/ tha mi dad pas mi tshangs par spyad kyang yon tan las skyon med de/ de don las so ma gsogs su mi ston/ man ngag spyi ldings su ston pa thabs kyis spyod pa'o// de la phyogs cha'i ris su ma phye/ bdag med kyi shes rab tu brdal bas kyang thabs kyis spyod pa'o// de la bzang ngan gyi spyod par ma phye/ rang byung gi longs spyod du mdzad pas kyang thabs kyis spyod pa ste/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// snang srid mtshan ma'i rdzas rnams kun// ma rig rmongs pa'i blo rnams kyis// yod pa nyid du snang ba ste// thabs la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rang bzhin med par 'dris par spyod// rgyu 'bras mtshan ma'i chags sems la// gang zag 'khrul pas rtog pa chags// mkhas pas ye nas dngos med rtogs// 'byung ba ma skyes yum gyi klong// 'gyur med snying po yin par ston// spyod pa'i rgyal po 'di las byung// lus kyi spyod

pas thams cad bsgral// sems can thams cad bsgral ba ni// rgyal ba mnyes te sras su skye// gtsang sme med par za ba ni// rgyal ba mnyes te sras su skye// spang len med par sbyor ba ni// rgyal ba mnyes te sras su skye// bzang ngan med par spyod pa ni// rgyal ba mnyes te sras su skye// thabs kyi spyod pas ma spyad na// spang ba nyid kyang 'khor ba'i rgyu// thabs kyi spyod pas spyad pa ni// bdag po zhing la longs spyod 'dra// gang zhig de dang mi ldan na// rang nor spyad kyang ma byin blangs// thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pas ni// 'byung ba'i chos nyid yum du spyod// snang srid kun tu bzang mor spyod// yul ni chos kyi dbyings su spyod// lus ni phyag rgya chen por spyod// phung po rnam grol zhing du spyod// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su spyod// don dam nyid du ma skyes pas// thabs kyis spyad kyang gol sa med// ma chags rtog pa med par spyod// don dang mthun zhing 'gal med pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa nang gi chos la thabs kyis spyod pa ni// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mun pa ngang gis mi gnas pa bzhin du// mkhas pa'i spyod pa la nyon mongs pa ngang gis mi gnas te// thabs kyis spyod pas 'dod chags chos nyid dag pa'i rgyan du spyod// zhe sdang thugs rje chen po'i zhing du spyod// gti mug ma skyes pa'i dbyings su spyod// nga rgyal che ba'i yon tan gyi mchog tu spyod// phrag dog rnam par rtog pa mi gnas par spyod// dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gang ltar bltas pas legs pa bzhin// thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pas ji ltar bltas pa legs pa'i zhing yin pas// de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// nyon mongs rgyu rnams thams cad kun// thabs kyis spyod pa'i zhing yin pas// de la mi spang spyad par bya// gti mug thabs kyis ma spyad na// de bzhin rigs kyi sku mi 'grub// zhe sdang thabs kyis ma spyad na// rdo rje'i rigs kyi sku mi 'grub// nga rgyal thabs kyis ma spyad na// rin chen rigs kyi sku mi 'grub// 'dod chags thabs kyis ma spyad na// pad+ma'i rigs kyi sku mi 'grub// phrag dog thabs kyis ma spyad na// las kyi rigs kyi sku mi 'grub// nyon mongs lnga po thabs su mnyam// rigs kyi sku lnga spyod par 'dus// nyon mongs lnga po sgyu mar spyad// rigs kyi sku lnga gnyis med thabs// nyon mongs lnga po ye nas dag/ rigs kyi sku lnga gdod nas byung// nyon mongs lnga po nam mkha'i khams// rigs kyi sku lnga gza' skar tshul// nyon mongs lnga po rgya mtsho bzhin// rigs kyi sku lnga nyi zla ltar// rgya mtsho chu zla dbyer med mnyam// don la gnyis med thabs spyod pas// nyon mongs chos la thabs kyis spyod// man ngag don 'di sus spyod pa// dus drug nyin dang mtshan med par// phrin las cho

bar ma chags pas// brtson pa don dang ldan zhes bya'o// de la bde chen yum gyi b+ha ga la gnyis su med par thabs kyis spyod pa ni/ thams cad du bde ba'i longs spyod de/ dper na gser gyi gling la rdo btsal gyis mi rnyed la/ 'dod chags kyi dga' ba bstar na gang la yang mi dga' ba dang mi bde ba med pa bzhin/ chos nyid bde ba chen po'i don man ngag la/ 'khor ba'i skyon dang zug rngu btsal gyis mi rnyed la/ chos nyid dga' bde sems kyi ro snyoms su bstar nas/ dga' ba'i longs spyod ma yin pa dang/ bde ba'i longs spyod gang yang ma yin pa gang yang med par shes pas/ de nyid blo'i chags par bya ba'i yul du gyur pa yin pas yum gyi b+ha ga yin la/ de gnyis su med par spyod pa ni thabs te/ dus thams cad du stsol ba dang ma bral bas/ gnyis su med pa'i rol pa rgyun ma chad pa/ bral na bral te legs pas/ btsal med kyi dga' ba de la zhugs/ sems kyis thams cad du dran rig skyes pas/ dus gsum rig pa'i dbyings lon pas/ 'du 'bral med pa'i gzugs su rgyun ma chad/ dran rig ma skyes na ma skyes su zad de/ dran med shes rab kyi klong na/ 'dzin med thabs kyi rgyal po// 'gyur med dga' ba de'i klong na bzhugs pas/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// btsal ba gnyis su med pa ni// yab yum gnyis su spyod pa ste// don 'di rtogs shing shin tu bde'o// dbyings la sbyor ba yum zhes bya'o// thabs la spyod pas yab ces bya'o// nyams su lon pas byang chub sems// blo la bstar bas dgyes pa'i ro// gang yin pa yi chos rnams la// de yi shes pa de bzhugs pas// bde ba chen po thabs su spyod// mu mtha' med pa'i spyod pa la// de yi rtsol ba de zhugs pas// bde ba chen po'i thabs su spyod// ma spangs pa yi rgyu rnams la// rol pa chen po'i thabs zhugs pas// bde ba chen po'i thabs su spyod// gnyis su med pas dga' zhes bya'o// gsal ba dga' bas bde zhes bya// chags par bya ba yum zhes bya// dmigs par bya bas yab ces bya'o// gnas par bya ba b+ha ga'o// dga' bde skyes pas b+ha ga'o// spyad par bya bas b+ha ga'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba'o// kun tu bzang po'i bde ba'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi spyod pa'o// skye 'gag med pa'i phrin las so// rnal 'byor thugs kyi dgongs pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad spyod do// 'di ltar man ngag don 'chang ba// thabs kyi spyod pa dam pa 'chang// 'di ltar thams cad du gnas pa// brtson pa don dang ldan pa'o// thabs kyi spyod pa yin zhes bya'o// de la lta ba gang dang ldan pa ni// lta ba thog ma nyid nas lta ba la// de ji ltar du yin pa de bzhin du lta ba'o// de yang gang zhe na/ de yang thog

ma nyid nas rang bzhin med pa ma skyes pa yin pas de bzhin du blta ba dang/ thog ma nyid nas ma g.yos bzhin gnyis su med pa de bzhin du lta ba dang/ thog ma nyid nas ma bcos shing mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du lta'o// de nas de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// ye nas bcos pa med pa yi// rang byung snying po yin pa la// de bzhin btsal ba med pa yis// de bzhin g.yos pa med par bzhag/ de bzhin chos nyid yin shes na// gzhan du chos nyid btags mi dgos// ma bcos pa yi man ngag la// de la goms pa'i gdeng chen du// nges par lung bstan bshad par bya'o// des ni yid ches la bzlas so// spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud las/ thabs kyi spyod pa gang ltar spyod cing lta ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ rdo rje sems dpas shin tu gdung ba'i mchi mas ngus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ngal bsang ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// gdung ba skye bar shin tu legs// gang zhig mnyan par brtson pa ni// legs 'ong bu la bshad par bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyod pas sangs rgyas na/ sems can spyod pas de ltar ma rtogs pa shin tu 'gyod do// lus kyi spyod pa rol pa gnyis su med pa'i thabs dang shes rab yin pa la/ sems can gyis de ltar ma rig pa shin tu 'gyod do// sems can gyis spyod pa ci bsams shing dran pa thams cad ye shes ngang gis rol pa lags pa de/ ma rtogs pa shin tu 'gyod do// sems can thams cad kyis lus kyi spyod pa ma shes pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ thabs dang shes rab nub par gyur pa dang/ ngag gi spyod pa ma shes pas lce la zhing rmo ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/ chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don nub par gyur pa dang/ sems kyi spyod pa ma shes pas nyon mongs pa kha lo bsgyur bas/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ rig pa'i ye shes nub par 'gyur ba dang/ thabs kyi spyod pa ma shes pas/ 'jig tshogs kyi dbyen spyos pas/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs spyod dang bral bar gyur pa'i sems can glen pa rnams la/ thabs mkhas pa'i lta ba'i rgyal po spyod pa 'di lta bu mnga' ba de/ sems can gyis de lta bu ma 'tshal ba de ni ji lta bu lags/ sems can gnas pa yang spyod pa/ 'khor bar 'khyams pa yang spyod pa// nyon mongs shing nyam thag pa yang spyod pa/ 'di ltar gsungs na de nyid bde ba yang dag pa las skyon du ma song ba de/ sems

can gyis de ltar ma 'tshal bar de ji lta bu lags/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes btsal ba med pa'i snying po de/ sems kyi spyod pa dang skyon nyid las byung ba las/ sems can gyis ma 'tshal ba de ji lta bu zhig lags/ chos kyi sgo bka' ci snyed pa gsungs pa yang/ 'khor ba nyid na de nyid byang chub kyi chos su gsungs pa de/ sems can rnams kyis chos de bzhin du ma 'tshal ba de ci lta bu zhig lags/ de dag ni ji lta bu zhig lags/ des bdag ni shin tu mchi ma dku'o zhes ngus so// de bzhin du rigs lnga kun kyang ngus so// rnam par snang mdzad kyis sems rtag chad gnyis su lta ba la ngus so// rin po che'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas kyis sems bzang ngan gnyis su lta ba la ngus so// pad+ma'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas kyis sems gtsang sme gnyis su lta ba la ngus so// las kyi rigs kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems spang len gnyis su lta ba la ngus so// rigs kyi yum rnams kyis kyang/ sems can rnams thabs la mi mkhas pa la ngus so// sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can rnams kyis lam ma shes pa la ngus so// de ltar ngus tsam nyid na/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas yab yum dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa gang yang med cing gang gis kyang ma ngus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs par bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pas/ sdug bsngal gyi kha brgyud pa ni/ dper na sman gyi sbyor btang mi shes pas/ sman du sbyar yang dug tu 'gyur la/ sman gyi sbyor thabs la mkhas pas/ dug sbyar yang nad 'jil ba'i mthu stobs yod pa bzhin du/ spyod pa'i rgyal po 'di ma thos pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa btsal yang sdug bsngal gyi gtan zhing du 'gyur la/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di thos pas ni sdug bsngal zhing spyad kyang thar pa bde ba chen po sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod du 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pas 'khor zhing 'khyams pa la rgyud 'di gsungs na 'khor ba nyid bde ba yang dag par 'gyur ba ni/ dper na zas spyod ma legs pas nad du 'gyur/ 'chi bar 'gyur la/ de nyid spyod pa legs pas gzi mdangs bkrag dang ldan pa bzhin du rgyud 'di ma rtogs shing ma go bas/ sems can 'khor bar 'khyams la/ rgyud 'di rtogs shing go na/ 'khor ba nyid bde ba'i ror bstar par 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes btsal ba med pa'i snying po nyid sems kyi spyod pa dang skyon las byung ba/ sems can gyi ngo ma shes pas ni/ dper na rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs lta bu gzhon pa la/ brda' dang/ rtsed mo

dang/ gzhon nu'i rol pa la sogs pa bus pa de nyid rang la tshang bar yod kyang/ 'tsho ba'i ma ma dang/ rtse grogs la sogs pa rnams kyis ma bstan na/ de ltar ngo mi shes la/ bstan na ngo shes pa bzhin/ don gong ma 'di dag sems kyi skyon nyid yin pa de/ lung nges pa 'di ma bstan na de bzhin du mi shes shing mi rtogs pa/ lung 'di dag bstan na skyon yang yang dag pa'i lung du 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi sgo sems can nyid las byung ba ni/ dper na nam mkha' la char pa bab pa de nyid mtsho nyid las byung zhing de nyid du 'babs pa bzhin gnas kyang/ shes pa dag pas de bzhin rtogs la/ shes pa ma dag pas de bzhin du mi shes pa bzhin/ chos kyi sgo mo bsam gyis mi khyab par gsungs pa yang/ sems can gyi rgyu gnyis nyon mongs pa dang/ 'khor ba nyid kyis gsungs la/ yin yang de nyid yin la/ 'bras bu de nyid gzhan du btsal du med pa'i don/ rgyud 'di blo la 'dris pa rnams kyis de bzhin du shes pa las/ 'di blo la ma 'dris pa rnams kyis de bzhin du mi shes pas/ 'di blo la ma 'dris pa rnams kyis rtogs par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni spyod pa nyid du gnas pa dang/ gnas pa nyid du gnas pa med pa'i don ma rtogs pas/ de la 'di skad ces bshad par bya'o// kun nas gsang ba'i man ngag ni/ gnas pa nyid kyis ma rtogs te// 'jig rten khams na 'phyan zhing nyen// yang gsang nges pa'i theg pa 'di// rang nyid yin pas brtags pa'i rgyu// zhes bya ste/ de bas na rdo rje sems dpa' sems can gyi nyon mongs pa med pa'i dngos grub ni/ bde bar gshegs pa la yang mi mnga'o// sems can gyi skyon med pa'i yon tan ni/ bde bar gshegs pas kyang ma bshad do// sems can gyi spyod pa chos nyid yin pa las/ de las gzhan pa'i chos ni ston pas kyang ma gsungs so// 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa yin pa las/ gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa ma bstan to// sems can gyi ci byas ci spyad pa nyid/ rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod yin pa las/ gzhan du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod ma byung ngo// rgyu nyid gdod ma nas dag pa'i 'bras bu yin pa las/ btsal ba dang bcos pa'i 'pho 'jug gi rang rig pa'i blong nas ma phye'o// de lta bu'i don sems can la rang la rang chas su yod na 'gyod pa'i rgyu ci yod/ ces bka' stsal pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud las/ rdo rje sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba mya ngan las

'das par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di/ ma bslad pa'i yon tan khyad du che bas che ba dang/ ma btsal ba'i mthu dpag tu med pa dang/ ma bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub shin tu brjod kyis mi langs pa dang/ ma gsungs pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i rgyud 'di ni/ nyan thos dang theg pa dman pa rnams kyis rtogs pa lta ci smos kyi/ ming tsam yang thos par mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang/ 'di'i yon tan brjod kyis mi langs pa lags te/ nam mkha' la cha shas su phye zhing bsngo bar rung gi 'di'i yon tan brjod par mi nus so// 'byung ba thams cad ni 'bru'i nyag ma tsam nas bgrang bar nus par zad kyi/ 'di'i yon tan bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i don ni grangs sam mu mtha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro// de lta bas na rgyud 'di yang sus thob pa ston pa nyid do// ston pa nyid kyang rgyud 'di'o// kun tu bzang po yang rgyud 'di'o// 'di yid la dran pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi ye shes so// gong du bstan pa ltar dkon pa nyid kyi dpe ni/ u dum wa ra dang 'dra'o zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' legs so legs so// rgyud 'di nga kun tu bzang pos dus gsum du dgongs pa nyid yin no// nga'i dgongs pa nyid 'dir bstan pa yin pas/ rgyud 'di yang rim gyi snang ba las/ kun tu rgyas par ma bstan te yang dag pa'i man ngag nges par 'dod pa dang/ don man ngag 'di dang phrad na zang zing yon dang grogs tshegs la mi blta ba'i rnal 'byor pa 'ga' zhig srid pa dag la bstan par bya'o// gang zhig snod dang mi ldan pa rnams la ni/ dmus long la bzhin mthong du mi btub pa'i dpe bzhin/ man ngag bstan kyang go zhing rtogs pa mi nus pa yin pas/ de bas shin tu gsang bar bstan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyud 'di'i ming tsam 'dzin pa'am yang tha na tshig 'bru gcig tsam yang/ kha ton du 'dod na man ngag gi dngos grub thob pa yin pas// de la ni gol ba med do// de skad ces sus kyang ma gsungs par bka' stsal pas/ rdo rje sems dpa' de dang mi gnyis gcig pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rgyud 'di'i don rtogs par gyur to// spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud las/ yon tan rang rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud las gsungs pa med pa'i mdzod/ sems kyi 'bras bu mchog sa ma ti rdzogs so//// bar 'dir dam tshig rgyal po dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud 'dzud/

rgya gar skad du/ shAn+ti de wa tan+t+ra ma hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ zhi ba lha rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab kun tu bzang po de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes pa rnam par snang mdzad dang/ yum sangs rgyas spyan ma dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ yum dbyings phyug ma dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ yum mA ma ki dang/ snang ba mtha' yas dang/ yum gos dkar mo dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ yum dam tshig sgrol ma dang/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas yab yum rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sa'i snying po dang/ rdo rje sgeg mo dang/ nam mkha'i snying po dang/ rin chen phreng ba dang/ spyan ras gzigs dang/ pad+ma dbyangs mkhan ma dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ las kyi gar mkhan ma dang/ nang gi byang chub sems dpa' yab yum rnams kyang bzhugs so// byams pa dang/ rdo rje bdug spos ma dang/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang/ rin chen me tog ma dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ pad+ma mar me ma dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ las kyi dri chab ma dang/ phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' sems ma rnams kyang bzhugs so// gzhan yang rigs drug 'dul bar mdzad pa ni/ lha'i thub pa srid thub 'dzin dang/ lha ma yin gyi thub pa rnam par rgyal ba dang/ mi'i thub pa shAkya seng+ges mtho ris gnas gsum po 'dul ba'i zhing du yang gzigs so// byol song gi thub pa seng+ge rab brtan dang/ yi dwags kyi thub pa kha 'bar rgyal mo dang/ dmyal ba'i thub pa chos kyi rgyal pos ngan song gnas gsum 'dul ba'i zhing du gzigs so// gzhan yang gdug pa can 'dul ba ni gshin rje gshed dang/ gsang ba'i yum rgyas 'debs ma dang/ stobs po che rnam par rgyal ba dang/ gsang ba'i yum tshe 'phel ma dang/ rta'i mgrin pa can dang/ gsang ba'i yum za byed ma dang/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang/ gsang ba'i yum rmongs byed ma dang/ rig pa'i khro bo khro mos sgo bsrung bar mdzad do// gzhan yang rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang bcas pa ni dper na til gyi gang bu ltar bzhugs so// zhi ba lha rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'khor gyi 'jig rten thams cad la gzigs nas/ rang gi btsun mo la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do// zhugs (15)

ma thag tu 'khor thams cad la bde bas khyab pa ni/ la la ni go rim gyi bde ba bzhir shar ro// la la ni phyi nang gi gnas la ltos pa'i bde ba bzhir shar ro// la la ni spang bya la ltos pa'i bde ba bzhir shar ro// la la ni rang gi ngo bo la ltos pa'i bde ba bzhir shar ro// de nas 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngoms nas 'di skad ces brjod do// mar me mang po khyim du sbar gyur kyang// mig med pa la mun par snang ba bzhin// lhan cig skyes pas kun la khyab mod kyang// nye yang rmongs pa nyid la shin tu ring// skal ngan sems can thabs kyis grol ba'i phyir// dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs las byung ba'i// ka dag lhun grub rtsol bral chen po'i chos// gnas lugs rang bzhin zhi ba ji ltar gnas// khams gsum sems can rang sems ma reg pa// khams gsum nyon mongs snang ba'i rang bzhin can// rgyu drug sems can skye ba rnam bzhir la// rang rgyud phung po'i zhi ba gang du gnas// rnal 'byor pa ni nyams kyi snang ba la// gdul bya sprul pa'i zhi ba rnam pa ru// sku gsung mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i thugs// bde bar gshegs pa'i snang ba rnam dag pa// sku gsum sku bzhi sku lngar snang ba yi// mthar phyin 'bras bu'i zhi ba ji ltar bzhugs// skal ngan sems can gdul dka' ba// khyod kyis 'dul ba'i dus la bab// gzhi lam 'bras bu mi shes pa// khyed kyi bstan pa'i dus la bab// ces brjod nas/ ston pa'i zhal du gzigs so// zhi ba lha rgyud chen po las/ gleng slong ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po ni chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ma bcos pa'i gnyug ma dngos po rnams kyi gnas lugs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gro don rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di gsungs so// e ma ho rab tu gsang ba'i chos// gnas lugs ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi// 'khor dang 'das pa kun gyi rgyu// bcings grol med par ngang gis gnas// e ma ho rab tu rtogs pa'i chos// rgyud chen rnal 'byor chen po ni// snod bcud thams cad shes rab tu// phyag rgya ka dag chen por rtogs// e ma ho rab tu rtogs pa'i chos// lung chen rjes su rnal 'byor ni// kun bzang yab yum dbyings ye shes// bde chen sras su sangs rgyas so// e ma ho rab tu mkhyen pa'i chos// man ngag rdzogs pa chen po ni// snang zhing srid pas bsdus pa'i chos// sel med sangs rgyas nyid du gnas// dag pa chen po chos kyi sku// bya rtsol mi mnga' ngang gis rdzogs// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// chos can mtshan ma'i dngos po rnams// chos nyid ngang du lhun gyis grub// dus gsum rgyal pa ma lus

la// lhun grub mchog tu dgongs pas go/ gang yin de las dpag tu med// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'o// 'khor ba ka dag rin chen gling// mya ngan 'das par der brjod do// nyi ma'i dkyil na mun med ltar// ye shes rang snang ma rtogs pa// nyon mongs 'khor ba ngang gis med// gnas lugs nyid du ka dag pa'o// dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs nyid// bcing med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyin spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces gsungs so// zhi ba lha rgyud chen po las// gzhi gnas lugs rang bzhin gyis zhi ba bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog dpal rin chen 'byung ldan nyid/ 'khrul pa thams cad grol bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ 'di gsungs so// bde gshegs snying po'i rang bzhin 'di// khams gsum yongs la ye nas gnas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// lus dang grib ma lta bur byung// bskal pa sngon las bsags pa yi// 'khor ba sngon gyi rnam smin byung// las su nyon mongs lnga po yis// 'byung lnga 'dus pa'i phung por smin// snod kyi 'jig rten snang ba yang// sangs rgyas zhing khams yin par shes// shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba'i zhing// lho na dpal ldan nub phyogs bde// byang phyogs rnam dag bkod pa la// dbus kyi byang chub snying por gnas// 'di la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhing// gud na med par rab rtogs la// mi dge bcu po khro bcu'i mtshams// nyon mongs lnga po mtshon cha lnga// spyi bo sna tshogs rdo rje la// rkang mthil rdo rje'i sa gzhi la// rtsib ma rdo rje'i ra ba dang// pags pa rdo rje'i gur du phub// ba spu mda' yi dra ba yin// sen mo me dpung rab tu 'bar// lus khams bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// 'byung ba lnga'am bzhir gnas pa// khams dgu 'dus pa'i dngas ma ni// rang byung bdud rtsi'i mchod pa nyid// dbang po rnam drug 'dod yon drug/ pad+ma rak+ta mchod rdzas nyid// kun gzhi chos kyi pho brang du// yid ni kun bzang rang byung sku// lus dang ngag yid rnam pa gsum// ye nas gshegs par gnas pa'o// rang gi lus nyid 'dom gang la// thams cad tshang bar gnas pa ni// kun gzhi de rting nyon yid med// yid ni rgyu nyid ar gnas so// rkang mthil rlung la sum mdo me// lte ba chu la snying ga sa// sgal tshigs ri rab skra ni me// mi mnyam med pa'i gru bzhi lus// snying ga'i rtsa bzhi sgo bzhi la// rkang brgyad ka ba rnam pa brgyad// mig gnyis pany+tsa re khA la// sna ni rin chen pha gu nyid// so ni drwa ba drwa phyed la// lce chu 'dod yon lha mo 'byung// rna ba rta babs nyid du gnas// snying ni

mi 'jigs seng+ge'i gdan// mkhal ma stobs bcu glang po che// mtsher pa rdzu 'phrul rta yi khri// mchin pa dbang bcu rma bya nyid// glo ba thogs med nam mkha' lding// pho ba rin chen khri rkang la// mchin dri dkar nag nyi zla'i gdan// rgyu long chags med pad+ma yin// khyab byed gzugs phung rnam snang mdzad// srog 'dzin rnam shes mi bskyod pa// me mnyam tshor ba rin chen 'byung// gyen rgyu 'du shes snang mtha' yas// thur sel 'du byed don yod grub// sra ba sa ni sangs rgyas spyan// nam mkha' dbyings phyug ma nyid la// mnyen pa'i chu dbyings mA ma ki/ dro ba'i me dbyings gos dkar mo// bskyod pa'i rlung ni dam tshig sgrol// bcud ni yab la snod ni yum// spyad byar gyur pa'i btsun mo yin// rgyu ba sa snying me rlung mig/ gzugs ni sgeg mor gnas pa'o// shin tu rgyu ba nam mkha' nyid// nam snying sna la gnas pa dang// dri ni lha mo phreng ba mo// mngon par rgyu ba spyan ras gzigs// rdo rje myong bar byed pa ste// ro ni lha mo glu len ma// rab tu rgyu ba phyag rdor nyid// rna ba lag nas thos pa la// sgra ni las kyi gar byed ma// rnam shes dbang po'i byang chub sems// yul la snang ba mched pa dang// thob par byed pa snang ba gsum// byams pa me yi rlung du bshad// dpyid ni 'das dus spos me ma// sgrib sel sna yi rlung yin te// de ltar dbyar ni me tog ma// kun bzang me ni mngon par rgyu// 'byung dus ston te mar me ma// 'jam dpal rlung nyid gnas pa yang// ma nges dgun de dri chab ma// dbang por snang ba'i lha 'di kun// rang la ye nas dus spyod yul// yid ni snying rje thabs mchog yab// chos ni stong pa shes rab yum// zhe sdang dmyal bar snang ba yang// thub pas zhe sdang me yang gsod// ser snas yi dwags snang ba yang// nga rgyal ri snyil thub pa yin// gti mug byol song skyes pa la// thub pas gti mug mun pa sel// 'dod chags mi yi skye gnas nyid// 'dod chags dug 'joms shAkya thub// khong khros lha ma yin du skye// bdag zhan bral bas lha min thub// phrag dog lha yi gnas snang bas// phrag dog lcags 'grol lha yi thub// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni// rdo rje reg pa gshin rje'i gshed// reg pa sra ba sa yin te// rtog par ma yin lcags kyu ma// lus kyi dbang po reg byed nyid// yab kyi rdo rje stobs po che// gsher par 'byung ba chu nyid ste// chad par ma yin zhags pa ma// lus kyi yul ni reg bya nyid// yum gyi pad+ma rta mgrin dpal// tsha zhing dro ba me yin te// bdag tu ma yin lcags sgrog ma// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni// dam rdzas dkar dmar bdud rtsi 'khyil// g.yo rlung stong bde'i nam mkha' ni// mtshan mar ma yin dril bu ma// srid gsum khams

gsum sems can la// ye nas rang la lhun gyis grub// rang gnas chen po rtogs gyur nas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog dpal gyis/ tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor rang la gnas pa 'di gsungs so// spyi gtsug bde chen dkyil 'khor na// rnam par snang mdzad yab yum la// sgo ba yab yum brgyad kyis bskor// 'di ni sku yi dkyil 'khor te// rtsa dang thig le sngags dang rlung// dbu yi gtsug tor rtse mo ni// rigs bdag kun bzang yab yum la// thub drug sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// 'di ni spyi yi dkyil 'khor yin// mgrin pa longs spyod dkyil 'khor la// snang ba mtha' yas yab yum la// spyan ras gzigs dang glu ma dang// kun bzang mar me ma yis bskor// 'di ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// gnas rten grub pas g.yo bar grub// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la// mi bskyod yab dang yum du bcas// sa yi snying po sgeg mo dang// byams pa bdug spos ma yis bskor// 'khor lo thig le sngags dang rlung// 'di ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// dkon mchog dpal ni yab yum la// nam mkha'i snying po phreng ba ma// sgrib sel me tog ma dang bcas// 'di ni yon tan 'khor bcas te// 'khor lo khams bcud sngags dang rlung// gsang ba me rlung 'khor lo la// grub pa gdon mi za ba la// phyag na rdo rje gar ma dang// 'jam dpal dri chab ma yis bskor// 'khor lo bdud rtsi yi ge g.yos// 'di ni phrin las 'khor lo yin// gnas pa rtsa yi rang bzhin las// dkyil 'khor spros pa bsgom par bya// grub pa sngags kyi yi ge las// tshom bu spros pa bsgom par bya// lus khams bdud rtsi thig le las// zhal phyag spros pa bsgom par bya// snying po rlung gi yan lag las// rnam grangs spros pa bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor blo yi khyad par las// chu las nya ldang ji bzhin du// snying po brjod pas phyag rgyar gsal// cig char lam du bsgom par bya// srid pa mngal nas chags tshul du// lo dang zla ba'i smin pa bzhin// rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las byung ba// rim gyis bslabs te bsgom par bya// zhes gsungs so// zhi ba lha rgyud chen po las/ rang rgyud phung po'i zhi ba sems can thams cad la gnas pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyis gdul bya thams cad zhing dag par gzung ba 'di gsungs so// ji ltar gdul bya sprul byung nas// de nyid lam du byas pa yi// chos 'di snod ldan kun don du// rdo rje snying po nyid la bshad// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid// stong gsum zhing khams grangs med par// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor kun spros

nas// khams gsum sems can mtha' yas pa// 'dul phyir dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du snang// gang zhig rigs kyis 'dul ba la// gti mug can la bde gshegs rigs// zhe sdang 'dul phyir mi bskyod pa// nga rgyal can la dkon mchog dpal// 'dod chags pad+ma tshe dpag med// phrag dog don grub las kyi rigs// rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di dag gis// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub byed// gang gis mtshon pas 'dul ba la// rang bzhin sku mdog snang ba yang// snum zhing dwangs la mdzes shing sdud// dbyibs mdzes mdangs gsal mdog phyed 'phro// gang zhig bsgyur bas 'dul ba la// rtag pa chen po shang+kha ste// mi bskyod in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ rin chen 'byung ldan btso ma gser// pad+ma rA ga tshe dpag med// don grub in+d+ra nI la yin// rigs mthun mdog tu gnas pa'am// yang na nyi shu rtsa lngar ston// zhal phyag 'dul bar dgongs pa la// chos sku spros pa med pa'i phyir// zhal ni gcig tu bstan pa yin// dbyings dang ye shes 'brel ba'i phyir// phyag ni gnyis su bstan pa yin// thabs dang shes rab mnyam pas na// zhabs kyang rdo rje'i skyil krung bzhugs// bkri drang 'bras bu rnam thar gsum// nges don 'bras bu sku gsum snang// de phyir zhal yang gsum du bstan// nges par chos nyid zhal las 'das// pha rol phyin drug snang ba yang// sbyin pa btang zhing tshul khrims bsrungs// brtson 'grus brtsams zhing bsam gtan bsgoms// bzod pa bsgoms nas shes rab rtogs// rgyu yi lam nas bgrod 'dul ba// rdo rje'i phyag kyang drug tu byung// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang// chos dbyings me long lta bu dang// so sor rtog dang mnyam pa nyid// bya ba grub par mthar phyin pas// 'bras bu'i sgo nas mthar phyin pas// rdo rje'i phyag mtshan drug po rnams// dbyings dang ye shes mi 'bral zhing// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba dang// snang stong zung du 'jug pa dang// yul sems dbyer med snang bas na// gdul bya'i shes par grol mtshon pas// yab yum zhabs dang skyil krung 'khril// rgyan chas 'dul bar gyur pa la// rig pa'i dbang lnga rdzogs pa dang// rigs gcig rigs lnga dbyer med phyir// dbu la rin chen ze'u phrog lnga// kun 'dar nang du sems bzlog pas// gtsug tor thor tshugs yid bzhin 'bar// mu stegs lta ngan rab 'joms pas// mgon po ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang// ro rkyang thabs dang shes rab ldan// phyogs rnams mdzes pa'i cod pan mdzes// rigs rnams bde bas gang bas na// me tog chun pos thod bcings mdzes// byang chub yan lag bdun ldan pas// rna rgyan mgul chu dpung rgyan dang// sku reg dang ni do shal

dang// phyag zhabs gdu bus rab tu mdzes// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad ldan pas// bkra shis rtags brgyad lus la rdzogs// cha lugs chen pos brjid pas na// sku yi stod g.yogs rab mdzes shing// gsung gi smad dkris lhub dang ldan// thugs kyi ze'u ldan rnam par bgos// yon tan chos gos bsnams nas ni// mdzad pa las kyi phu rung ldan// zhing khams rnam par dag pas na// rgyab yol zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang// sna lnga 'od kyis gang bu dang// 'od zer dra bas rab tu spras// gdul bya'i re ba bskang mdzad pas// ba spu'i bu ga re re nas// 'od zer bye ba drug stong 'phro// bde gshegs snang ba sna tshogs ston// mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa la// dpe byad 'bras bus spras pa'i phyir// sems dpa' yab yum rang gi rig/ sras kyi tshogs kyis kun nas spras// sras tshogs ma lus pa rnams kyang// rigs lnga'i dgongs pa tshang bas na// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan cing// snyan cha rin chen 'byung ldan la// mgul chu snang ba mtha' yas te// do shal sku reg rnam snang mdzad// phyag zhabs gdu bu don grub la// dbu rgyan mi bskyod pa yi brda// phyag mtshan 'dul bar dgongs pa la// dngos po 'joms pa'i rdo rje dang// rmad byung sgrogs pa'i 'khor lo bskor// dgos 'dod skong ba'i rin po che// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma 'bar// log lta 'joms pa'i ral gri dang// chos kyi sgra sgrogs dril bu rnams// rigs rnams dbyer med yin pas na// phyag mtshan gcig la kun kyang tshang// sa bcu thob dang rig 'dzin pas// sa snying dkar skya rin chen myug/ nam snying mthing ga ral gri 'dzin// spyan gzigs dmar po pad+ma dkar// phyag rdor ljang gu rdo rje bsnams// snang ba gsum gyis grol ba dang// rdzas kyi longs spyod ldan pas na// sgeg mo me long rin chen 'phreng// pad+ma gling dung gar byed las// byams dkar klu shing spos me yum// sgrib sel mthing ga pu sti nyid// yum ni me tog phreng ba nyid// kun bzang dmar skya rin chen snye// yum ni mar me 'od gsal snang// 'jam dpal ljang ser ut+pa la// yum ni dri chab srin mtheb 'thor// rigs bdag thams cad dbyer med pas// kun bzang yab yum mnyam gzhag bya// lha rnams le los g.yengs pa la// brtson 'grus mthar phyin pi wang rol// lha min khong khro 'thab rtsod pa// 'dul phyir bsam gtan go mtshon bsnams// mi rnams 'dod chags bza' btung chags// de phyir tshul khrims gseg par bsnams// byol song gti mug 'thib bsal phyir// po ti shes rab pha rol phyin// yi dwags bkres skom 'jungs pas na// de phyir sbyin pa rin chen sgrom// dmyal ba zhe sdang tsha grang la// me chu bzod pa'i pha rol

phyin// 'chi bdag bdud 'dul 'khor ba 'dren// gshin rje thod dbyug lcags kyu yum// stobs chen phung po'i bdud 'dul bas// rdo rje gnon te zhags pa yum// nyon mongs bdud 'joms rta mgrin dpal// thod sbrul bsnams te lcags sgrog yum// lha bdud bdud rtsi 'khyil 'dul bas// rdo rje rgya gram dril bu yum// zhi ba'i mdzad pas 'dul don du// yab kyi sku yi tshul bzhi ni// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin ldan// yum gyi tshul lnga ldan pas na// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// thub drug sems dpa' don mdzad pas// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// sgo skyong gdug pa 'dul bas na// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste// spyir ni kun dang kun bzang yum// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa'o// bzhugs thabs 'dul bar dgongs pa las// sangs rgyas rnams ni yab yin pas// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// rig ma gzungs ma yum rnams ni// pad+ma'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' yab yum rnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// thub pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas// bzhengs nas gdul byar mthun par bzhugs// sgo ba gdug pa 'dul bas na// yab yum brkyang bskum dor thabs bzhugs// phrin las 'dul bar dgongs pa la// yab lngas phung po byin gyis brlab// yum lngas 'byung ba byin gyis brlab// byang sems rang rgyud bkra shis byed// thub pas nyon mongs 'dul zhing sbyong// kun bzang thabs shes 'brel bar brlab// khro bos mtshams gcod gdug par 'dul// gdan khris 'dul bar dgongs pa dang// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gdan// 'og gzhi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar// dgos 'dod re ba skong bas na// yid bzhin rin chen khri rkang brtsegs// yon tan che bas bcom pas na// stobs bcu tshang ba glang po'i gdan// mi 'jigs bzhi bcom seng ge nyid// rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi rta yi gdan// dbang bcu mtshon pas rma bya la// phrin las thogs med nam mkha' lding// sa yi khyad par bgrod pas na// nyi ma zla ba pad+ma'i gdan// 'bras bu'i sa gsum gnon pa'o// gnas kyis 'dul bar dgongs pa la// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min gnas// gzhan min rang snang sprul pa'i khyim// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga nyid// de nyid kun gzhi pho brang la// gdos pa can las rab grol bas// phyi nang med par gsal ba ni// shel gyi phor par bcud bzhag 'dra// khyad par zhing khams lngar yang snang// zhes gsungs so// zhi ba lha rgyud chen po las// ji ltar gdul bar bya ba sprul par byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de nyid lam du bya ba

'di dag gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga la// lam ni rnam pa gnyis yod de// grol lam lta ba bstan pa dang// thabs lam dbang gis bgrod par bshad// lta ba bden par dbyer med nyid// skor bdun ngo bo nyid du gnas// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// mchod pas rab tu dgyes par bya// rang gi gnas rnams sbyang bar bya// yi ge a dkar las skyes pa// ri rab rtse la lha yi gnas// lha ma yin gyi su ser po// ri rab khong seng nang na gnas// gling bzhi mi ni nr-i sngon po// bzhi dang gling phran bcu gnyis gnas// byol song du yig dud ka ni// phyi yi rgya mtsho'i nang na'o// pre mar las skyes yi dwags rnams// grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na yod// dmyal ba tri yig nag po de// rdo rje gdan gyi 'og na gnas// 'di drug 'dod khams gnas rnams sbyangs/ 'di skor yig skyon zhig yod dam// gzugs khams bsam gtan mu bzhi sogs// yi ge A+oM du shes par bya// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi A// nyams ni sems la 'char ba yin// gar ni lus la 'char ba yin// sngags ni ngag la 'char ba dang// mthong snang yul la 'char ba la// bag chags rmi lam shar ba ni// khams gsum gnas las nges par grol// 'bru gsum sbyangs na nges par ni// sku gsum gnas la bzhugs par 'gyur// rtogs pas bdag ni bsgral zhes bya// gang zhig thugs rjes gzhan bsgral na// zhing du gyur pa'i bsgral bya rnams// mnyes pa lnga dang stong pa lnga// dgongs pa lnga dang gyur pa lnga// de sogs yum gyi mkha' la 'phangs// sku gsum rgyal ba'i zhing du nges// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par 'gyur// thabs kyi lam la sbyor 'dod na// rang don gsal ba rnam pa gsum// gsang dbang shes rab ye shes dang// bde ba chen po'i dbang gsum nyid// gtum mo 'khor lo srog shing gsum// 'di las 'byung ba'i lam yin no// lus kyi 'khrul 'khor legs gnas na// rlung gis me ni rab tu 'bar// k+Sha ni kun tu bzang po nyid// bdud rtsi 'bab pa kun bzang mo// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// rang gi lus kyi lha rnams mnyes// ye shes sgyu ma'i dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor pa yis thob par 'gyur// lus la dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi// bsgoms pas bde ba rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba sngags kyi yig 'bru bzhi// snying po rlung gi gnas pa bzhi// dkyil 'khor srog shing rnam pa gsum// lus dang ngag dang yid du gnas// srid pa gsum dang grong khyer gsum// 'khor ba gzung 'dzin 'das pa gsum// gzhan don sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'bul// bde gshegs yum lnga gzungs ma ni// glang po can ma sangs rgyas spyan// dung can ma ni dbyings phyug ma// ri dwags

can ma mA ma kI// ri mo can ni gos dkar mo// sna tshogs can ma dam tshig sgrol// sbyor ba nyid ni rigs lnga nyid// rig pa sra ba sa yin te/ de nyid rtag pa rnam par snang// gsher ba chu ste dkon mchog dpal// dro ba me ni tshe dpag med// g.yo ba rlung gi don yod grub// thig le nam mkha' mi bskyod yin// bde ba bcu drug sems dpar shar// phyi yi gnas la ltos pa ni// lus kyi khol bur byams pa skyes// lus la phal cher sgrib sel nyid// kun tu bzang pos lus kun khyab// 'jam dpal snang dngos bde bar 'char// nang gi gnas la ltos pa yum// bde ba spyi mgrin spos ma nyid// mchog bde mgrin snying me tog 'thor// snying ga lte ba mar me gsal// lte ba gsang gnas lhan skyes dri// spang bya ltos pa rnam pa bzhi// sa snying gzugs 'dzin rags rim 'gog/ nam snying bdag rtog rags rim 'gog/ gzugs kyi rtog 'gog spyan ras gzigs// bde gsum rtog 'gog phyag rdor nyid// rang gi ngo bor ltos pa bzhi// bde ba rdo rje sgeg mo ma// mchog bde rin chen phreng ba ma// bde bral pad+ma glu len ma// lhan skyes las kyi gar mkhan nyid// skad cig bzhi ru shar ba ni// rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig ma// khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po yin// rnam par nyed pa'i skad cig ma// khro bo stobs chen gzhan mi thub// rnam par smin pa'i skad cig ma// khro bo rta mchog chen po la// mtshan nyid bral ba'i skad cig ma// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yin// drod gsum rnam pa bzhir byung ba// 'bar ba'i drod ni rnam pa gnyis// dang po 'bar ba lcags kyu ma// rab tu 'bar ba zhags pa nyid// lcags sgrog thig le g.yo ba'i drod// dril bu thig le brtan pa'i drod// 'gyur ba drug ni thub pa drug/ rgya mtsho ri rab skam pa nyid// chos kyi rgyal pos 'dul ba yin// gling bzhi dbang du bya ba ni// shAkya seng+ges 'gro don mdzad// ro 'dzin rang gi gnas su sbyar// yi dwags kha 'bar 'dul byed do// dbang po'i mchog ni steng du bzhag/ lha yi bltas pas tshim pa 'dul// ngag tu stobs kyi hUM drag ring// seng+ge dam ldan 'dul ba la// ting 'dzin hUM phaT mda' gzhu 'phangs// bgad pas tshim pa lha ma yin// kun tu bzang po'i bya ba bzhi// 'bebs pa mi mkhas myur du nyams// gzung ba mi mkhas bde yun thung// bzlog pa mi mkhas chu dang bsdang// dgram pa mi mkhas nad du 'gyur// kun tu bzang mo'i mkhas pa bzhi// dbab par mkhas pas rus sbal 'gros// gzung mkhas lus ngag 'gyur ba gsum// bzlog mkhas dud 'gro'i 'gyur ba bzhi// khyab mkhas rnam grol phyag rgya bca'// 'dod chags thar pa byang chub sems// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis

lhun gyis grub// ces gsungs so// zhi ba lha rgyud chen po las/ lam dbang du bya ba chags lam lha rgyud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ dgongs pa'i phrin las 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par gsungs so// hUM chos nyid spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin las// cir 'dul thabs kyis bstan pa'i las mdzad pa// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor thig le chen po nas// 'khor 'das byang chub sems kyi rgyun yang 'bebs// longs spyod dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhal hom du// 'dod yon lnga yi mchod pas dgyes mdzad cing// chos dbyings dkyil 'khor chen po'i klong yangs nas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa kun mkhyen zhing// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bde ba 'bebs// 'gro drug skyed mdzad mya ngan 'das par 'dren// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi bdag pas phrin las mdzad// dang po sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ni// yi ge A+oM las bskyed nas sku ru snang// sangs rgyas snang mtha' tshe dpag med pa ni// yi ge AHlas bskyed nas gsung du snang// bde gshegs rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod pa// 'gyur med hUM las sprul nas thugs su snang// yon tan rin 'byung sangs rgyas dkon mchog dpal// swA las sprul nas yon tan yid bzhin snang// las mdzad grub pa gdon mi za ba ni// hA las skyes nas phrin las mdzad par snang// rigs kyi sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// grub pa sngags kyi phrin las khyed kyis mdzod// bdud rtsi dri chen gser mdog rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod byang chub sems kyi khu ba'i sku// sha chen dgos 'dod 'byung ba dgos 'dod sku// pad+ma rak+ta snang ba mtha' yas nyid// dri chu las rab mgon po don yod grub// glang chen mAng sa yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan// bya sha mkha' la 'phyo ba dbyings phyug ma// mgyogs byed rta ni dbyings phyug mA ma ki/ ba glang skyon gyis ma gos na bza' dkar// khyi sha las rab dam tshig sgrol mar snang// khams kyi dngas ma bdud rtsi mchog gi sku// rigs lnga yab yum khyed kyis phrin las mdzod// khyab byed rnam snang sangs rgyas spyan dang 'khril// srog 'dzin mi bskyod yum chen dbyings phyug ma// mi mnyam rin chen 'byung ldan mA ma ki/ gyen rgyu snang ba mtha' yas gos dkar ma// thur sel don yod grub pa dam tshig sgrol// rgyu ba sa yi snying po sgeg mo'i sku// byams pa bdug spos ma yi sku ru snang// phyir la ldang ba kun tu bzang po nyid// nang du 'jug pa thub drug 'gro don rdzogs// khong du gnas pa kun tu bzang mo nyid// kha sbyor bzung ba sgo srung yab yum brgyad// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rgyal ba thugs dam can// 'du byed snying po'i phrin las khyed kyis

mdzod// rtsa gnas dkyil 'khor grub pa'i gzhal yas nas// khams kyi bdud rtsi sangs rgyas sku bzhugs shing// grub pa sngags kyi nus mthu ngag la 'char// snying po rlung gi thugs kyis yongs la khyab// gnas pa rtsa yis sku dbyibs gsal byed cing// khams kyi bdud rtsis rnam pa bde ba dang// sngags kyi yig 'brus rang bzhin stong gsal byed// snying po rlung gis ngo bo zung du 'jug/ lus kyi sgrib sbyangs bum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs// ngag gi sgrib dag gsang ba'i dbang chen 'bebs// yid kyi sgrib dag shes rab ye shes spyod// lus ngag yid sgrib dag byed bde chen dbang// bdag tu blta ba'i gzung 'dzin rnam spong ba// sangs rgyas bde gshegs khyed kyis byin gyis rlobs// zhes gsungs so// zhi ba lha rgyud chen po las// phrin las bcol ba ste le'u bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pas mthar phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi'i gsang sngags kyis// thun mong rig 'dzin sa thob nas// sku lnga lhun grub nyid du gnas// thugs rjes mdzad byed ma lus 'dul// oM dzi na dzigahUM badzra d+h+r-igaswA rat+na d+h+r-igaAM A ro ligahA pradz+nyA d+h+r-igalAM dwe Sha ra ti/ mUM d+hA twI shwA rI/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badzra ra ti/ bsnyen pa'i gsang sngags zhes bya ba/ rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum gyi// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas gyur na// phung po lnga dang 'byung lngar sbyong// k+ShIM hi rA dza ya/ traM A gar+b+ha ya/ hrIM ha hUM pad+ma pA da ma/ dziM ku ru pA Na/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA le sa ma ya hoH/ hrIM gI ti rA go\u0f85haM/ a nirti rA' ga yA mai/ mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ th+l+hiM nis+sa raM b+hA ya swA hA/ hUM swA rA dza ya swA hA/ muM shrI aM rA gA ya swA hA/ dzaHd+hu pe pra be shahUM pUSh+pe A be sha/ baM dI pa su gi rI/ hoHgan+d+he tsit+ta/ nye bsnyen nang gi dbang po yul// phyi yi dbang po dus bzhi rnams// byang chub sems dpa' yab yum gyi// 'khor du nye bar bsnyen pa'o// hUM hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta oM/ a a A badzra b+ha drA sa man ta aH/ oM mu ne kriM swA hA/ oM mu ne hUM truM swA hA/ oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ oM mu ne praM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ bsgrub pa kun bzang yab dang yum// thub drug sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// 'gro ba'i don la rab brtson pas// zhi ba'i 'gro don bsgrub par bya// hUM ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM big+h+nAM ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ hUM pradz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ oM ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ sgrub chen sgo skyong yab dang yum// dkyil 'khor phyi nas las byed pas// phyag rgya bzhis ni kun la khyab// de phyir sgrub chen nyid du

'grub// yid kyis lha yi gzugs bzung ba// seng+ge mngal rgyar tshud pa ltar// khyung gi sgong rgya lta bu ste// rnal 'byor pa ni lus kyi rgya// sgron ma bzlog na spa ba nub// lte ba mkhrang la seng pa'i khog/ gdung khebs gtsug tor drug pa ni// nyi zla'i tshe dang mnyam pa yin// rang don stong dang drug brgya nyid// gzhan don lo brgyar gzugs su gnas// bsgoms pas mngon du gyur pa'i lha// gang bsgom lha yi cha byad nyid// dgongs pa nyid la sangs rgyas shing// mnyam par ma bzhag de min pa// rig 'dzin kun gyi rgyal po ste// lhun grub rig pa 'dzin pa'o// chos sku dri ma med pa dang// longs sku 'khor los sgyur rgyal 'dra// sprul pa mdzad pa mthar phyin cing// skye 'jig bral ba rdo rje nyid// yul med rang gsal mngon byang sku// sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa'o// chos ni skye med don gyi gsung// longs spyod dgongs pa brda yis ston// sprul pa tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs snyan// mngon byang rig pa byin gyis brlabs// 'jigs med dbyer med rdo rje'i gsung// gsung lnga nyid du lhun gyis grub// so sor snang ba gdul bya'i blo// tha dad bya ba gang la yod// bde ba chen po'i thugs dang ni// rnam par mi rtog thugs nyid dang// 'gro ba thams cad sgrol ba dang// mnyam pa chen po'i mchog gnas dang// dbyer med rdo rje'i thugs lngar gnas// tha dad 'dod na tha dad snang// dbyer med 'dod na dbyer med snang// zhing khams dang ni gzhal yas khang// 'od zer dang ni gdan khri rgyan// longs spyod lnga ni yon tan te// bde bar gshegs la rtsol med snang// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las yin// phyogs med rang snang zhing khams na// gdung rten rang snang gzhal yas khang// 'od zer sgrib med 'od gsal ba// gdan khri 'bras chos rdzogs rang gdan// rgyan ni ma spangs rang snang rgyan// de yang rnam pa lnga lngar snang// gdal khyab chen po'i mkha' khyab zhing// bde ba can ni 'og min gnas// mos pa can ni rigs drug gnas// phyogs bcur ma lus rigs snang ba// pad+ma can de yum gyi mkha'// yongs rdzogs phyi nang med par snang// 'og min nges pa lnga ldan te// tha dad ma nges sprul sku'i khang// sku nyid 'od de rig pa nyid// yum mkha' skye gnas gzhal yas khang// kun khyab ye shes don 'od zer// kha dog drug ste rtags kyi 'od// dbu phyag las byung 'gro 'dul 'od// 'od rigs kun de rang bzhin 'od// bde chen chos nyid 'od zer ro// mi 'jigs stobs dbang rdzu 'phrul las// de rtags sems can chen po lnga// nyi rkyang khro la pad rkyang thub// chos nyid ji bzhin 'bras bu'i gdan// gsang pad nyi zla thig le'o// rig pa rang snang 'od kyi rgyan// mtshan dang

dpe byad rtags kyi rgyan// stod g.yogs smad dkris khrims kyi rgyan// chos rnams ma spangs rang bzhin rgyan// khu ba ye shes las kyi rgyan// chos sku'i phrin las rnam pa lnga// mtshan ma thams cad ngang gis zhi// de nyid shes bya thams cad rgyas// 'bras bu'i chos rnams dbang du 'dus// rtog pa ngang gis rlag byed drag/ bzhi ga lhun grub gsal ya'i las// snang mdzad la sogs rigs lnga po// las lnga sbyar ba dngos snang las// las bzhi'i tshad rgyu bzhi sbyar zhing// bsdu bzhi'i lhun grub phan 'dogs las// las bzhi stongs gnas chags dang 'jig/ rig par lhun grub ngo bo'i las// las bzhi'i rtog dag bde ba rgyas// ye shes rang shar mtshan ma non// rang shar lhun grub dngos kyi las// de ltar 'bras bu nyer lnga'o// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// 'gro ba gcig nyid re re la'ang// lus ngag yid la nus pa lnga// gnas bzhin ma 'dres yongs rdzogs shes// lhag pa'i chos sku chen po las// rtag pa rgyun du thugs rje skye// sems can rnams kyis de ma rig/ dper na chu bo gang+gA bzhin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la ni// bskul zhing gsol ba btab pas skye// sprul sku byang chub rnam pa drug/ yul dang phrad na thugs rje skye// mngon byang sku dang rdo rje'i sku// rang bzhin shugs kyis thugs rje skye// zhes gsungs so// zhi ba lha rgyud chen po las// mthar phyin pa'i zhi ba sku lnga lhun gyis grub par bstan pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad bstod// rtsa rnams gtsug tor mchog tu gyur// sprul pa sku yi rang bzhin nyid// sngags rnams hUM gi gzugs su 'dus// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs par gnas// khams kyi dngas ma bdud rtsi nyid// khams dgu 'dus pa chos kyi sku// snying po rlung rnams rang gdangs mar// dbyer med rdo rje mngon byang chub// rigs bdag dbyer med kun la khyab pa'i sku// ston pa'i bdag nyid kun bzang khyod phyag 'tshal// ye shes lnga las skur snang longs spyod rdzogs// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin nyid du snang// 'byung ba lnga yi yum dang rnam par 'khril// 'chad pa'i skyes bu khyed la bdag phyag 'tshal// chu bo bzhin du rgyun chad med par gnas// dang po de las byung nas bya ba byed// mtha' ma der thim rang gi gnas la bzhugs// 'gro ba'i nad sos mdzad pa sman gyi gnas// 'jig rten thags bzhin snang ba'i rang bzhin can// rgyud rgyal dgongs pa can la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag sogs rnams kyis ji ltar gzung bar bya// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ rgyud 'di snod ngan kun la gsang ba dang// dam ldan snod ldan rnams la khyod kyis gtod// ces gsungs pas rjes su yi rang

ngo// zhi ba lha rgyud chen po las// rjes su yi rang ba ste le'u dgu pa'o//// zhi ba lha rgyud chen po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra ma sa twa las/ lo ts+tsha ba pad+ma ru rtses bsgyur ba'o//// / rgya gar skad du/ d+harmA tA shan+ta de ba tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ chos nyid zhi ba'i lha rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das kun bzang kun tu zhi ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i lha zhig thams cad du rang gi sems la gnas so// sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' ci la yang mi gnas/ ci la yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa'o// de bzhin du sems dang kun tu bzang po yang de bzhin no// de de bzhin nyid do// chos nyid ni sangs rgyas so// sangs rgyas ni mtha' la mi gnas shing dbus su mi 'dzin pa'o// sangs rgyas ni phyogs su mi 'dzin cing/ nga ru mi byed pa'o// sangs rgyas ni dang du mi len cing gtsor mi 'dzin la/ skyon du mi 'dor zhing spang bar mi byed pa'o// de bzhin du dbyings 'pho 'gyur med pa'o// sems skye shi med pa'o// rig pa 'du 'bral med pa'o// kun gzhi bzang ngan med pa'o// rtog pa skyo dub med pa'o// ye shes ldog 'gyur med pa'o// dus la nyin mtshan med pa'o// bsgom pa 'byung 'jug med pa'o// sku la mdun rgyab med pa'o// gsung la skye 'gag med pa'o// thugs la rtag chad med pa'o// yon tan bde sdug med pa'o// phrin las rtsol bsgrub med pa'o// de lta bu zhig gi rang bzhin yin kyang/ chos nyid skyon du mthong ba dang/ chos can mtshan mar 'dzin pa dang/ sems la dngos por 'dzin pa rnams la/ rnam par dbye ba 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul dang dbang po'o// sems dang phung po'o// phyi dang nang ngo// rgyu dang 'bras bu'o// sangs rgyas dang sems can no// de la sems can thams cad ni/ ma rig pas sems can no// de bas kyang thams cad la chags pas sems can no// de bas kyang thams cad la 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas sems can no// de la sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ bsam pa rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang thams cad la ma chags pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang thams cad la mi 'dzin pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang mi 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas sangs rgyas so// sems can thams cad ni yod par 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang yod la rtag par 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang rtag la ther zug par 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang ther zug par 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas sems can no// sangs rgyas thams cad ni gang la yod

med du mi blta bas sangs rgyas so// debs kyang rtag par mi 'dzin pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang theg zug par mi 'dzin pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang ther zug par mi 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas sangs rgyas so// sems can thams cad ni skye bar 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang 'chi bar 'dzin pas sems can no// de bas kyang 'pho zhing 'gyur bar 'dzin par sems can no// de bas kyang 'pho 'gyur du 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas sems can no// sangs rgyas thams cad ni mi skye bar mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang mi 'chi bar mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang 'pho 'gyur med pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang 'pho 'gyur med par mkhyen pa'i mthu brtas pas sangs rgyas so// sems can thams cad ni phyogs dang ris su bltas pas kyang sems can no// de bas kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin par blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang rtag pa dang chad par blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang yod pa dang med par blta bas kyang sems can no// de bas kyang gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bar blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang bzang ba dang ngan par blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang grub pa dang ma grub par blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang bde ba dang sdug par blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang yin pa dang ma yin par blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang snang ba dang mi snang bar blta bas sems can no// de bas kyang de rnams kyi mthu brtas pas sems can no// sangs rgyas thams cad ni phyogs dang ris su mi blta bas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang snang ba gzung 'dzin gnyis su mi blta bas kyang sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang rtag chad gnyis su mi blta bas kyang sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang yod med gnyis su mi blta bas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba gnyis su med par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang bzang ba dang ngan pa gnyis su med par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang grub pa dang ma grub pa gnyis su med par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gnyis su med par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang yin pa dang ma yin pa gnyis su med par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang snang ba dang mi snang ba gnyis su med par mkhyen pas sangs rgyas so// de bas kyang de rnams kyi mthu brtas pas sangs rgyas so// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin med na chos nyid do// mtshan ma med na chos nyid do// stong pa nyid na chos nyid do// dngos po med na chos nyid do// skye ba med na chos nyid do// 'gag pa med na chos nyid do// 'phos pa med na chos (16)

nyid do// sems can thams cad ni mtha' la mi gnas na sems nyid do// dbus la mi gnas na sems nyid do// mtha' dbus gnyis ka la mi gnas na sems nyid do// yod pa la mi gnas na sems nyid do// med pa la mi gnas na sems nyid do// yod med gnyis ka med na sems nyid do// skye ba la mi gnas na sems nyid do// 'chi ba la mi gnas na sems nyid do// skye 'chi gnyis ka la mi gnas na sems nyid do// thog ma la mi gnas na sems nyid do// tha ma la mi gnas na sems nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma gnyis ka la mi gnas na sems nyid do// de'i shes pa ye shes so// de lta bu'i klong du gnas pa la 'khrul pa dang phyin ci log pa'i dbang gis/ sems can gyi gzugs dang dbyibs rnam grangs tha dad par snang ngo// kha dog dang yul grangs tha dad par snang ngo// gnas dang spyod pa grangs tha dad par snang ngo// de yang thams cad du rang gi sems so// de 'dul ba'i don du sems nyid ma skyes pa'i klong nas/ kun tu bzang po chos kyi skur bzhengs pa'i byin gyis brlabs las/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang dbyibs grangs rnam pa tha dad par snang ngo// 'od zer dang zhing khams grangs rnam pa tha dad par snang ngo// bzhugs gnas dang phrin las grangs rnam pa tha dad par snang ngo// de yang snang tsam na thams cad rang gi sems so// sems can gcig gi lus la yang 'byung ba chen po lngas bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa can ma yin gyi chos nyid du mkhyen pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku snang la dngos po med par byung bas/ de 'dul ba'i don du yum chen mo lngar snang ngo// sems can gcig gi lus la phung po lnga tshang bar gnas so// sangs rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa can ma yin pa don chos nyid byang chub sems su mkhyen pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku snang la rang bzhin med pa byung bas/ de 'dul ba'i don du rgyal ba rigs lngar snang ngo// de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang sems dpa' brgyad do// yul dang dus kyang sems ma brgyad do// phyin ci log pas khro bo/ yul gyis khro mo'o// mtshan dang sems dpa' bcu drug la sogs pa snang la rang bzhin med par de 'dul ba'i don du snang ngo// sems can gyi gnas na 'gro ba rigs drug tu snang ngo// sangs rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa can ma yin gyi/ don thugs ye shes su mkhyen pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku snang la rang bzhin med pa byung bas de 'dul ba'i don du thub pa'i skyes bu drug tu snang ngo// sems can gcig la yang phyi nang snod bcud gnas so// sangs rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa can ma yin gyi/ don dbyings dang ye shes su mkhyen pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku snang la rang bzhin med par

byung bas/ de 'dul ba'i don du yid dang chos su snang ngo// sems can gcig gi shes pa'i rgyud la yang nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong tshang bar gnas la/ sangs rgyas kyis de lta bu'i rdos pa ma yin gyi skye ba med par mkhyen pas/ de gdul ba'i don du chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong du snang ngo// sems can gcig gi gnas skabs la/ lam rgyud lngar gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs na/ de 'dul ba'i don du dpa' bo 'bru lngar snang ngo// sems can gcig gi gnas skabs na/ nyon mongs pa lngas dbang byas te/ phyin ci log tu gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs na/ de 'dul ba'i don du byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin las/ zhe sdang 'dul ba'i don du rdo rje sems dpa'i sku phyag rgyar gsal lo// gti mug 'dul bar rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku phyag rgyar gsal lo// nga rgyal 'dul bar rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sku phyag rgyar gsal lo// 'dod chags 'dul bar snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku phyag rgyar gsal lo// phrag dog 'dul bar don yod grub pa'i sku phyag rgyar gsal lo// ngan song gsum zad par mdzad pas/ de rnams dbu gsum par gsal lo// sku gsung thugs su snang bas kha dog gsum du gsal lo// rgyud drug 'dam nas 'don pas de rnams phyag rgya drug tu gsal lo// de yang ye shes drug tu mthar phyin pas/ phyag mtshan drug tu gsal lo// de yang don chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhugs pas skyil mo krung du gsal lo// de phyin ci log thams cad las rgyal bas/ dbu rgyan snyan cha la sogs pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad du gsal lo// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsal la ma 'dres pas/ bas+t+ra tsi tra'i sham thabs la sogs pa gsal lo// de yang thabs mkhas pas yab kyi bzhugs tshul du byung ba dang/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brtags pas rigs lngar snang ba dang/ de nyid ye shes lnga dang ldan pas kha dog lngar gsal lo// yang chos nyid longs spyod rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i rtags gdan dang khri rkang du gsal lo// thams cad du smon lam mthar phyin pas/ sems can chen po la sogs par gsal lo// de yang chos kyi dbyings dang 'du 'bral med pa'i rtags su yum du byung ste/ sra bar mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du sangs rgyas spyan ma dang/ gsher bar mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du mA ma kI dang/ dro bar mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du gos dkar mo dang/ bskyod par mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du dam tshig sgrol ma dang/ stong par mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du kun tu bzang mo dang/ thams cad skyed par byed pa'i rtags su bud med yum gyi gzugs su gsal lo// gnyis su med pas gtso gzungs 'khril ba'i tshul du

gsal lo// gnyis su med pa las thams cad byung bas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don du/ sa'i snying por gsal lo// de bzhin du sna nam mkha'i snying po dang/ lce spyan ras gzigs dang/ rna ba phyag na rdo rje dang/ mig gi dbang po la sogs pa bzhi/ kun tu bzang po dang/ byams pa dang/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang/ 'jam dpal la sogs par gsal lo// de nyid kyang thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa'i don du/ sems mar byung ste/ yul gzugs lha mo lA s+ye mar gsal lo// sgra mA le dang/ dri gIrti dang/ ro nirtir gsal lo// de rnams kyang dus bzhir gsal bar byed pas/ lha mo bzhi ste/ 'das pa d+hU per gsal lo// de bzhin du da ltar me tog go/ slad kyis 'byung ba mar me/ dus 'byung bar ma nges pa drir gsal lo// de rnams kyang gnyis su med pa chos nyid kyi ros tshims pa'i rtags su sems dpa' sems ma rnams dbyer med par bzhugs so// de yang thams cad du gsal zhing mthar phyin pas/ bus pa khye'u dang bu mo la sogs gzhon sha chags pa'i mtshan nyid du gsal lo// de yang rgyu dang 'bras bu mthar phyin par mdzad pas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ shar phyogs na rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje rgyal po dang/ rdo rje chags pa dang/ rdo rje legs pa gsal lo// shar lho mtshams na dpa' bar 'gro ba dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ zla 'od gzhon nu dang/ bzang spyod kun gsal lo// lho'i phyogs na/ rdo rje rin chen dang/ rdo rje nyi ma dang/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang/ rdo rje bzhad pa gsal lo// lho nub mtshams na/ dra ba can gyi 'od dang/ rdo rje snying po dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ nam mkha' mdzod gsal lo// nub phyogs na/ rdo rje chos dang/ rdo rje rnon po dang/ rdo rje 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje smra ba gsal lo// nub byang na/ mya ngan kun 'joms dang/ rgyal ba'i ye shes tog dang/ blo gros mi zad pa dang/ spobs pa brtsegs par gsal lo// byang phyogs na rdo rje las dang/ rdo rje go cha dang/ rdo rje mche ba dang/ rdo rje khu tshur du gsal lo// byang shar mtshams na/ ngan song kun 'dren dang/ mai tri dang/ spos kyi glang po dang/ don yod grub par gsal lo// de yang skye bo las dbang 'dul ba la brtson pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dbu lcang lo can du bzhugs so// de las yang rigs bsam gyis mi khyab na yang/ mdor drug tu 'dus pas/ lha la brgya byin du gsal lo// de bzhin du lha ma yin pa thags bzang ris dang/ mi la shAkya thub pa dang/ byol song la shAkya seng+ge dang/ yi dwags la kha 'bar ma dang/ dmyal ba la gshin rje chos kyi rgyal

po la sogs par gsal lo// phyi nang yid chos la kun bzang yab yum du gsal lo// gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa mi gnas par sel ba'i rtags su khro bo dang khro mo la sogs par gsal te/ nam mkha'i mdzod dang phur pa las 'byung ngo// de thams cad kyang sems can ji ltar 'dul bar cha mthun par don mdzad pas/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa la/ mtshon cha sna tshogs par gsal lo// de las kyang thugs ye shes gsal la ma bsgribs pa'i phyir/ ye shes kyi 'od zer kha dog rnam pa drug tu 'phros te/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ gnag pa dang/ rin po che'i kha dog la sogs pa/ re re la yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig grangs drug cu drug cu ste/ drug cu tsho drug las 'od gyi lha mo drug cu tsho drug byung bas/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi gling bzhi dang/ gling phran dang/ lcags ri dang/ nyi zla la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bsgyur/ nang bcud kyi 'jig rten skye 'gro ris drug la sogs pa/ grangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad/ long bas gzugs mthong ba/ 'on pas sgra thos pa la sogs pa thams cad dang/ snod du rung ba dang/ bskul ba dang/ dong sprugs pa dang/ sangs rgyas par lung bstan pa nas rgyal ba rgya mtsho la thug dam gyi rgyud bskul ba la sogs pa la/ chos nyid kyi longs spyod chen por mdzad de/ phar 'phro ba dang/ tshur 'du ba dang/ 'od bsnol mar 'khrugs pa dang/ mnyes pa dang/ tshim pa dang/ dngos grub stsol ba dang/ gnyis su med pa dang/ gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor na/ dgyes pa chen po mthar phyin pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs so// de la ma khyab pa med cing/ ma 'dus pa dang/ mi shong ba dang/ phyi nang dang/ steng 'og dang/ yangs dog med pas/ gzhal yas khang gi rgyan sna tshogs par yang gsal lo// don de bzhin du sems can la sogs pa yod pa'i chos su phyi nang du snang na yang/ lha'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs par snang la/ mi snang na ye shes kyi chos nyid skye ba med pa'i klong phyogs bcur ye nas gdal lo// zhes 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad chos nyid zhi ba'i lha rgyud du gnyis su med par sangs rgyas par bzhugs par thams cad kyis mkhyen to// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ chos nyid zhi ba'i lha rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta bi ma la mi tra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan pa phab pa'o////

rgya gar skad du/ kro ta de wa tan+t+ra ma hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo lha rgyud chen mo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan dpal khrag 'thung rngam brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ he ru ka'i gnas bcu na bzhugs shing/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad na spyod pa ni/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams/ gdul bya gdug pa can la sku khro bor bstan pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun bzang he ru ka ni 'bar ba chen po'i zhal dgu la/ dbus kyi zhal mthing nag tu gnas pa/ g.yas smug nag/ g.yas kyi tha ma ser nagagayon dang po dmar nagagayon tha ma ljang nagadabus ma de'i zhal steng ma dmar por gnas/ de'i g.yas dkar po/ g.yon mthing gde'i steng gi zhal dkar por gnas so// phyag bco brgyad pa'i g.yas dang po rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ gnyis pa na rtse lnga pa/ gsum pa na 'khor lo/ bzhi pa na khor yugalnga pa na rin po che 'bar ba/ drug pa ral gribadun pa na sta re rin po che'i dbyug pa/ brgyad pa na dbang phyug chen po'i ling+ga/ dgu pa na dbang phyug chen po'i snying bsnams pa'o// g.yon dang po na dung chen bdud rtsis bkang ba/ gnyis pa na dril bu/ gsum pa na pad+ma/ bzhi pa na dgra s+t+wa/ lnga pa na ral gri/ drug pa na gshol/ bdun pa na kha T+wAM ga/ brgyad pa na u ma de bI'i ling+ga/ dgu pa na rgyu ma'i 'phreng ba'i zhags pa/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad kyis dregs pa'i gdan la bzhugs so// gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ dkar mo dang/ rkun mo dang/ rmongs mo dang/ thal byed ma'o// nye ba'i gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ spos mo dang/ gtum mo dang/ sme sha can dang/ ma tshogs ma'o// gzhan yang yul na bzhugs pa ni/ seng gdong dang/ stag gdong dang/ spyang gdong dang/ wa gdong ma'o// nye ba'i yul na bzhugs pa ni/ bya rgod gdong dang/ kang ka'i gdong dang/ bya rog gdong ma dang/ 'ug gdong ma'o// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing na bzhugs pa ni/ rta'i gdong dang/ phag gdong dang/ spre'u gdong dang/ spyang gdong ma'o// dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod na bzhugs pa ni/ mi'i srin mo dang/ tshangs ma dang/ 'khrug mo dang/ dbang mo dang/ 'jug sred mo dang/ gzhon nu ma dang/ dmar mo dang/ bdud rtsi mo dang/ zhi ba mo dang/ be con mo dang/ srin mo dang/ za ba mo dang/ dga' mo dang/ ra ro khrag 'thung myos ma dang/ gcig pur spyod ma dang/ yid 'phrog ma dang/ grub mo dang/ rlung mo dang/ gsod byed mo dang/ me mo dang/ phag mo dang/ rgan byed mo dang/ sna chen mo dang/ chu lha mo dang/ tshan+d+ho dang/ nye ba'i tshan+d+ho dag na ni/ nag mo chen mo dang/ ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang/ bum rna sngo

nag chen mo dang/ gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo rnams bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi mnga' bdag bud+d+ha he ru ka dang/ bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI dang/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa badzra he ru ka dang/ badzra kro d+hI shwa rI dang/ rin chen rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur par rat+na he ru ka dang/ rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI dang/ pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa pad+ma he ru ka dang/ pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI dang/ karma'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa karma he ru ka dang/ karma kro d+hI shwa rI dang/ de dag kyang rU tra dang/ lha chen dang/ gshin rje dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin 'dul bar bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje snying po rang gi gdan las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun bzang he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// gzhi la 'khor 'das dbyer med pa'i// gnas lugs rang bzhin khro bo dang// sems can nyon mongs kun ldan pa'i// ma dag pa yi snang ba la// rang rgyud phung po'i khro bo ni// kun la ji ltar gnas pa yod// rnal 'byor lam pa'i ting 'dzin la// nyams kyi snang ba shar ba ni// gdul bya sprul pa'i ngo bo gang// ji ltar sprul pa gyur pa lags// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo la// yang dag pa yi snang ba gang// skal ngan sems can gdul dka' ba// ji ltar 'dul ba'i don du gsungs// zhes gsol ba 'debs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs so// gnas lugs rang bzhin khro bo ni// ka dag lhun grub gzhi yi don// ngo bo'i gzhi dang btags pa'i gzhi// rang bzhin khro bor de bshad do// rang rgyud phung po'i khro bo ni// rtsa dang sngags dang thig le rlung// grol lam dang ni thabs lam ste// 'khrul pa'i snang bar gnas pa yin// gdul bya sprul pa'i khro bo ni// nyon mongs rags pa'i rU dra la// zhal phyag rnam par snang ba ni// gdul bya'i snang ba bsam yas snang// mthar phyin 'bras bu'i khro bo ni// sku lnga lhun grub sku gsung thugs// rig 'dzin bgrod par bya ba dang// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor snang// zhes gsungs so// khro bo lha rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng slong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan kun bzang he ru ka la rdo rje snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa// thugs rje'i sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol// yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las// 'dzin pa mi rtog snying rjes zhen chags khro// gnyis med dga' las phrin las snying rje snyoms// dpal chen khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtog 'joms spyod pa mthun pas 'gro 'dul zhing// brda' can yang dag len pas don

go la// lha rgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'bral// da lta 'dir gnas dman la bshad pa dang// ma 'ongs rjes 'jug rnal 'byor kun don du// bka' don gtan tshigs rig pas brjod par 'os/ khyod kyis lung bstan ma 'ongs rgyud rtogs byed// skabs 'dis lha rgyud bshad pa'i dus la bab// go rim bzhin du dpa' bos gsung du gsol// bdag cag ma 'ongs don du nges par gzung// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi'i gnas lugs ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di dag gsungs so// ye nas rang sems sangs rgyas pas// 'khor bar snang ba 'khrul pa'i chos// de nyid sangs na sangs rgyas nyid// ka dag chen por bshad pa yin// bde gshegs ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// 'khor ba log rtog sgyu ma'i sku// ye shes bag chags tha dad pa// sgyu ma'i ngang du rang bzhin mnyam// chos rnams dbyings su ka dag pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// sangs rgyas nyid las ma gtogs pa'i// chos nyid gud na yod ma yin// de phyir phyag rgya ka dag pa'o// 'khor 'das bcings grol ma grub phyir// ngo bo lhun gyis grub par gnas// chos nyid 'dus byas 'khor bar snang// 'dus byas stong pas chos nyid grub// 'khor 'das bzang ngan 'dzin 'gyur yang// rig pa byang chub sems la 'dus// de nyid chos can lhun gyis grub// rang gi ngang gis der gnas so// rdo rje'i sku la ther zug bral// rtag chad kun min lhun gyis grub// rtag chad blo yi ngan rtog ste// chos nyid gshis la de ma grub// chos rnams rtsa ba byang chub sems// mchog tu lhun grub rnam par dag/ ngang khro shugs kyis khro ba yin// de nyid khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gnas// zhes gsungs so// khro bo lha rgyud chen po las// gzhi'i chos nyid dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rigs lngar snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'chad pa'i skyes bu mdzad pa'i
