phyir/ sems can ma lus pa'i lus sangs rgyas par ston pa 'di gsungs so// kun gzhi kun tshang rtsa ba'i rgyud// de rtogs lus ni bshad pa'i rgyud// rtsa bshad rgyud la lha gnas so// ro rkyang kun 'dar srog shing gsum// nyi ma zla ba rA hu la// dkyil 'khor bzhi ldan dkyil 'khor ni// lus la ye nas gnas pa'o// gnas lugs shes nas bsgom pa ni// bde chen longs spyod chos sprul bzhi// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// spyi bor bud+d+ha he ru ka/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad dbang mos bskor// gti mug mi rtog ngang na gnas// mgrin par longs spyod pad+ma la// pra mo hA dang sma sha nI/ sr-i la mu kha

bya rog gdong// 'dod chags bde ba'i ngang tshul can// snying ga chos la rdo rje nyid// gau rI ma dang puk+ka sI// sing ha ma dang gr-i D+ha ma// zhe sdang gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid// lte ba sprul pa rin chen la// tsau rI ma dang tsaN+Da lI// byAr+Sha g+h+rI ma dang kang kA ma// nga rgyal zhes pa rno ba nyid// gsang bar me rlung las kyi rigs// be tA lI dang g+hasma rI// shwa nA ma dang u lU ka/ phrag dog lta ngan 'joms pa nyid// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung bas// rang gnas rU trA 'dul ba ni// gsang gnas dmar nag yi ge k+Sha// srin po rU trar rang gnas pa// rtogs na kun bzang he ru ka/ gnas lugs rtogs pa mchog gyur pa'i// thugs dam dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ khams kyi bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// ye shes khrag 'thung yab dang yum// mnyes byed gtum mo'i bde bar gnas// khams dgu 'dus pa'i dwangs ma de// snying po thig le mnyam sbyar nas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod pa 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ rlung bcu snying po de kho na// snang ba'i thig le'i dkyil 'khor dbyings// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' lnga// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa'i rlung// sa ltar brtan zhing chu ltar 'grogs// me dang mnyam pa rlung ltar yang// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// khrag 'thung lnga yi ngo bo nyid// snying po rlung du ngang gis shar// rgyu ba rab rgyu shin tu rgyu// mngon rgyu yang dag rgyu ba yin// byang chub sems ma rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// dbang po thub pa sprul 'dul ba// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// srog ni nang na gnas pa la// rtsol ba phyir la ldang ba nyid// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis// thugs kyi ye shes lnga blta zhing// hUM las bskyed pa'i he ru ka/ ha las shar ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// he las byung ba'i phra men ma// phaT las bskyed pa'i sgo ma bzhi// b+h+yo las gnas pa'i dbang phyug ma// rang gnas dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rang gnas dkyil 'khor gnas pa ni// bdag nyid sngon gyi sangs rgyas nyid// bdag gi sras su sangs rgyas bya// rigs rnams mi nub lhun grub phyir// bde gshegs sras su bdag byas so// de bskyed 'khrul snang rang log 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// khro bo lha rgyud chen po las// phung po rang rgyud khro bo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi tshogs rnams 'dul ba la snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rU dra'i tshogs rnams la rang shar bar snang ba 'di gsungs so// lung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum// lung

gi man ngag spyi spyod gdeng du bya// spyi khog bcu bzhis stod kyi khog phub la// bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis 'gos sa bcad do// khro bo'i rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad// 'di ni khrag 'thung rngam brjid rgyal po'i lung// de la thog mar lung gsum ni// zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra// lhag mthong ma rmongs mkha' la gza' skar bkram// don bcas pa dang btu zhing mtshams par bshad// ting 'dzin shes rab dka' lung gsum du shes// de la man ngag rnam gsum ni// bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod// yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzod du gshegs// yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyings su gcig/ nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spong man ngag/ de la spyi don gsum po ni// med rgyu btags chags bsgrubs 'grub brtas par snang// spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa dpa' bos 'dul// rtog 'joms slad rdzas dang len dngos grub rgyu// 'di ni khro bo'i spyi yi don du bshad// de la spyi khog rnam pa bcu bzhi ni// gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khro// gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste// ngang khro shugs khro khro bar bcas dang bcos// rtogs pas thugs rje rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang// gang la snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas// las dang 'bras bu sems can grub pa'o// las bzhi 'bras bu sku gsung thugs// ci phyir rgyu+u dang 'bras bu gnyis las ni// dug gsum mi spong sha rus khrag la rol// gang gis rgyu ni hUM dang ha he phaT// gnas ni steng 'og mkha' ste ye shes sku// skyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum pos khro bo'i sku// 'bras bu dpal chen phra men 'khor gyis bskor// phrin las drag pos 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad// de la bdud bzhi bcom pa ni// tsham rngams drag pos lha chen 'dar bsgyel brdzis// brtul zhugs rol pas rdos bcas phung po bshig/ dug gsum mi spaung sha rus khrag la za// rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i sras su stob// de las sa bcad rtsis 'go drug po ni// dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang// dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang// ye shes dang ni nan tan dang// drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro// de la dbang dang ldan pa ni// chags sdang nga rgyal gti mug phrag dog ni// mnyes stob yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sprul// dran med thod pa kham phor g.yang gzhi dang// kha T+wAM rgyal mtshan che dang lha chen dregs pa gnon// de la khro bo'i dpal drug ni// byams pas khyab pas thugs dam dmigs kyis sgrol// thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs// smon lam dbang gis 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs// gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis grub// yongs su rdzogs pas bde ba chen po'i dpal// khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal chen rnam drug

yin// de la bde chen yongs rdzogs pa'i// dpal ni bsam mi khyab bzhi ste// sku gsum sa gsum sems dpas rtogs dka' ba// mkha' khyab sprin brdal char 'bab chu bo'i rgyun// ting 'dzin bsam yas byang chub thogs pa med// bsam yas bsam khyab mkha' la gza' skar gsal// klu mthu 'dul phyir klu lngas sku brgyan pa// rnga chen gsung sgra byams dang pho nya'i tshogs// dug lnga rdos bcas 'dul byed rgyan byas pa// khrag sbrul g.yang gzhi kha T+wAM dregs pa gnon// de la khro gzugs rnam bzhi ni/ gnyis byung// mi thung byis pa'i gzugs 'dra la// a kon la ni yan lag btags// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad la// shin tu skem zhing 'khrang bag bri// gnod sbyin snyil bag mi thung gzugs dang ni// 'dul dbang yi dwags srin po drang srong 'dra// de la grags pa zhes pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub bstod la de sras dgongs// gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags// de la ye shes bya ba ni// rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral// 'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen mya ngan mtha' las 'das// gnyis su med pa mkhyen pa dbu ma'i ngang// mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin// de la nan tan bshad pa ni// nan tan snying po zag bcas zag med 'du// nan tan phrin las 'gro ba'i gnas na ston// bsam yas 'gro ba nan tan chud mi gzon// nan tan mchog gi mchog tu shes par bya'o// da ni khro bo'i rtog pa bshad// de yang mi zad rgyan gyi lung// che mchog yon tan lung dang ni// yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad// de la mi 'da' rgyan lung ni// glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes pa// bdud 'joms sman rdzas grub pa blta ba'i lung// stag ni dpa' rtul za byed rgyan zhes pa// ye shes thugs rje phrin las rgyan du bstan// sbrul ni dpa' brjid mnyen lcug rgyan zhes pa// 'jigs tshul gdug gnon 'khril ba'i yum zhes bya// thod phreng dbang chas sgrol ba'i rgyan zhes pa// sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang chas sgrol// g.yang gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa// byang chub sems tshul dam khrims gos zhes bya// rak+ta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa// mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje pad+ma'i spyan// gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa// bcud kyi thig le don dam kun tu 'od// thal ba 'dul byed phrin las rgyan zhes pa// yi ge 'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog/ me 'bar 'phro 'du sreg klong dkyil zhes pa// ye shes thugs rje'i dbyings 'du phrin las te// zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya// me sgra sgra chen tha dad sgra zhes pa// chos skus khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs 'phro// ral pa 'dzings shing kham nag

'phyo ba ni// ye nas chos nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro// sku mdog mthing nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes pa// 'dul dbang yon tan mtha' med dgongs pa'i gting// mi dpogs de la yan lag rtags kyi lung// spyi dang bye brag snang ba yang// spyir na dpal chen he ru ka'i// sku mdog phyag mtshan ma nges te// gang ltar bsgrubs kyang 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang// de ltas dngos 'byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas ci dgar bsgoms na 'grub// bye brag yan lag rtags lung ni// grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang// mdzad pa las kyi phyag rgya'o// grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsum lhun gyis grub// lta spyod rnam pa gsum gyis grub pa'i rtags// spyan dgu sa gsum sku gsum ye shes so// bgrod med thob med dmigs pa'i yul las 'das// rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' spangs dbu ma'i ngang// shangs gsum srog la mnga' mdzad ting 'dzin gsum// de bzhin nyid rgyu kun tu snang zhes bya// sgra chen tha dang sgra ste chos sku ting 'dzin snyan// zhal gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub// ljags gsum theg gsum mthar phyin shes pa'i rtags// mche bzhi phrin las mthar phyin bzhi yi tshul// ye shes drug ni mthar phyin phyag drug ste// pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug/ zhabs bzhis lam bzhi bgrod pa med par thob// de la mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// spyi dang phyag mtshan rtags kyi lung// spyan dgus sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs// spyan gsum srid gsum 'gro rgyun so sor mkhyen// shangs gsum nas byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs// snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan// dbu gsum srid gsum mgon mdzad sku gsung thugs// zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum zad par rngub// ljags gsum theg gsum ston pa'i gdangs ngang sgrogs// khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin po'i lce// mche bzhi skye bzhi rtsad nas gcod par byed// phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don// phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad// zhabs bzhi phrin las rnam bzhis bgrod med sgrol// de la phyag mtshan yan lag rtags lung ni// rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni// rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'phags shing 'joms// chos sku mi 'gyur rtog dang bag chags bsreg/ ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya// b+han+d+ha bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni// chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan// ye shes dbyings rtogs zhen chags thugs rje skye// mtha' gnyis skyon gyis mi spags bzod pa'i mchog/ kha T+wAM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// dug gsum sgrol byed

dregs pa lha bdud gnon// stobs gsum srid gsum yongs 'dul rgyal ba'i rtags// kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni// 'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang sdud cing// sbyin pa'i bza' bas mkha' 'gro tshims par byed// brdeg pa'i dbyug pas rdos bcas phung po bshig/ rtogs pa'i chos nyid dran med shes lngas bzung// ji ltar smon bzhin grub pas de skad bya// thong gshol thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// nyon mongs thugs rjes tha ba brlog mdzad cing// ye shes chos dbyings mtha' dang bral ba rtogs// thabs kyi sku gsum lhun grub sprul pa 'phro// rnga ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa// yul med rnam dag chos kyi rnga logs la// 'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyig gus bdungs// gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab bskyed// 'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyi mtshan// tshul khrims ting 'dzin ye shes gsum dang ldan// bdag med sems las rin chen dgos 'dod skong// mi zad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// pad+ma 'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan// ral gri ye shes thugs rjes mtha' gnyis gcod// rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis la brtson 'grus mdzad// dgra sta zhags pa la sogs phyag mtshan rnams// rang gnyer las kyi brda' tsam chos sku rtogs// che mchog yon tan spyir dril lung bshad na// yon tan dag gi brjid bzhi la// phrin las rngam ni sum cu drug/ de la sku yi rngam bzhi ni// nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya rngam// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs stabs rngam// zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan yang rngam// cham rngams chen po'i stobs ldan rngam// de yang kun rdzob rang bzhin med// nam mkha'i sprin ni dngas pa'i tshul// lha 'phags tshangs pa smon lam dang// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs stabs tshul// srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gnon pa// dri med pad+ma nyi zla yon tan rtags// gdan khri'i tshul rnams stobs chen bcu'i// de la gsung gi rngam bzhi la// hom lngar 'brel 'byung zhal yang rngam// zla gam cir ston ljags kyang rngam// skye shi rtsad gcod mche ba rngam/ 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i gsung dbyangs rngam// de zhal ye shes phyag rgya las// ro mchog rnam lnga bsreg khang du// tshim zhing 'drel ro lnga yi tshul// gsung dbang tshul gyis 'dus byas dang// rang bzhin ma 'dres ston pa'i tshul// mche ba ye shes 'phro 'dus ni// dug bzhi rnam shes bzhi gcod tshul// 'brug sgrogs yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs// bsnyad pas mdo sde go bar grags// zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul rnam brgyad// thugs kyi rngam ni rnam bzhi la// ting 'dzin nam mkha'i skar

tshogs rngam// phrin las rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs rngam// yon tan mi zad rtsi shing rngam// mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam// rgyan bzhi rang bzhin rgyan du dbye// lhag mthong dag gi rang bzhin las// lhag mthong ma g.yos snang ba'i tshul// zhi gnas dag gi rang bzhin las// zhi gnas rgyan gyi khyad 'byung tshul// zhi gnas rang bzhin bzod pa las// lhag mthong phan pa 'dogs pa'i tshul// zhi gnas rang bzhin mi zad las// lhag mthong cir 'byungadaga' bskyed tshul// de la mthu yi rngam bzhi ni// rU tra bcom pa'i gnas kyang rngam// lha chen gnon pa'i gdan yang rngam// khams gsum bsgral ba'i zhing rngam zhing// rtog 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngam// de yang gnas ni khyad par can// bkra shis cis kyang mi tshugs tshul// gdan khyad thams cad zil gnon tshul// zhing khyad khams gsum yongs bsgral tshul// spyod khyad srid rtog dus gcig 'joms// de ltar rngam tshul sum cu gnyis// de la sku yi brjid bzhi la// sku che yan lag rags pas brjid// grangs mang rkyen dang 'tshams pas brjid// bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid// khyad zhugs yid dang 'thad pas brjid/ chos sku mnyam byung sgo nas che// thugs rje mnyam byung sgo sprul rags// 'du byed mnyam byung sgo sprul mang/ smon lam sgo rigs mthun rkyen 'tshams// spyod lam sgo nas bkur bar 'os// rigs btsun pa yi gtso bor mthong// rang bzhin grub sgo nas khyad zhugs// phrin las sgo nas yid dang 'thad// de yang gsung gi brjid bzhi la// gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid/ tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid// bdag la nyi tsher ston pas brjid/ khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjid// chos skus khyab sgo nas gdangs che// tha dad sgra sgrogs stong gsum 'gengs// dbyangs kyi sgo nas go bar myur// nye bar gyur pas the tshom gcod// byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs// thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tsher ston// shes pa'i bye brag sgo khyad zhugs// tshig gi yon tan sgo kun 'dul// de yang thugs kyi brjid bzhi la// yangs la re dogs med pas brjid// gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid// thugs rje thugs dam mthar phyin brjid// ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid// gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas yangs// spang blang med sgos re dogs med// lhag mthong sgo nas dbu mar gsal// zhi gnas mi 'gyur mtha' rnams spangs// mdzad rgyun mi 'chad thugs rje che// thugs dam mthar phyin ji srid bzhugs// shes rab sgo nas ma rmongs shing// ting 'dzin sgo nas thabs kyis 'dul// de yang yon tan brjid bzhi la// med la zad mi shes pas brjid// gcig las 'dod dgur 'byung

bas brjid// gnod sbyor phan par mdzad pas brjid// thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid// bdag tu mi 'dzin sgo nas med// med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes// ye shes dag gi sgo nas gcig/ sems kyi bsam sgo 'dod dgur ston// sems can sgo nas gnod par sbyor// grub rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad// shes bya'i sgo nas thabs la mkhas// spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon ma gos// de la phrin las brjid bzhi la// mi dngangs nyams bag che bas brjid// 'khor ba yun ring mi bsnyel brjid// mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas brjid// dgongs pa'i don rnams bsgrubs pas brjid// sgyu mar ston sgo nas mi dngangs// rangabazhin sgo nas nyams bag rol// don mdzad 'khor bar yun ring bzhugs// bya med sgo nas mi bsnyel la// mthu yi sgo nas mgon skyabs che// dam bcas 'gro don myur du mdzad// rtse gcig mtha' gnyis don la dgongs// nan tan sgo nas bya ba 'grub// de dag brjid ni nyi shu sgo/ bzhi bcu dang ni spyir drug cu// rgyal rtags nang nas phyi rol la// de la rin chen sna bdun ni// 'khor lo dbang bcu skye bzhi bsgyur// btsun mo yum bzhis rgyal mnyes 'bul// dmag dpon tshul dgus dpung yang 'joms// khyim bdag tshad med chab srid 'dzin// glang po stobs bcus bdag gzhan don// rta mchog rkang bzhis bgrod par sleb// yid bzhin rnam bzhis re 'dod skong// de la 'khor lo'i dbang bcu ni// skye bzhi skur ston skye shi skyol mdzad pa// lha mi sdig sprul skye ba bzhi ru bstan// spul yang 'dugayo byad srid pa'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni// rtog pa gzhom phyir sman lnga dang len rol// ji ltar 'dod bzhin tshul dgu'i gzugs ston pa// gar dbang thabs kyi tshul dgus rol pa mdzad// rdzu 'phrul ba spu'i dbyings nas phra men 'phro// lus ni cir brdzu sems ni cho 'phrul ston// gad rgyangs gdangs ngar sna tshogs phyogs bcur sgrogs// mche bas zil gnon tha dad chos rnams ston// shes rab thabs ldan spyan gnyis dbu ma'i ngang// dbyings las mi g.yo ci yang sa ler mkhyen// sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin sa ya 'phro// bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi la rol par mdzad// rdo rje'i sder mo pags pa spu phreng rgyan// 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs pa'i tshe la dbang// lta ba rnam bzhi'i spyan zur gyis bskul bas// phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad// smon lam dbang gi drag po'i skur ston zhing// dus mtha'i bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med// de la btsun mo rin chen yum bzhi ni// ma chags rdo rje'i gzugs kyi yum gyis 'khyud// zhi gnas ting 'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor// thogs med shugs 'chang don grub yum gyis bskyod// lhag mthong ye

shes yum gyis gnyis med 'bebs// 'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje'i lha mo des// bde ba chen po'i sku la mnyes pa 'bul// de la dmag dpon rin chen tshul dgu ni// nang dang phyi yi tshul gnyis ni// sgeg pas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed pa'i tshul// nyam nga med pas mdzad spyod dpa' bo'i tshul// gdug rtsub rngams pas brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul// log par lta ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul// rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs bzhad pa'i tshul// shin tu gdul dka' khro bo'i snying rje'i tshul// smon lam dbang gis mi bshol rngams pa'i tshul// nyon mongs grub pa'i rgyur mdzad ngo mtshar tshul// khro drag dbyings nas mi g.yo zhi ba'i tshul// de la phyi tshul gar dgu ni// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs pa'i sku// rgod dang gshe dang rngams pa gsum// ngo mtshar snying rje zhi ba'i thugs// dbang phyug 'dod chags nyams can bcom pas sgeg/ lha min ba su ka ra bsad pas dpa' bor mdzad// khyab 'jug seng+ge phag gdong sbrul btul 'jigs// gzhon nu smin drug rta skad drag por dgod pas btul// tshogs bdag glang sna gshe ba'i gdul bya btul// sgra gcan rA hus nyi zla khar ni mid pas rngams// klu chen pe shwa rA tsas 'gre ldog sa g.yos ngo yang mtshar// brgya byin rang gi 'khor rnams skyong mdzad snying rje'i tshul// me lhas 'jig rten bsreg mdzad stong pas zhi// khyim bdag rin po che yi tshad med rnam bzhi ni// khro gtum tshad med byams par snang// gsod chen snying rje'i mtshan nyid de// bsgral zhing bstab pas dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so// glang po rin chen stobs bcu ni// thugs rje'i stobs ni dregs chen spyi nas gnon// chos nyid stobs ni mi dmigs nam mkha'i mdog/ mi 'byed spyod pa'i stobs ni glang po'i rdzas la rol// grub pa'i stobs ni bdud rtsi'i dngos grub rgyu// ma spangs stobs ni rdos bcas sku la brgyan// ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i brgyan// smon lam stobs ni bskal par g.yo sgrol mdzad// sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brnyan phra men 'phro// phrag dog 'khor bar log par gcig mi gtong// 'dod chags phrag dog yul chags spyan dmar zlog/ rta mchog rin chen rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi ni// chos nyid rdzu 'phrul med bzhin cir snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin du rnam par bkra// ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa// mkha' la nyi shar 'dra ste gsal la stong// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni/ mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du gdal// sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni// ro gcig char 'bab snod kyi bye brag phye// de la nor bu rin chen rang bzhin ni// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul bzhin re 'dod skong// mi (17)

zad bdag med gter chen nam mkha'i mdzod// srid gsum mun nag sel ba'i ye shes sgron// dus gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa rin chen 'phreng// zhes gsungs so// khro bo lha rgyud chen po las// khro bo'i rtags bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung rnams gdul bya la snang ba bsgrub cing mchod pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// bsnyen pa rigs lnga khrag 'thung sngags// nye bsnyen yum gyi sngags yin la// sgrub pa lha mo nyi shu'i sngags// sgrub chen dbang mo nyer brgyad yin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsiN+Da sarba duSh+tAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ spyir bsgrub na ni dril ba'am/ sgos su so sor bzlas pa ste// re re la ni 'bum 'bum dang// bye ba sa ya sogs par bzla// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI bid ma hUM phaT/ oM hri shru ta sa ma tA pad+ma ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI khA hi hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hA shwa rI bi shwa hUM phaT// nye bsnyen 'bum dang bye ba sogs// spyi'am sgos su gang bzlas pa// khro mo yum gyi dngos grub rnams// sgrub pa po la ster bar 'gyur// oM badzra gau ri hA/ badzra tsau ri hA/ badzra pra mo he hA/ badzra be tA lI hA/ badzra tsaN+Da lI hA/ badzra puk+ka si hA/ badzra g+hasma ri hA/ badzra sma sha ni hA/ badzra sid+ha mu khI he/ badzra byA g+h+r-i mu khI he/ badzra sr-i la mu khI he/ badzra shwa na mu khI he/ badzra gr-i D+ha mu khI hi/ badzra kang+ka mu khI he/ badzra kA ka mu khI he/ badzra u lU'u ka mu khI he/ badzra Ar+Ya te dza tang dza/ badzra a mu khe hUM/ badzra lo ka baM/ badzra b+hasmi pa la ya ba tu ho/ gnas dang yul gyi ma mo dang/ sgo bzhi lha mo nyi shu la/ gnas yul dur khrod tshan+d+ho zhing// kun nas dngos grub ster bas bsgrub/ ma nu rak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ brah+ma NI b+h+yo/ ro'u trI b+h+yo/ baiSh+Na bai b+h+yo/ ko'u mA rI b+h+yo/ in+d+ra NI b+h+yo/ ping+ga lI b+h+yo/ a mr-i haM b+h+yo/ so'u mya b+h+yo/ daN+Da daM b+h+yo/ rak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ b+hak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ ra ti badzra b+h+yo/ ru d+hi ra mat+ta b+h+yo/ e ka tsa ra NI b+h+yo/ ma no hA raM b+h+yo/ sid+d+hi ka b+h+yo/ bA ya bI b+h+yo/ ma hA ma ra Na b+h+yo/ ag na ye b+h+yo/ ba ra hI b+h+yo/ tsa muN+DI b+h+yo/ su ta na b+h+yo/ ba ru NI b+h+yo/ ma hA kA lI b+h+yo/ tsa kA l-I b+h+yo/ kum b+ha kar+Na b+h+yo/ laM bo da ra b+h+yo/ zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag/ las rnams ma lus kun byed pas// sgrub pa chen po bya ba ni// las rnams ma lus byed pa yin// de nas khrag 'thung lha rnams la// 'dzab bstod bya ba 'di

gsungs so// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa// shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pas rgas rgud stongs// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa'i// gti mug rdo rje bud+d+ha he ru ka/ ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs 'khor ba 'joms// thabs 'dzin mtshon cha'i bskal pas dngos po 'jig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo rje badzra he ru ka/ rin chen dbyig ltar re ba kun skong zhing// bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rdo rje rat+na he ru ka/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du pad ltar sku 'khrungs kyang// lhag mthong me chen bskal pas thams cad bsreg/ 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma he ru ka/ phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing// shes rab thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje karma he ru ka/ sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag/ phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// chos dbyings nam mkha'i rang bzhin khro bo'i rgyal// thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// sra brtan rdo rje dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// tshul khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnam par dag/ gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// lhag mthong ye shes dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// sbyin pa mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ ting 'dzin ro mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing// bdag med zhi gnas dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// bzod pa mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag/ tshul khrims dri yis mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// thogs med las la dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs// 'gugs byed ye shes lnga yi dbyig pa can// dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs// srid gsum 'joms mdzad dbyig thog gau ri ma// sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshogs// mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// bden gnyis blta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs// dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tsau rI ma// gsung gis thams cad zil gnon rmongs mo'i tshogs// dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi gtong chu srin can// mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par blta// stong gsum

dbang mdzad rgyal byed pra mo hA// thal bar byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs// kun gyis las sgrub rdo rje rtse dgu 'dzin// sa dgu'i rtog 'joms shi ba slong bar gzigs// 'jig rten thal byed rnge'u thogs be tA lI// 'byed med shes rab mi rtog spos mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching zhing dbang 'dren las// khro gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyi thugs rjes sgrol// bde chen dbyings su 'dren mdzad puk+ka sI// zhe sdang tshul gyis sgrol mdzad gtum mo'i tshogs// myos byed dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med las// thugs rjes dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs// phyogs bcur dkrugs nas gsol mdzod g+hasma rI// chags pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad sme sha can// ma ning rgyud 'phel gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags// mtha' gnyis ma spangs rnam par g.yengs tshul gzigs// 'bar me stong gsum stob byed tsaN+Da lI// thams cad 'byung ba'i yum gyur ma tshogs ma// kun gyi las mdzad chos sku'i snying po 'dzin// kun la rol pas 'jigs tshul kun dang ldan// thugs rjes 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha nI// 'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi yum// gnyen po'i stobs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon// shes rab thabs ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don// sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod byed sid+ha ma// dpa' brtul za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las// brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don mdzad// thugs rje rtse gcig ye shes so sor gzigs// nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'jigs byed byA g+h+ra ma// 'joms byed dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi yum// thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la bstar// 'dod chags dur khrod bgegs 'joms sri gA la// mi 'byed spyod pas las mchog rigs kyi yum/ g.yengs pa'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes bsrung// chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs// phrag dog kun las mdzad par shwa na ma// yid kyis ye shes so sor kun la rtogs// rnam shes gsang mdzad dgongs 'brel tshul khrims bsrung// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin rgyun gcod spu gri 'dzin// mgyogs mas snyogs byed khrag 'thung gr-i D+ha ma// rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'phrog mtshan ma 'joms// bsad pa'i god rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// mtha' 'das chos skus gzung 'dzin spang tshul 'dzin// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'phrog kang+ka ma// bslad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag pas// mi 'gyur gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog/ chos sku thugs su chud phyir zhal na thogs// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kA ka ma// dbyings las mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs// gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol

phyin// dbyings kyi thugs rjes phrin las 'dus ma byas// mtha' gnyis spang ba'i rngam tshul u lU ka/ bcu drug zhag gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dpal chen bcu drug sa la lhun gyis grub// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i sku// thog mtha' med cing yon tan bzlas pa med// sbyin pas rig pa'i klung du mtsho drangs ltar// 'khor ba'i 'jing nas thugs rjes lcags kyus 'dren// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin 'gro don mdzad// thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma// don dang mthun pas kun kyang dga' bar mdzad// byams pa'i zhags pas 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing// rin chen phyag rgyas sems can dgos 'dod skong// yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags pa ma// gzhan gyi don du spyad pas bdag gi don// shes rab sgron mas dug lnga'i mun pa sel// don gnyis mi 'da' lhun grub dga' ba'i mchog/ kun mkhyen ma rig nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan// snyan par smra bas kun kyang bka' bzhin byed// btang snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad// phan pas rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho// chos ston bag chags byang mdzad dril bu ma// rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin mo'i tshul 'dzin cing// thod rus gdug pa'i 'bru mar zas su za// srid pa'i sems can snying khrag khrag mtsho gsol// dbang drag las mdzad ma nu rak+Sha sI// sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das rtogs tshangs pa'i gzugs// tshad med bzhi rdzogs dpal gyi dbu bzhir ldan// zhal bzhis smrang 'don gling bzhir bkra shis ldan// gti mug yid bzhin rin chen brah+ma NI// thams cad mnyam nyid rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ma// ma rig dug gsum 'joms mdzad dpal rtse bsnams// bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad dka' zlog ma// chags pa'i skyon bral lha chen rau tri ma// thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma// 'brel ba'i thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la rtogs// phrin las rgya mtshos sgrol ba'i bzhad chen ma// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod drag po baiSh+Na bai// 'du byed mi rtag dril bu'i sgra ltar mkhyen// rtag par gzhon tshul 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs// nyon mongs tha ba 'bigs pa'i mdung thung 'phen/ gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad ko'u mA rI// rdo rje'i las mdzad kun gyi bla na med// lha yi rgyal srid tshogs la dbang bsgyur zhing// mchod sbyin phyag rgyas mi dmigs sku mdog dkar// gsod byed rdo rje lce 'bebs in+d+ra NI// byams pa'i thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dkar// b+han+d+ha bcud yangs snod kyi khrag mtsho la// rngam pa'i zhal du dug gsum za byed ma// sdug bsngal dbyings su skong mdzad ping ga lam// sems can thams cad 'dul thabs mchog

tu mkhyen// mun sel sgron 'bar bdud rtsis nad gso mdzad// 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor ba sku 'khrungs kyang// chags pa'i skyon bral dbang mdzad a mr-i ta// zhi ba'i las ni gsod pa'i mchog tu mkhyen/ gsod mas kyang 'dug/ zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar phyin sku// gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing// gdan mchog thams cad stob byed so'u mya ya// dbyig pas 'tshog par 'dra bar gzhal med mkhyen// thabs kyis ma rmongs ljang gu phrin las mdog/ nan dbang drag shul can gyi dbyug to bsnams// dregs byed spyi nas 'joms mdzad daN+Da daM// log par lta ba 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog/ skye ba 'phrog byed skye dgu'i khrag mtsho gsol// las mdzad chags tshul gser gyi sked chings can// drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyu rak+Sha sI// phreng ba rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu mdzes// snying rje rgyun skud pa su'i zhags pa yis// chags med zhing du khams gsum 'dren mdzad ma// rgyun gyi thugs rjes sgrol mdzad b+hak+Sha sI// 'tshog pa'i dbyig pas tshad ma mchog tu mkhyen/ gtum pos kyang 'dug/ gtun bus gdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad cing// yon tan mi zad nor gyi gter 'dzin ma// stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ra ti ma// ra ro 'dra ba'i dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen// chos rnams gnyis med don rtogs rtag tu myos// nyon mongs tha ba rlog pa'i gshol bsnams shing// dge ba'i lo thog bskyed mdzad ru d+hi re mat+tA// brtan pas gzhan rnams pham byed dpa' ba'i mchog/ ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug byed cing// bsnyel pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig tu spyod// gsod byed 'dral mdzad e ka tsa ri NI// bud med tshul chags 'gro ba dbang du sdud// thams cad ma lus 'gugs byed dga' ba'i las// 'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid gsum yid 'phrog cing// thugs rjes zhen pa'i ma no ha ra ma// khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen zhing// gdod nas dbang du bsgyur ba'i rbod gtong can// mi zad gter ldan nor gyi bum pa 'dzin// sdug bsngal re skong mthar thug sid+d+hi k+kA// reg bya'i sems ma rlung gi khams te mchog/ srid gsum dbugs kyi srog 'byin tshe 'phel ma// bde gshegs las rgyud sems can sgrol mdzad cing// khams gsum gnas nas bskyod mdzad wA ya bI// snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i tha ma la// srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba// bsad pa nyi tshe'i las kyis 'dul bar mkhyen// sdug bsngal dbyings su sgrol mdzad mA ra Na// gzi brjid can ni me yi khams kyi mchog/ 'bar ba'i mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsreg/ za byed bskal pa dus mtha'i tshul ston pa// lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro ag na ye// mche ba dag pas skye shi

rtsad gcod zhugs// nyon mongs tha ba rlog byed phag gi dbu// log pa'i phyogs rnams srid gsum stobs kyi sngor// skye bzhi rtsad gcod za byed wa ra hI// 'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'phos smos kyang 'dug mkhyen// thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad// dam tshig bsrung ba'i 'chi bdag bzlog mdzad cing// lung gi dur khrod dbang mdzad tsa muN+DI// 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs ni gzhan med mkhyen// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs la mnga' mdzad cing// sna chen glang sna bdud rtsi gi haM 'thor// sdug bsngal nad gso mdzad pa'i su ta na// chu las lhag pa'i ro ni gzhan med mkhyen// nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog mdzad cing// gdug pa 'dul phyir dug sdong sbrul zhags bsnams// zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang sdud ba ru NI// 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog nag/ srid gsum 'joms mdzad tri shUl gdengs pa bsnams// thugs rjes shugs kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams// 'khor bar thugs rje shar ba'i kA li ma// chags pa'i skyon gyi don mdzad ra mgo ma// byams pa'i zhags pas 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing// gang la cis 'dul de la der ston pa// yon tan tshogs kyis re skong tsa ka lI// ston pa'i bka' dang rang gi dam bcas gnyis// mi 'da' ma grub bar du brtan par bzhugs// dam tshig sgrog gis sems can sgrol mdzad cing// ma rig nub mdzad kum b+ha kar+Na mo// sku gsung yon tan phrin las mtha' yas pas// stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud la 'bebs// so so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs shing// bag chags byang mdzad lam ba do ra ma// zhes gsungs so// khro bo lha rgyud chen po las/ khro bo'i lha rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung gi tshogs kyis mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i khro bo 'di gsungs so// spyir na theg pa bsam yas pa// rang rang 'bras bu sku gsum yin// de yang mi 'dra bsam yas rnams// sku gsum so so'i khyad par yin// nyan thos rnams la snang ba yang// zhi ba myang 'das chos kyi sku// shAka thub longs spyod chos dbang phyug/ nyan thos sprul sku byams pa nyid// rang rgyal rnams la snang ba yang// chos sku zhi ba mya ngan 'das// chos kyi dbang phyug longs sku yin// rdzu 'phrul ya zung don byed sprul// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ni// don dam kun 'od chos kyi sku// ye shes longs spyod snang mdzad sku// shAkya thub pa sprul pa'i sku// bya ba rgyud kyi 'bras bu ni// dag pa chos nyid mngon byang sku// rigs gsum longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// zhing khams tha dad don byed sprul// spyod pa'i rgyud la snang ba yang// 'od gsal mngon byas rdor

'chang chos// rigs bzhi rdo rje 'dzin longs spyod// zhing khams tha dad don mdzad do// rnal 'byor rgyud la snang ba yang// chos sku dbyings dag stug po bkod// rnam snang rdor dbyings yum bcas sku// sprul skus zhing khams kun don byed// rnal 'byor chen po nang pa ni// rang byung 'od gsal chos kyi sku// rgyal drug yum dang 'du 'bral med// thun mong drug khyad khro phyir sprul// rdzogs pa rjes su rnal 'byor ni// dbyings shes 'du 'bral med sras bde// kun bzang yum dang 'du 'bral med// thub khyad 'phro sprul yi ge 'khor// rdzogs chen theg pa'i yang rtse ni// ye ji bzhin smra bsam 'das chos// thun mong lhun grub longs spyod rdzogs// cir yang snang ba de kho na// sku gsum khyad che sems bskyed tshul// lam stegs gol sa phyi nang phye// 'dir ni sku yi rnam grangs mtshon// 'bras bu nyer lnga kun ngo ru// dbyer med sangs rgyas spyi gzugs can// sku lnga'ang kun bzang dbyer med pas// rgyal ba drug pa zhes bya'o// rigs lnga kun bzang dbyer med pas// rigs drug pa zhes bya ba yin// la bzla lhun grub kun ngo bo// gnas lugs nyid du la bzla na// mdor na gnyis par brjod do cog/ thug pas thug phyir mtha' yin te// yang dag rgyal bas thug mtha' med// tha snyad tsam du grol zhes brjod// de phyir gzhi don skye med pa'o// rang gnas zhen bral mngon byas la// mi brjod 'di ltar gnas smra dka'// bdag phyir gzhan yang spang ba med// ming las bzlog pa'i don la med// thabs kyi rang bzhin lus grol na// rtsa rnams sprul skus bum dbang rdzogs// sngags kyi yi ge longs spyod gsang// khams kyi bdud rtsis shes rab chos// sku gsum mi zad rgyan 'khor lo// sku yi mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor// sku yi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// thams cad pa yi skur brjod pa// nges med kun khyab chos kyi sku// dngos gnyis bde gshegs longs spyod sku// cir yang sprul pas sprul pa'i sku// yul med rang gsal mngon byang sku// so so dbyer med rdo rje'i sku// gsung gi mi zad rgyan 'khor ni// gsung gi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// thams cad pa yi gsung yin te// skye med don dang dgongs pa brda'// tshangs pa'i gsung dang rig byin rlabs// 'jig med dbyer med rdo rje'i gsung// thugs kyi mi zad rgyan 'khor ni// thugs kyi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// thams cad pa yi thugs yin te// bde chen thugs dang rnam mi rtog/ 'gro ba sgrol dang rnam mkhyen mchog/ dbyer med rdo rje'i thugs yin no// sku yi khyad par las byung ba// yon tan phrin las snang ba ni// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor gnas// zhes gsungs so// khro bo'i lha rgyud chen po las/

mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas 'khor rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bstod pa mdzad do// e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// khro bo rigs lnga he ru ka/ dpa' bo sgeg pa 'jigs su rung// rgod dang gshe dang rngams pa dang// snying rje ba dang ngo mtshar zhi// nyams ni sems la nang du 'char// gar ni lus la phyi ru 'char// sngags ni ngag tu nus pa 'char// mthong snang yul gyi snang bar 'char// bag chags rmi lam 'char ba yis// sgrub pa po rnams grol bar byed// ston pa kun bzang khyod la bstod// ces gsungs so// de nas ston pas gsungs pa/ khro bo chen po'i rgyud mchog 'dis// lam gyi rnal 'byor grol byed pas// gang zag chos kyi spyan ldan la// rdo rje snying po khyod kyis gtod// ces gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang ngo// khro bo lha rgyud las mnyes pa dang rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// khro bo lha rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra sa twa las/ bod kyi lo tsA ba pad+ma ru tses bsgyur ba'o//// rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha de ba tan+t+ra ma hA kalpa/ bod skad du/ khro bo lha rgyud kyi rtog pa chen po/ bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga khrag 'thung 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis bral las/ thugs rje'i sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol// yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las// 'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhi chags khro// gnyis med ngang las phrin las snying rje snyoms// dpal chen khrag 'thung mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// rtog 'joms spyod pa mthun pas 'gro 'dul zhing// brda can yang dag len pas don go la// lha rgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel// bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod par 'os// zhes bya'o// lung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum// lung gi spyi gcod man ngag gdengs su bya// spyi khog bcu gnyis don gyi khog phub la// bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis 'gos sa bcad de// khro bo'i rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad// 'di ni khrag 'thung rngam brjid rgyal po'i lung// zhes tshig nyung zhing mdor bsdus la don mang por 'byung ba'i mdo'i sde zhes bya'o// de la bshad pa ni/ lung gsum gyis sna drangs te gdang sku bya'o// man ngag gsum gyis mjug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i man ngag tu bya'o// spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi bcad do// spyi don

bcu gnyis don gyi khog dbub bo// bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i bdud bcom mo// rtsis 'go drug gis sa bcad do// khro bo'i rtog pa mtshan ma gnyer gyis bshad pas ni gol sa dang sgrib pa spang ngo// yon tan kun la rngam pas brjid gzhan la snang b.rabya phyir rngam brjid chen po sum cu rtsa drug bstan no// rgyal po yin pa'i phyir/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtags su rin po che sna bdun gyis rgyal po chen por mnga' gsol lo// lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te spyad do// de ltar rnam pa bcur gses nas/ da ni phye byang bu ngo bstun pas gses nas bshad do// de la lung gsum ni/ zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra// lhag mthong ma rmongs mkha' la gza' skar bkram// rdos bcas don dang bstun zhing 'tshams par bshad// ting 'dzin shes rab bka' lung gsum du 'dus// de la man ngag gsum ni/ bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzad nas 'thon// yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzod du gshegs// yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyings su gcig/ nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam yod man ngagade la spyi don gsum ni/ med rgyu btags chags bsgrubs 'grub brtas pas snang// spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa dpa' bos 'dul// rtog 'joms smad rdzas dang len dngos grub rgyu// 'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad// de la spyi khog bcu bzhi la// gang khro gang la ci'i phyir gang gis khro// gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes par bya// ngang khro shugs khro khro bar bcas dang bcos// rtogs pas thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang// gang la snying rje khros te yul dang gnas// las dang 'bras bu sems can grub pa po// las bzhi yang byung kyi 'bras bu sku gsung thugs// ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni// dug gsum mi spang sha rus khrag la rol// gang gi rgyu ni hUM dang ha he phaT// gnas ni steng 'og mkha' ste ye shes sku// bskyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum po khro bo'i sku// 'bras bu dpal chen phra men 'khor gyis bskor// phrin las drag pos 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad// de la bdud bzhi bcom pa ni// tsham rngams drag pos lha chen 'dar bsgyel brdzis// brtul zhugs rol pas rdos bcas phung po bshig/ dug gsum mi spang sha rus khrag la za// rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i gnas su stob// de la rtsis 'go drug ni/ dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang// dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang// ye shes dang ni nan tan dang// drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro// de la dbang ba ni/ chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ni// mnyes stobs yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sprul// dran med thod pa kham phor g.yang gzhi dang// kha T+wAM rgyal mtshan che dang lha chen dregs pa gnon// de

la dpal drug ni/ byams pas khyab la thugs dam dmigs kyis sgrol// thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs// smon lam dbang gis 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs// gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis grub// yongs su rdzogs pas bde ba chen po'i dpal// khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal chen rnam drug yin// de la bde ba chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ sku gsum sa gsum sems dpas rtogs dka' ba// mkha' khyab sprin brdal char 'bab chu bo'i rgyun// ting 'dzin bsam yas bo d+hi thogs pa med// bsam yas bsam khyab mkha' la gza' skar gsal// klu mthu 'dul phyin klu lngas sku brgyan pa// rnga chen gsung sgra byams dang pho nya'i dbang// dug lnga rtog bcas 'dul byed rgyan byas pa// khrag sprul g.yang gzhi kha T+wAM dregs pa gnon// de la gzugs rnam gnyis bzhi yang byung po ni// mi thung byis pa'i gzugs 'dra la// a ni go la rkang lag rtags// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad la// shin tu skem zhing mkhrang bag bri// gnod sbyin snyil bag mi thung gzugs la ni// 'dul dbang yi dwags srin po 'dra// de la grags pa ni/ bud+d+ha bo d+his bstod la sras spun dgongs// gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags// de la ye shes ni/ rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral// 'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen mya ngan mtha' las 'das// gnyis su med par mkhyen pas dbu ma'i ngang// mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin// de la nan tan ni/ nan tan snying po zag bcas zag med 'du// nan tan phrin las 'gro ba'i gnas nas 'don// bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chud mi gsan// nan tan mchog gi mchog tu shes par bya// da ni khro bo'i rtog pa bshad de/ de yang mi 'da' rgyan gyi lung dang/ che mchog yon tan gyi lung/ yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad de// de la mi 'da' brgyan gyi lung ni/ glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes pa// bdud 'joms sman rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhung// stag ni dpa' brtul za byed rgyan zhes pa// ye shes thugs rje phrin las rgyan du bstan// sbrul ni dpa' brjid mnyen lcug rgyan zhes pa// 'jigs tshul gdug gnon 'khril ba'i yum zhes bya// thod phreng dbang chas sgrol ba'i rgyan zhes pa// sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang chas sgrol// g.yang gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa// byang chub sems tshul dam khrims gos zhes bya// rak+ta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa// mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje'i pad+ma'i spyan// gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa// bcud kyi thig le don dam kun tu 'od// thal ba 'dul byed phrin las rgyan zhes pa// yi ge

'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog/ me 'bar 'phro 'du sreg klong dkyil nas bzhengs pa'o// ye shes thugs rje'i dbyings su phrin las te// zad par shes pa mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya// me sgra sgra chen tha dad sgra zhes pa// chos skus khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs 'phro// ral pa 'jigs shing kham nag 'phyo ba ni// ye nas chos nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro// sku mdog mthing nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes pa// 'dul dbang yon tan mtha' med dgongs pa gting mi dpog/ ces bya'o// de la khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gong du bshad par zad do// de la dpal he ru ka sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang ma nges par 'byung ste/ gang ltar bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa'o zhes bshad do// de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang// de las dngos 'byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas ci dgar bsgoms na 'grub ces 'byung// 'on kyang 'di skabs su he ru ka dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad de/ de yang yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad na/ grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang/ mdzad pa las kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so// de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsum lhun gyis grub// lta spyod rnam pa gsum gyis grub pa'i rtags// spyan dgu sa gsum sku gsum ye shes gsum// bsgrub med thob zin dmigs pa'i yul las 'das// rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' spangs dbu ma'i ngang// shangs gsum srog la mnga' mdzad ting 'dzin gsum// de bzhin nyid rgyu kun snang zhes bya'o// sgra chen tha dad sgra de chos sku ting 'dzin snyan// zhal gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub// ljags gsum theg gsum mthar phyin shes pa'i rtags// mche bzhi phrin las mthar phyin bzhi yi tshul// ye shes drug ni mthar phyin phyag drug ste// pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug/ zhabs bzhi lam bzhi bgrod pa med par thob// de la mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni// spyan dgus sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs// spyan gsum srid gsum 'gro rgyud so sor mkhyen// shangs nas rlung byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs// snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan// dbu gsum srid gsum mgon mdzad sku gsung thugs// zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum zad par rngub// ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs rang sgrogs// khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin po'i lce// mche bzhi skye shi rtsad nas gcod par byed// phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don// phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad// zhabs bzhis phrin las rnam bzhis bgrod med sgrol// yan lag rtags kyi lung ni 'di ltar

sbyar// rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni// rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'bigs shing 'joms// chos sku mi 'gyur rtog dang bag chags sreg/ ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya// b+han+d+ha bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni// chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan// ye shes dbyings rtogs zhen chags thugs rje skye// mtha' gnyis skyon gyis mi sbags bzod pa'i mchog/ kha T+wAM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// dug gsum sgrol byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms// stobs gsum srid gsum yongs 'dul rgyal ba'i rtags// kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni// 'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// sbyin pa'i bza' bas mkha' 'gro tshims par byed// brdegs pa'i dbyug pas rdos bcas phung po bshig/ rtogs pa'i chos nyid dran med ye shes lnga yis bzung// ji ltar smon lam 'grub pas de skad bya// thong gshol thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// nyon mongs thugs rjes tha ba rlog mdzad cing// ye shes chos dbyings mtha' dang bral ba rtogs// thabs kyi sku gsum lhun grub sprul pa 'phro// rnga ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa// yul med chos sku rnam dag rnga logs la// 'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyug gus brdungs// gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab bskyed// 'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyis mtshan// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan// bdag med sems las rin chen dgos 'dod skong// mi zad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// pad+ma 'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan// ral gri ye shes thugs rjes mtha' gnyis gcod// rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis la brtson 'grus mdzad// dgra s+t+wa zhags pa la sogs phyag mtshan rnams// rang gnyer las kyi brda mtshon chos sku rtogs par bstan// de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gi spyi dril te bshad pa ni/ yon tan gyi brjid las phrin las kyi rngom sum cu so drug gis bstan pa ni/ de la sku'i rngom bzhi la ni/ nam mkha'i ri mor phyag rgyar rngom// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs rngom// zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan yang rngom// tsham rngams chen po'i stobs ldan rngom ste bzhi'o// de yang kun rdzob tu rang bzhin med pa nam mkhar las sprin dengs pa'i tshul dang/ lha dang 'phags pa dang tshangs pa dang/ smon lam dang cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang/ srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis gnon pa dri med pad+ma nyi zla 'od kyi yon tan rtags te gdan khri'i tshul dang// stobs chen bcu'i tshul rnams ni 'og nas 'chad do// gsung gi rngam bzhi la/ hom lnga 'brel bar

'byung ba'i zhal rngam/ zla gam cir yang rngams pa'i ljags rngam/ skye shi'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems rngams/ gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrog pa'i dbyangs rngam dang bzhi'o// de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya las/ ro rnam pa lnga'i sreg khang du// ro rnam lngas tshims shing mchod pas 'brel pa lnga'i tshul dang/ gsung dbang tshul gyis 'dus byas dang/ rang bzhin dang/ zur ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang/ mche ba ye shes kyi 'phro 'dus/ dug bzhi rnam shes bzhi gcod pa'i tshul dang/ 'brug ltar sgrogs pa yan lag drug cu dbyangs kyis snyad pas mdo sde go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam pa brgyad do// thugs kyi rngam bzhi la/ ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngam/ phrin las rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs rngam/ yon tan mi zad rtsi shing rngam/ mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam/ de yang rgyan chen po bzhi ni/ rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o// lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las/ lhag mthong gi rgyan ma g.yos par snang ba'i tshul dang/ zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul/ zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin ma god mi zad pa las lhag mthong gis cir yang 'byung zhing dga' ba bskyed pa'i tshul lo// mthu'i rngom bzhi la/ rU dra bcom pa'i gnas rngam/ lha chen brtul ba'i gdan rngam/ khams gsum bsgral ba'i zhing rngam/ rtog 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngam pa dang bzhi'o// de nas yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang/ gdan khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang/ zhing khyad par can khams gsum yongs su sgrol ba'i tshul dang/ spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog pa dus gcig tu 'joms pa'i tshul lo// de ltar rngam tshul sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bshad do// de la sku'i brjid chen po bzhi la/ sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tshams pas brjid che/ bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yid dang ldan pas brjid che ste bzhi'o// de yang chos kyi sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas che/ thugs rje mnyam par byung ba'i sgo nas yan lag rags/ 'du byed mnyam par byung ba'i sgo nas sprul pa mang/ smon lam gyi sgo nas rigs mthun gyi rkyen dang 'tshams/ spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor snang/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs/ phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/ gsung gi brjid bzhi la/ gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid che/ tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid che/ bdag la nyi tsher ston par snang bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjid che ste bzhi'o// de

yang chos skus khyad pa'i sgo nas gdangs che/ sgra tha dad pa'i sgo nas stong gsum 'gengs/ skad dbyangs kyi sgo nas kun gyis go bar myur/ nye bar gyur pa'i sgo nas the tshom gcod/ byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs/ thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tsher ston/ shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs/ tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas kun 'dul/ thugs kyi brjid bzhi la/ yangs la re dogs med pas brjid che/ gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid che/ thugs rjes thugs dam mthar phyin pas brjid che/ ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o// de yang gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas yangs/ blang dor mod pa'i sgo nas re dogs med/ lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mar gnas/ zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi 'gyur bas mtha' spangs/ mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/ 'khor ba ji srid du bzhugs pa'i sgo nas thugs dam mthar phyin/ shes rab kyi sgo nas ma rmongs/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas thabs kyis 'dul/ yon tan gyi brjid gzhi la/ med la zad mi shes pas brjid che/ gcig las 'dod dgur ston pas brjid che/ gnod sbyor phan par mdzad pas brjid che/ thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos pas brjid che/ de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgo nas med/ med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes/ ye shes kyi sgo nas gcigasems kyi bsam pa'i sgo nas 'dod dgur ston/ sems can gyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor/ grub pa'i rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad/ shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas/ spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis ma gos/ phrin las kyi brjid bzhi la/ mi dngangs nyams bag che bas brjid che/ 'khor ba yun ring mi bsnyel bas brjid che/ mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas brjid che/ dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che/ de yang sgyu mar mdzad pa'i sgo nas mi brnyengs/ rang bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas nyams bag tu rol/ don mdzad pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun ring por gnas/ bya ba med pa'i sgo nas mi bsnyel/ mthu'i sgo nas mgon skyabs che/ dam bcas pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rgyun du mdzad/ rtse gcig pa'i sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi don la dgongs/ nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub/ brjid nyi shu ni/ sgo bzhi bcu dang/ spyir drug cu'o// de la rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'khor lo rin po ches ni dbang bcus skye ba rnam bzhi la dbang bsgyur ro// btsun mo rin po ches ni yum bzhi rgyal po mnyes pa 'bul/ dmag dpon rin po ches ni tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so// khyim bdag rin po ches ni tshad med pa bzhis rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin no// glang po rin po ches ni stobs bcus bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do// rta mchog rin po ches ni myur mgyogs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi

rkang pa bzhis bgrod pa'i gnas su sleb par byed do// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches ni rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi re 'dod skong ngo// lung rnam pa gsum ni/ mi 'da' rgyan gyi lung la sogs pa gong du rtsis 'gos spyir sbyar ba zad do// de la 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcu ni/ skye bzhi skur ston skye bzhi sgrol mdzad pa// lha mi sdig sbrul skye ba bzhi ru bstan// yo byad srid pa'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni// rtog pa gzhom phyir sman lnga dang len rol// ji ltar mos bzhin tshul dgu'i gzugs bstan pa// gang dag thabs kyi tshul dgus rol pa mdzad// rdzu 'phrul ba spu'i dbyings nas phra men 'phro// lus ni cir brdzu sems ni cho 'phrul ston// gad rgyangs gdangs ngar sna tshogs phyogs bcur sgrogs// mche bas zil gnon tha dad chos rnams ston// shes rab thabs ldan spyan gnyis dbu ma'i ngang// dbyings nas mi g.yo cir yang sa le mkhyen// sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin sa ya 'phro// bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi la rol pa mdzad// rdo rje'i sder mo pags pa spu phreng brgyan// 'khor ba srid par bzhugs pa'i tshe la dbang// lta ba rnam bzhi'i spyan zur gyis bskul bas// phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad// smon lam dbang gis drag po'i skur ston cing// dus mtha'i bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med// de la btsun mo rin po che'i yum bzhi ni/ ma chags rdo rje'i gzugs kyi yum gyis 'khyud// zhi gnas ting 'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor// thogs med shugs 'chang don grub yum gyis bskyod// lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis gnyis med 'bebs// 'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje'i lha mo des// bde ba chen po'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// de la dmag dpon rin chen tshul dgu ni/ sgeg pas 'gro ba shes rab skyed pa'i tshul// nyam nga med pa'i mdzad spyod dpa' bo'i tshul// gdug rtsub rngams pas brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul// log pa'i blta ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul// rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs bzhad pa'i tshul// shin tu gdul dka' khro bos snying rje'i tshul// smon lam dbang gis mi bshol rngams pa'i tshul// nyon mongs grub pa'i sgyur mdzad ngo mtshar tshul// khro drag dbyings nas mi g.yo zhi ba'i tshul// de la khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi ni/ khro gtum tshad med byams par snang// gsod chen snying rje'i bdag nyid de// bsgral zhing stob pas dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so// de la glang po rin po che'i stobs bcu ni/ thugs rje'i stobs ni dregs chen spyi nas gnon// chos nyid stobs ni mi dmigs nam mkha'i mdog/ mi 'byed spyod pa'i stobs ni glang po'i rdzas la rol// grub pa'i stobs ni bdud rtsi dngos grub rgyu// ma spangs stobs ni (18)

rdos bcas sku la brgyan// ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i rgyan// smon lam stobs ni bskal bar g.yo sgrol mdzad// sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brnyan phra men 'phro// phrag dog 'khor bar log par gcig mi gtong// 'dod chags phrag dog yul chags spyan mdog dmar// de la rta mchog rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ chos nyid rdzu 'phrul med bzhin cir snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin te rnam par bkra// ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings la rol// mkha' la nyi shar 'dra ste gsal la stong// chos nyid rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du gdal// sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni// ro gcig char 'bab snod kyi bye brag phye// de la nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul bzhin re 'dod skong// mi zad bdag med gter chen nam mkha'i mdzod// srid pa'i mun nag sel ba'i ye shes sgron// dus gsum rgyun mi chad par rin chen 'phreng// lung rnam pa gsum rtsis 'gos sbyar te bshad pa yin no// de ni lha'i rgyud kyi rtog pa so sor bshad par bya'o// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul bzhin gshegs mdzad pa// shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pas rgas rgud stongs// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug rdo rje bud+d+ha he ru ka/ ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs 'khor ba 'joms// thabs 'dzin mtshon cha'i bskal pas dngos po 'jig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa'i// zhe sdang rdo rje badzra he ru ka/ rin chen dbyig ltar re 'dod kun tu skong// gdug med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rdo rje rat+na he ru ka/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du pad ltar sku 'khrungs shing// lhag mthong me chen bskal pas thams cad bsreg/ 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma he ru ka/ phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba 'dren mdzad cing// shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje karma he ru ka/ sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag/ phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// chos dbyings nam mkha'i rang bzhin khro mo'i rgyal// thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad pa// sra brtan rdo rje dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// tshul khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnam par dag/ gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas

mnyes mdzad ma// lhag mthong ye shes dbang sgyur khro mo'i rgyal// yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// sbyin pa mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ ting 'dzin bro mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing// bdag med zhig nas dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing// bzod pa mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag/ tshul khrims dri yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing// thogs med las la dbang bsgyur khro mo'i rgyal// thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs// 'gugs byed ye shes lnga yi dbyug pa can// dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs// srid gsum 'joms mdzad dbyug thogs gau rI ma// sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshogs// mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs// dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tsau rI ma// gsung gi thams cad zil gnon rmongs mo'i tshogs// dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi spong chu srin can// mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par blta// stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed pra mo hA// thal bar byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs// kun gyi las sgrub rdo rje rtse dgu 'dzin// sa dgu'i rtog 'joms shi ba slong par gzigs// 'jig rten thal byed rnge'u thogs pe tA lI// 'byed med shes rab mi rtog sbos mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching zhing dbang 'dren las// khro gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyi thugs rjes sgrol// bde chen dbyings su 'dren mdzad puk+ka sI// zhe sdang tshul gyis sgrol mdzad gtum mo'i tshogs// myos byed dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med las// thugs rjes dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs// snod bcud gting nas dkrugs mdzad g+hasma rI// chags pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad sme sha can// ma ning rgyud 'phel gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags// mtha' gnyis ma spangs rnam par g.yengs tshul gzigs// 'bar ma stong gsum stob byed tsan+Da lI// thams cad 'byung ba'i yum gyur ma tshogs ma// kun gyi las mdzad chos sku snying po 'dzin// kun la rol pas 'jigs tshul kun dang ldan// thugs rjes 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha nI// 'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi yum// gnyen po'i stobs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon// shes rab thabs ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don// sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod byed sing+ha ma// dpa' brtul za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las// brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don mdzad// thugs rje rtse gcig ye shes so sor gzigs// nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad byA g+h+rI ma// 'joms byed dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi

yum// thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la bstar// 'dod chags dur khrod bgegs 'joms srid gA la// mi 'byed spyod pas las mchog rigs kyi yum// g.yeng ba'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes bsrung// chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs// phrag dog las kun 'grub byed shwa na ma// yid kyi ye shes so sor kun rtogs la// rnam shes kyis gsod dgongs 'brel tshul khrims bsrung// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin rgyun gcod spu gri 'dzin// mgyogs pas snyeg byed khrag 'thung gr-i D+ha ma// rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'phrog mtshan ma 'joms// bsad pa'i god rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// mtha' 'das chos skus gzung 'dzin spong tshul 'dzin// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'phrog kang+ka ma// bslad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag pas// mi 'gyur gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog/ chos sku thugs su chud phyir zhal na thogs// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kA ka ma// dbyings las mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs// gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin// dbyings kyi thugs rjes phrin las 'dus ma byas// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i rngam tshul u lU kA// bcu drug zhag gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dpal chen bcu drug sa la lhun gyis grub// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i sku// thog tha med cing yon tan bzlas pa med// sbyin pas rig pa'i klong du mtsho drangs ltar// 'khor ba'i rdzing nas thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dren// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin 'gro don mdzad// thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma// don dang mthun pas kun kyang dga' bar mdzad// byams pa'i zhags pas 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing// rin chen phyag rgyas sems can re 'dod skong// yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags pa ma// gzhan gyi don du spyad pas rang gi don// shes rab sgron mas dug lnga'i mun pa sel// don gnyis mi 'da' lhun grub dga' ba'i mchog/ kun mkhyen ma rig nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan// snyan par smras pas kun kyang bka' bzhin byed// btang snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad// phan pas rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho// chos ston bag chags sbyong mdzad dril 'khrol ma// da ni rdo rje srin po'i lha rgyud bshad pa ste// bco brgyad shangs nas bco brgyad sprul pa 'phro// bco brgyad khams la bco brgyad skur ston pa// bco brgyad thugs kyis bco brgyad 'dul thabs mnga'// bco brgyad snyan gyis bco brgyad khams gsan cing// bco brgyad ljags kyis bco brgyad gsung rab 'chad// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi dgongs pa bsam mi

khyab// sa dgu thugs rjes don mdzad dbu dgur ldan// brjid gnon zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyad gnon// ji ltar rol kyang spyan dgu dbyings mi g.yo// 'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i tshul ston cing// rdo rje srin pos ci 'dul yid bzhin rdzogs// rnam thar gsum las sku gsum phrin las 'byung// spyod pa rnam dag smon lam stobs kyis gshegs// ral gsig sprugs pas 'gro don rtse zhing rol// bco brgyad stong pas mnyes mdzad dza T+wI ma// brjid pa'i stobs kyis klu rnams zil gyis gnon// phra ma'i skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// chos la dbang mdzad ha ya grI ba'i dpal// 'dzin tshul stobs kyis drang srong tshar gcod cing// log pa'i nyes spangs yang dag don dang ldan// tshul khrims mthar phyin drang srong kang bas che// skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon// shugs 'chang stobs kyis rlung lha gzir gnon cing// 'khyal ba'i skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// gnyen po'i smon lam mthar phyin bdud 'dul thugs rje'i rtsi// las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kuN+Da li// gnon pa'i stobs kyis 'byung po tshar gcod cing// gnod sems skyon spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// gnyen po'i stobs kyis mi mthun gnon mdzad cing// rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che// brdeg pa'i stobs kyis srin po tshar gcod cing// bden dang bral ba'i rdzun dang skyon sel ba'i// mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma kun 'dul ba// ye shes dbang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can// ldog pa'i stobs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing// brnab sems skyon spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// bzod pa sa gzhi lta bu'i gzhir gyur la// smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kuN+Da li// rol pa'i stobs kyis gza' skar tshar gcod cing// 'dod chags skyon spangs sku yi dbang phyug che// ye shes mthar phyin nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal// skye zhing mos la dbang mdzad hUM kA ra// zlog pa'i stobs kyis lha rnams tshar gcod cing// ma byin len pa'i skyon spangs bdag nyid che// rab tu shes pa'i shes rab mthar phyin pa// yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal// 'jigs byed stobs kyis 'chi bdag zil gnon cing// srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang phyug che// gzung 'dzin skyon spangs bsam gtan ngang la gnas// tshe la dbang mdzad 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed// ye shes thugs rjes zin pas mthar mi 'ching// thugs rje ye shes zin pas srid las sgrol// gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsnyems// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes mdzad lA s+ye ki/ rig pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin// thugs

rje'i lcags kyus 'gro ba mi gtong zhing// shes rab thabs kyi lcags kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin// gtso bor dbyug sngon mnyes mdzad tra ti ru// ye shes mtshan ldan thugs rje'i khrod 'byung zhing// sprul pas 'gro sgrol sku dang ye shes 'phro// shes snying ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa skye// sh+ma sha pa tis khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes// dbyings su mtshan ma shes rab tho bas brdung// thugs rje'i phrin las sems can mtshan ma bcom// dbu mar ye shes snying rjes mi rtog dang/ mi g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mu sa la// rdo rje gtum mos mtshan ma'i dngos po bcom// thugs rjes rngam tshul srin po thal bar rlog/ gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs// ha ya grI ba mnyes mdzad tsaN+Da lI// phra mor 'bigs pas ye shes dbyings su 'phen// 'bigs pa'i ye shes gnad du thugs rjes brdeg/ ma 'khyogs dbu ma chen po'i don rtogs pas// gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes mdzad sa byA ti// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings thos rig pa'i sgra// dbyings nyid rig shes dbyings la nyal ba'i sgra// de la bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin pa// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sa byA mi tas mnyes// bdag tu rtogs pa'i mtshan ma kun bcom zhing// za byed mche bas skye shi rtsad bcad de// sku dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pa// pad+ma 'khyil pa mnyes byed mA ra Na/ thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul// thugs rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren// mnyes byed mchod bskul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stobs// ma hA ba la mnyes mdzad tsun dA ma// bskyod pa'i ye shes sa rnams dus gcig gcod// thugs rje'i shugs kyis 'gro rnams gnas nas spor// thabs dang shes rab bskyod pas mtha' gnyis spangs// dI ba ya tis khams gsum hUM mdzad mnyes// khams gsum thugs rje'i mi bzod phrin las kyi// yal bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis brtul// gdod nas don mdzad 'khor ba mthar gtugs sgrol// de phyir dpa' brtul za byed byA gr-i ma/ sdang mig thugs rjes mi 'gyur zhe la gnon// mthu rtsal rngam brjid 'gyur med bdud dpung bzlog/ tsham rngams ral gsig gdangs ngar 'jig rten 'gengs// de phyir phra men 'gyur med tsa ma ra// rtog pa'i sgra spangs dran pa'i dgon par gnas// 'khrul skyon dri ma shes bzhin rdzis tshor spangs// 'gro don dus la bab la thugs rje 'jug/ de phyir 'jug par byed pa'i ha ri Na// chos dbyings gnas la rtog pa'i skyon sel zhing// thugs rjes sprul pas spu ris bsam mi khyab// dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha rus khrag la rol// sel byed sprul pas don mdzad byA g+h+r-i ma// yang bag zon chags 'gro don thabs mkhas ldan// mi 'dul zin thub btang snyoms

chen por bzhugs// dus las mi 'da' brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// de phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i bi DA la/ tshig gcig chad/ ye shes dbyings la 'jug pas shes bya za// thugs rjes ye shes phrin las 'khor ba za// de phyir za byed shwa na mu kha ma// rigs btsun gnyen por gyur pas thams cad 'dul// phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung ma lus 'joms// stong nyid sgra sgrogs mu stegs wa tshogs 'joms// de phyir 'joms byed rtsal mchog sing+ha ma// dbyings la ye shes nyal zhing thugs rjes rmi// mthing nag chen por drag po'i skur ston cing// thugs mchog rnam dag chos nyid dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir rmi byed phra men r-ik+Sha ka/ ye shes thugs rje'i stobs kyis mtha' gnon te// tsham rngams ral gsig sprul pas bdud dpung 'joms// las su ci mdzad brtson 'grus stobs kyis rol// de phyir stobs ldan phra men ta rak+Shu// lhag mthong chos dbyings zhi gnas rlan gyis rgyal// 'khor ba thugs rje smon lam stobs kyis myos// rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang sme med par rol// de phyir myos byed phra men sU ka ra// yid g.yo las can sems par gyur pa ni// ye shes dbang gi thugs rje 'gro la g.yo// don mdzad ye shes god 'brong dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir tshul khrims chen po gri D+ha ma// bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun par gyur// dbyings nyid ye shes mkhyen pas shes bya za// thugs rjes 'dun pas 'khor ba'i bag chags bla// de phyir za byed dro Na kA ka ma// dmigs la sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur// ye shes dbyings rtogs drangs pas nyin mo nyal// 'gro 'ong rmongs la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldang// ye shes thugs rjes drangs pa'i u lU ka/ brtags pa'i dngos la de gcig ting 'dzin gyur// mnyam nyid thob bral dbyings las mi g.yo ba// rtogs pa'i spyod yul byis pas mi mthong ste// de phyir phra men sbed byed bA ya sa// las 'bras bden la yid ches dad par 'gyur// mnyam nyid dbyings su thugs rje'i shugs kyis mgyogs// zhi gnas spyan gyis lhag mthong bgrod tshegs chung// de phyir mgyogs byed phra men bag sha si/ g+hak+ShaM sI// nges pa'i dngos la 'dzin pa myos par gyur// lhag mthong ye shes dbyings nyid mnyam gyur 'dzin// zhi gnas gces par 'dzin pas mi 'phrog ste// de phyir 'dzin pa'i phra men tsa ta ma/ paN+Di ri yang 'dug/ 'dris pa'i dngos po ma 'dres dran par gyur// dbyings dang ye shes mnyam nyid mi brjid dran// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag mthong so sor gsal// gnyis las ma rmongs zin pa'i ti tI la// chos rnams 'byed pa'i bye brag gyur pa ni// mnyam nyid ngang du log lta bsal byed cing// rig pa bskyed pas som nyi the tshom gcod// de

phyir phra men gsod byed na ku la// 'jug par rang dbang med pas gnyid gyur pas// mnyam dang mi mthun log blta myos pa ste// bstan pa'i chos bsgrags log blta mos pa yis// thabs kyis sos byed phra men mU Shi ka/ gsum 'dus gcod pa reg par gyur pa ni// phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad kyang// phyag rgya bzhi po ma skyes dbyings su 'bros// de phyir phra men 'bros byed ka si ka/ 'khor ba'i rdo rje brjod pas mya ngan 'das// chos sku rdo rjes gcod pas mtha' gnyis spangs// brjod med brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral// de phyir brjod med badzra lak+Shi NI// chos nyid rdo rje mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig/ ye shes rdo rjes gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsreg/ phyag mtshan rdo rjes gnas pa'i lha bdud bcom// de phyir 'joms byed badzra b+hi ta pa// 'chi med bdud rtsis yul sems skye 'gag med// grub pa'i bdud rtsis bsam pa'i 'bras bu thob// thugs rjes 'gro bas bdud rtsi bla med 'grub// de phyir rtsi mchog ye shes badzra a mr-i ta// ye shes 'phrog byed yon tan rgya mtsho 'grub// thugs rjes 'phrog byed srid pa dbang du sdud// ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbyings su nub// de phyir rlag byed badzra mA ra NI// nga ni pad+ma dbang chen dang// dbang phyug ma'i lha rgyud brjod par bya'o// bco lnga'i spyan gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge bcu// ye shes lnga po so sos ci 'dul mkhyen// snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal sel// shangs lnga nas byung rigs lnga'i sprul pa 'phro// rgyud lnga'i mgon mdzad brtson ldan rta dbu lnga// dug lnga zhal du shar te rngub mdzad cing/ ljags lnga the tshom gcod cing theg lnga 'chad// skye bzhi las bzhis sgrol mdzad gshog gzhi skyod// bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gis 'dren// phyogs brgyad 'dul phyir zhabs brgyad khro brgyad gnon// rigs bzhi snod bcud nyi zla'i 'od dang rdzis// phyogs bzhi rtsal drug dbang phyug yang che gnon// che ba'i che ba yang che bla na med// bcu drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa ltar// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa bcu drug sa la bzhugs// phyogs bzhi dbus lngar 'bar ltar rigs lnga'i dbu// mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rjes so sor gzigs// dbang chen yongs su 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor dang// tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs rjes lhun grub pa// dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brjid pa'i khro rgyal sku// thugs rjes 'dam skyes spyod pas skyon ma gos// mtha' gnyis dbang mdzad pad+ma he ru ka/ rngams pa'i tshul gyis srin mo'i gzugs 'dzin cing// thod rus gdug pa'i 'bru mar zas su za// srid pa sems can snying khrag dron mor gsol// dbang drag las mdzad ma nu rak+Sha sI// sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ston tshangs ma'i

gzugs// tshad med bzhi rdzogs dpal gyi dbu bzhir ldan// zhal bzhis smrar 'don gling bzhir bkra shis ldan// gti mug yid bzhin rin chen brah+ma NI// thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs rigs mchog ma// ma rig dug gsum 'joms mdzad dpal rtse bsnams// bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad dka' zlog ma// chags pa'i skyon bral lha chen rau tri ma// thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma// 'brel ba'i thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la rtogs// phrin las rgya mtshos sgrol ba'i bzhad chen ma// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod drag mo baiSh+Na bai// 'du byed mi rtag dril bu'i sgra ltar mkhyen// rtag par gzhon tshul 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs// nyon mongs tha ba 'bigs pa'i mdung thung 'phen// gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad kau ma rI// rdo rje'i las mdzad kun gyi bla na med// lha yi rgyal srid tshogs la dbang bsgyur zhing// mchog sbyin phyag rgyas mi dmigs sku mdog dkar// gsod byed rdo rje lce 'bebs in+d+ra NI// byams ma'i thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar// b+han+d+ha bcud yangs snod kyi khrag mtsho la// rngams pa'i zhal du dug gsum za byed ma// sdug bsngal dbyings su skong byed ping+ga laM// sems can thams cad 'dul thabs mchog tu mkhyen// mun sel sgron 'bar bdud rtsis nad gso mdzad// 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs kyang// chags pa'i skyon bral dbang mdzad a mr-i ta// zhi ba'i las ni bsod gsod pa'i yang 'duganams mchog tu mkhyen// zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar phyin sku// gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing// gdan mchog thams cad stobs mdzad so'u mya ma// dbyig pas 'tshog pa 'dra bar gzhal med mkhyen// thabs kyis ma rmongs ljang gu phrin las mdog/ nan dbang drag shul mchog gi dbyug to rnams// dregs byed spyi nas 'joms mdzad daN+Da daM// log par blta ba 'jigs byed spyan gyis mchog/ skye ba 'phrog byed skye rgyun khrag mtsho gsol// las mdzad chags tshul gser gyi sked chings can// drag mo rngam tshul glog phreng rak+Sha sI// phreng ba rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu mdzes// snying rje'i rgyun skud ba su'i zhags pa yis// chags med zhing du khams gsum sgrol mdzad ma// thugs rje'i rgyun gyis sgrol mdzad b+hak+Sha sI// tshogs pa'i dbyig pas mchod pa mchog tu mkhyen// gtum pos bdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad cing// yon tan mi zad nor gyi gter 'dzin ma// stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ra ti ma// ra ro 'dra ba'i dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen// chos rnams gnyis med don rtogs rtag tu myos// nyon mongs tha ba rlog pa'i gshol bsnams shing// dge ba'i log rtog skyed pa'i ru d+hi re mat+ta// brtan

pas gzhan rnams pham byed dpa' ba'i mchog/ ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug byed cing// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig pur spyod// gsod byed bral mdzad e ka tsa ri NI// bud med tshul chags 'gro ba dbang du sdud// thams cad ma lus 'gugs byed dga' ba'i mchog/ 'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid gsum yid 'phrog cing// thugs rjes zhen pa'i ma no ha ra ma// khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing// don rnams dbang du bsgyur nas rbod gtong can// mi zad gter ldan nor gyi bum pa 'dzin// sdug bsngal re skong mthar thug sid+d+hi kA// reg bya'i sems ma rlung gi khams te mchog/ srid gsum dbugs kyi srog 'byin tshe 'phel ma// bde gshegs las rgyud sems can sgrol mdzad cing// khams gsum gnas nas skyod mdzad bA ya bI// snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i mtha' ma la// srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba// gsad pa nyi tshe'i las kyi gdul bar mdzad// sdug bsngal dbyings su gsod mdzad mA ra Na// gzi brjid can ni me yi khams te mchog/ 'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsreg/ za byed bskal pa dus mtha'i tshul ston pa// lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro ag na ye// mche ba dag pas skye bzhi rtsad gcod zhugs// nyon mongs tha ba rlog pa phag gi dbu// log pa'i phyogs rnams srid gsum stobs kyis spor// skye ba'i rtsad gcod za byed ba ra hI// 'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma smos mkhyen// thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad// dam tshig srung ba'i 'chi bdag bzlog mdzad cing// lung gi dur khrod dbang mdzad tsa muN+DI// 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs ni gzhan med mkhyen// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs la dbang mdzad cing// sna chen glang sna bdud rtsi gi haM thogs// sdug bsngal nad sos mdzad pa'i su ta na// chu las lhag pa'i zas ni gzhan med mkhyen// nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog mdzad cing// gdug pa 'dul phyir dug snod sbrul zhags bsnams// zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang sdud wa ru NI// 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ srid gsum 'joms mdzad tri shUl gdengs pa bsnams// thugs rjes shugs kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams// 'khor ba thugs rje shar mdzad ka lI ma// chags pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad ra mgo can// byams pa'i zhags pas 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing// gang la cis 'dul de la der ston pa'i// yon tan tshogs rdzogs re skong tsa ka lA+e// ston pa'i bka' dang rang gi dam bcas gnyis// mi 'da' ma grub bar du brtan par bzhugs// dam tshig sgrog gis sems can sgrol mdzad cing// ma rig nub mdzad kum+b+ha kar+Na

ma// sku+u gsung yon tan phrin las mtha' klas pa// stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud la 'bebs// so so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs shing// bag chags byang mdzad lam+bo da ra ma// mtshan dang dpe byad gnyis las 'phro// mgyogs pa mgyogs ma'i pho nya ste// rngam pa gtum pa'i gzugs can ni// dra ba mo dang glog 'gyur grags// chos nyid zhags pas mtshan ma dbyings su sdud// ye shes thugs rjes 'brel pas kun la khyab// phrin las dra bas 'gro ba rlabs kyis sgrol// de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba mo// oM badzra dzA la badzra hUM/ ye shes glog 'gyus mtshan ma dbyings su gcod// skad cig thugs rjes 'khor ba dbye bsal med// phrin las glog 'gyus 'gro ba yid kyis sgrol// dra bas bsdus la glog 'gyu ma yis 'dren// badzra a mo ka hUM/ 'od zer dud kha 'phro ba ni// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing// bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa'i rlung dang mtshungs// mig gsum po la lcags sder can// mgo gsum po la rkang gsum po// mAng sa za zhing bdud khyim 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams 'jigs par byed// klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms// 'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya ste// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing// gang gi rlung phyogs song ba'i tshe// khro bo thams cad nges par 'chi// na mo bi tsa ra b+h+yo/ ha ha ru lu b+h+yo/ mgo brgyad po la lag brgyad po// rkang pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad/ lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin// rta mgrin gnas ni nges par 'joms// rkang pa drug la mgo drug po// lag pa drug ni rgyud drug gcod// g.yon pa drug ni gtor ma 'dzin// g.yas pa gsum ni phur bu 'dzin// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// bdag gi rkang pa phur pa yin// rkang pa lcags phur rab tu grags// 'od zer dud khas reg pas ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang nges par 'joms// lag pa g.yon pa bskyod pas ni// phra men 'khor bcas ral pa gsig/ lcags kyi dgra s+t+wa rab thogs shing// zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro// byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// sgra ni 'brug pas rab tu
